data.v: तवानुयाने काकुत्ष्ठ मत्ता नर्दन्तु कुञ्जराः । अन्तःपुर गता नार्यो नन्दन्तु सुसमाहिताः ।।
data.es: O Rama, let the elephants following you, intoxicated with ichor, be heard trumpeting. Let the women of the inner apartment rejoice with composed minds (when they hear of your return).
data.anv: काकुत्स्थ O Kakutstha (Rama), तव your, अनुयाने following you, मत्ताः intoxicated with ichor, कुञ्जराः elephants, नर्दन्तु may trumpet, अन्तःपुरगताः of the inner apartment, नार्यः women, सुसमाहिताः with composed minds, नन्दन्तु may rejoice.

data.v: तस्य साध्वित्यमन्यन्त नागरा विविधा जनाः । भरतस्य वचः श्रुत्वा रामं प्रत्यनुयाचतः ।।
data.es: Hearing the words of Bharata beseeching Rama to return, various classes of people of the city of Ayodhya, in approbation exclaimed well said.
data.anv: रामं प्रति about Rama, अनुयाचतः while beseeching, तस्य भरतस्य that Bharata's, वचः words, श्रुत्वा hearing, नागराः pertaining to the city, विविधाः various classes, जनाः people, साधु इति as well said, अमन्यन्त exclaimed.

data.v: तमेवं दुःखितं प्रेक्ष्य विलपन्तं यशस्विनम् । रामः कृतात्मा भरतं समाश्वासयदात्मवान् ।।
data.es: Thus lamenting, Bharata fainted. Seeing him (in this state) all the women (of the inner apartment) at once cried aloud piteously.
data.anv: कृतात्मा man of firm determination, आत्मवान् selfpossessed, रामः Rama, एवम् in this way, विलपन्तम् lamenting, यशस्विनम् illustrious, दुःखितम् depressed, तं भरतम् that Bharata, प्रेक्ष्य seeing, समाश्वासयत् consoled him.

data.v: नात्मनः कामकारोऽस्ति पुरुषोऽयमनीश्वरः । इतश्चेतरतश्चैनं कृतान्तः परिकर्षति ।।
data.es: A man is neither independent nor competent to do any act on his free will. Fate pulls him this way or the other.
data.anv: आत्मनः by oneself, कामकारः to do at free will, नास्ति is not there, अयम् this, पुरुषः man, अनीश्वरः is not independent, कृतान्तः fate, एनम् him, इतश्च from this way, इतरतश्च or the  other way, परिकर्षति is pulled.

data.v: सर्वे क्षयान्ता निचयाः पतनान्ताः समुच्छ्रयाः । संयोगा विप्रयोगान्ता मरणान्तं च जीवितम् ।।
data.es: All accumulations of wealth deplete at the end. Every man who attains elevated positions falls at the end. Every union culminates in separation. Every life ends in death.
data.anv: सर्वे all, निचयाः accumulations of wealth, क्षयान्ताः deplete at the end, समुच्छ्रयाः elevated positions, पतनान्ताः degrade at the end, संयोगाः union, विप्रयोगान्ताः end in separation, जीवितम् life, मरणान्तम् has death at the end.

data.v: यथा फलानं पक्वानां नान्यत्र पतनाद्भयम् । एवं नरस्य जातस्य नान्यत्र मरणाद्भयम् ।।
data.es: The only fear of a ripened fruit is the fear of falling down (from the tree). In the same way every man who is born has no other fear except the fear of death.
data.anv: पक्वानाम् ripened, फलानाम् fruits, पतनात् from falling down, अन्यत्र no other, भयम् fear, यथा as how, न not, एवम् in the same way, जातस्य of one who is born, नरस्य for a man, मरणात्  more than death, अन्यत्र from any other source, भयम् fear, न not.

data.v: यथागारं दृढस्थूणं जीर्णं भूत्वावसीदति । तथावसीदन्ति नरा जरामृत्युवशं गताः ।।
data.es: Even a house constructed with sturdy pillars gets dilapidated and ultimately decays. In the same way people under the sway of old age and death are destroyed (at last).
data.anv: दृढस्थूणम् with sturdy pillars, आगारम् house, यथा as, जीर्णं भूत्वा after getting dilapidated, अवसीदति decays, तथैव in the same way, नराः people, जरामृत्युवशंगताः under the sway of  old age and death, सीदन्ति are destroyed.

data.v: अहोरात्राणि गच्छन्ति सर्वेषां प्राणिनामिह । आयूंषि क्षपयन्त्याशु ग्रीष्मे जलमिवांशवः ।।
data.es: The passing days and nights quickly decrease the life span of all living beings in this world, like sunrays drying up the water in summer.
data.anv: इह in this world, गच्छन्ति are passing, अहोरात्राणि days and nights, ग्रीष्मे in summer, अंशवः rays of the sun, जलमिव like the water, सर्वेषाम् all, प्राणिनाम् living things', आयूंषि life span, आशु are quickly, क्षपयन्ति are decaying.

data.v: आत्मानमनुशोच त्वं किमन्यमनुशोचसि । आयुस्ते हीयते यस्य स्थितस्य च गतस्य च ।।
data.es: Whether you are static or moving, your lifespan decreases. Therefore, you should only grieve about yourself and not for any one else.
data.anv: स्थितस्य च whether you stand, गतस्य च or moving, यस्य whosoever, आयुः life span, हीयते decreases, आत्मानम् about you, त्वम् you, अनुशोच grieve, अन्यम् about others, किम् why, अनुशोचसि are you grieving?

data.v: सहैव मृत्युर्व्रजति सह मृत्युर्निषीदति । गत्वा सुदीर्घमध्वानं सह मृत्युर्निवर्तते ।।
data.es: Death follows a man wherever he goes. When he sits, death sits with him. Even after travelling a very long distance, the man returns along with death.
data.anv: मृत्युः death, सहैव along with you, व्रजति is moving, सह मृत्युः along with death, निषीदति a man sits, सुदीर्घम् very long, अध्वानम् way, गत्वा having gone, सहमृत्युः with death, निवर्तते is returning.

data.v: गात्रेषु वलयः प्राप्ताः श्वेताश्चैव शिरोरुहाः । जरया पुरुषो जीर्णः किं हि कृत्वा प्रभावयेत् ।।
data.es: Wrinkels form on the body and hair turns grey in old age. In this way, decayed with age, what can a man do to have control over death.
data.anv: गात्रेषु in man's limbs, वलय: wrinkles, प्राप्ताः are formed, शिरोरुहाश्चैव hair also, श्वेताः becomes grey, जरया with old age, जीर्णः one decays, पुरुषः a man, किं हि what, कृत्वा having done, प्रभावयेत् can influence.

data.v: नन्दन्त्युदित आदित्ये नन्दन्त्यस्तमिते रवौ । आत्मनो नावबुध्यन्ते मनुष्या जीवितक्षयम् ।।
data.es: People rejoice when the Sun rises and rejoice when the Sun sets. But they are unaware of the decline of the life span of their own.
data.anv: मनुष्याः people, आदित्ये the Sun, उदिते rises, नन्दन्ति rejoice, रवौ when the Sun, आस्तमिते sets, नन्दन्ति rejoice, आत्मनः their own, जीवितक्षयम् decline of life span, नावबुद्ध्यन्ते are not aware of.

data.v: हृष्यन्त्यृतुमुखं दृष्ट्वा नवं नवमिहागतम् । ऋतूनां परिवर्तेन प्राणिनां प्राणसंक्षयः ।।
data.es: At the advent of each new season men feel delighted to see the newly blossomed flowers and fruits. But with the change of the scasons the life span also diminishes.
data.anv: ऋतुमुखम् setting of a season, दृष्ट्वा having seen, इह now, नवं नवम् something new             (flowers and fruits), आगतम् have arrived, हृष्यन्ति feel delighted, ऋतूनाम् of seasons, परिवर्तेन by changes, प्राणिनाम् of living beings', प्राणसङ्क्षयः life span decreases.

data.v: यथा काष्ठं च काष्ठं च समेयातां महार्णवे । समेत्य च व्यपेयातां कालमासाद्य कंचन ।।
data.es: In a mighty ocean, two pieces of logs meet one another, float together and in due course get separated. In the same way wives, sons, relatives and riches remain together for some time and thereafter get separated. Their separation is certain.
data.anv: यथा as, महार्णवे in a mighty ocean, काष्ठं च a piece of wood, काष्ठं च another piece of wood, समेयाताम् might meet, समेत्य having met, कञ्चन कालम् for a short span, आसाद्य remaining together, व्यपेयातां च get separated, एवम् in the same way, भार्याश्च wives, पुत्राश्च sons, ज्ञातयश्च relatives, धनानि च riches, समेत्य after coming together, व्यवधावन्ति get separated, एषाम् their, विनाभवः separation, ध्रुवो हि is certain.

data.v: एवं भार्याश्च पुत्राश्च ज्ञातयश्च वसूनि च । समेत्य व्यवधावन्ति ध्रुवो ह्येषां विनाभवः ।।
data.es: In a mighty ocean, two pieces of logs meet one another, float together and in due course get separated. In the same way wives, sons, relatives and riches remain together for some time and thereafter get separated. Their separation is certain.
data.anv: यथा as, महार्णवे in a mighty ocean, काष्ठं च a piece of wood, काष्ठं च another piece of wood, समेयाताम् might meet, समेत्य having met, कञ्चन कालम् for a short span, आसाद्य remaining together, व्यपेयातां च get separated, एवम् in the same way, भार्याश्च wives, पुत्राश्च sons, ज्ञातयश्च relatives, धनानि च riches, समेत्य after coming together, व्यवधावन्ति get separated, एषाम् their, विनाभवः separation, ध्रुवो हि is certain.

data.v: नात्र कश्चिद्यथा भावं प्राणी समभिवर्तते । तेन तस्मिन्न सामर्थ्यं प्रेतस्यास्त्यनुशोचतः ।।
data.es: No living being in this world can act as he likes. Therefore, no one should grieve for the dead.
data.anv: अत्र then in this world, कश्चित् प्राणी any living being, यथाभावम् as one likes, न समभिवर्तते does not go, तेन therefore, प्रेतस्य for the dead, अनुशोचतः for one who grieves, तस्मिन् in the matter of death, सामर्थ्यम् capability, नास्ति not there.

data.v: यथा हि सार्थं गच्छन्तं ब्रूयात्कश्चित्पथि स्थितः । अहमप्यागमिष्यामि पृष्ठतो भवतामिति ।।
data.es: Like a man standing on the wayside says to a passing caravan, 'I am following you', and follows them, the road taken by our fathers and forefathers is certain for every one and cannot be violated by a person treading that path. (So) why should a man grieve?
data.anv: गच्छन्तम् while passing, सार्थम् caravan, (कच्चित्) पथि on the wayside, स्थितः standing, अहमपि I also, भवताम् your, पृष्ठतः behind, आगमिष्यामि I am coming, इति thus, यथा as, ब्रूयात् one may say, एवम् in this way, पूर्वैः by ancestors, गतः taken, पितृपैतामहः folowed by fathers and forefathers, मार्गः the path, ध्रुवः is certain, यस्य whosoever, व्यतिक्रमः violation, नास्ति not possible, तम् that very road, आपन्नः following, कथम् why, शोचेत् should one grieve?

data.v: एवं पूर्वैर्गतो मार्गः पितृपैतामहो ध्रुवः । तमापन्नः कथं शोचेद्यस्य नास्ति व्यतिक्रमः ।।
data.es: Like a man standing on the wayside says to a passing caravan, 'I am following you', and follows them, the road taken by our fathers and forefathers is certain for every one and cannot be violated by a person treading that path. (So) why should a man grieve?
data.anv: गच्छन्तम् while passing, सार्थम् caravan, (कच्चित्) पथि on the wayside, स्थितः standing, अहमपि I also, भवताम् your, पृष्ठतः behind, आगमिष्यामि I am coming, इति thus, यथा as, ब्रूयात् one may say, एवम् in this way, पूर्वैः by ancestors, गतः taken, पितृपैतामहः folowed by fathers and forefathers, मार्गः the path, ध्रुवः is certain, यस्य whosoever, व्यतिक्रमः violation, नास्ति not possible, तम् that very road, आपन्नः following, कथम् why, शोचेत् should one grieve?

data.v: वयसः पतमानस्य स्रोतसो वानिवर्तिनः । आत्मा सुखे नियोक्तव्यः सुखभाजः प्रजाः स्मृताः ।।
data.es: Like the flow of water which never reverts to its source, age passes. Therefore, a man must employ his self in righteous acts that bring him happiness. By doing so, it is said, people will always be happy.
data.anv: स्रोतसो वा like the flow, अनिवर्तिनः never returns, वयसः of age, पतमानस्य while declining, आत्मा mind, सुखे in happiness (in the righteous act as source of hapiness),  नियोक्तव्यः is to be established, प्रजाः people, सुखभाजः tend to be happy, स्मृताः it is said.

data.v: धर्मात्मा स शुभैः कृत्स्नैः क्रतुभिश्चाप्तदक्षिणैः । धूतपापो गतः स्वर्गं पिता नः पृथिवीपतिः ।।
data.es: Our righteous father and lord of the earth, Dasaratha, attained heaven by giving abundant charities and performing several sacrifices in accordance with tradition.
data.anv: न: our, पिता father, धर्मात्मा righteous one, स: पृथिवीपतिः that lord of the earth, दशरथ: Dasratha, शुभैः by auspicious, कृत्स्नैः wholly, आप्तदक्षिणैः by offering charities, क्रतुभिः by performing sacrifices, स्वर्गं to heaven, गतः went.

data.v: भृत्यानां भरणात्सम्यक्प्रजानां परिपालनात् । अर्थादानाच्च धार्मेण पिता नस्त्रिदिवं गतः ।।
data.es: Our father nourished his dependents, splendidly governed his subjects and accepted wealth through righteous ways. Because of these pious acts, he could go to heaven.
data.anv: नः our, पिता father, भृत्यानाम् of dependents, भरणात् by nourishing, सम्यक् splendidly, प्रजानाम् subjects, परिपालनात् by governing, धर्मेण in righteous ways, अर्थानाम् of the wealth, आदानात् accepting, त्रिदिवम् heaven, गतः went.

data.v: इष्ट्वा बहुविधैर्यज्ञैर्भोगांश्चावाप्य पुष्कलान् । उत्तमं चायुरासाद्य स्वर्गतः पृथिवीपतिः ।।
data.es: King Dasaratha, lord of the earth, having performed various kinds of sacrifices and securing a long life, enjoyed abundance of pleasures and attained heaven.
data.anv: पृथिवीपतिः lord of the earth, बहुविधैः by several kinds of, यज्ञैः with sacrifices, इष्ट्वा having performed, पुष्कलान् abundance of, भोगान् pleasures, अवाप्य च having enjoyed, उत्तमम् excellent, आयुश्च life also, आसाद्य having obtained , स्वर्गतः went to heaven.

data.v: स जीर्णं मानुषं देहं परित्यज्य पिता हि नः । दैवीमृद्धिमनुप्राप्तो ब्रह्मलोकविहारिणीम् ।।
data.es: Our father, king Dasaratha, abandoned the wornout mortal body, and obtained divine prosperity of wandering in the world of Brahma.
data.anv: नः our, पिता father, सः king Dasaratha, जीर्णम् wornout, मानुषं देहम् mortal body, परित्यज्य  having abandoned, ब्रह्मलोकविहारिणीम् wandering in the world of Brahma, दैवीम् divine,  ऋद्धिम् treasure, अनुप्राप्तः हि obtained.

data.v: तं तु नैवं विधः कश्चित्प्राज्ञः शोचितुमर्हति । त्वद्विधो यद्विधश्चापि श्रुतवान्बुद्धिमत्तरः ।।
data.es: No one like you or me should ever mourn about this highly sagacious and learned king who was proficient in scriptural knowledge.
data.anv: श्रुतवान् proficient in scriptural knowledge, बुद्धिमत्तरः highly sagacious, एवंविधः like this, प्राज्ञः learned man, कश्चित् none, तत्विध: like you, मद्विधश्चापि like me, तम् about him, शोचितुम् to mourn, नार्हति not proper.

data.v: एते बहुविधाः शोका विलाप रुदिते तथा । वर्जनीया हि धीरेण सर्वावस्थासु धीमता ।।
data.es: A wise man, holding on to his fortitude in all circumstances, should avoid such occasions of grief, these words of lamentation and this crying.
data.anv: धीरेण courageously, धीमता by a wise man, बहुविधाः different, एते these, शोकाः griefs, तथा also, विलापरुदिते words of lamentation and this crying, सर्वावस्थासु in all circumstances, वर्जनीयाः हि should be avoided.

data.v: स स्वस्थो भव मा शोचो यात्वा चावस तां पुरीम् । तथा पित्रा नियुक्तोऽसि वशिना वदताम्व्वर ।।
data.es: O foremost of the eloquent, compose yourself. Do not grieve. Return to the city (Ayodhya) and reside there. You have been commanded so by our father who was a man of selfcontrol.
data.anv: वदताम् वर the foremost of the eloquent, सः that you, स्वस्थः भव compose yourself, शोचेः  in grief, मा not, यात्वा having returned, तां पुरीम् to that city (Ayodhya), आवस reside, वशिना  by a man of selfcontrol, पित्रा by father, तथा like that, नियुक्तः असि you have been commanded.

data.v: यत्राहमपि तेनैव नियुक्तः पुण्यकर्मणा । तत्रैवाहं करिष्यामि पितुरार्यस्य शासनम् ।।
data.es: I shall also stick to the command of our noble father who was a man of sacred deeds.
data.anv: अहमपि I also, पुण्यकर्मणा by a man of sacred deeds, तेनैव by him (king Dasaratha), यत्र  wherever one, नियुक्तः have been commanded, तत्रैव that one only, आर्यस्य noble, पितुः father's, शासनम् order, करिष्यामि shall do.

data.v: न मया शासनं तस्य त्यक्तुं न्याय्यमरिंदम । तत्त्वयापि सदा मान्यं स वै बन्धुः स नः पिता ।।
data.es: O subduer of enemies, I cannot violate the order of the king. You also must respect it for he is our father and friend indeed.
data.anv: अरिन्दम O subduer of enemies, मया by me, तस्य his, शासनम् order, त्यक्तुम् to discard, न न्याय्यम् is not proper, त्वयापि by you also, तत् that one, सदा always, मान्यम् to be respected, सः he, नः for us, बन्धुः वै relation indeed, सः he, पिता father.

data.v: एवमुक्त्वा तु विरते रामे वचनमर्थवत् । उवाच भरतश्चित्रं धार्मिको धार्मिकं वचः ।।
data.es: Rama remained silent after saying these meaningful words on the bank of river Mandakini. Then the Bharata, conforming to righteousness, replied in clear words to the virtuous Rama who was affectionate by nature.
data.anv: रामे when Rama, एवम् in this way, अर्थवत् meaningful, वचनम् words, उक्त्वा having uttered, विरते had rested, ततः then, धार्मिकः righteous one, भरतः Bharata, मन्दाकिनी river Mandakini, तीरे on the bank, प्रकृतिवत्सलम् affectionate by nature, धार्मिकम् virtuous, रामम् Rama, धार्मिकम् conforming to righteouness, चित्रम् clear, वचः words, उवाच said.

data.v: को हि स्यादीदृशो लोके यादृशस्त्वमरिंदम । न त्वां प्रव्यथयेद्दुःखं प्रीतिर्वा न प्रहर्षयेत् ।।
data.es: O subduer of enemies, you are of such nature that neither sorrow pains you nor pleasure delights you. There are none in this world like you. You are loved by the elders, for you seek their counsel whenever you have doubts.
data.anv: अरिन्दम O subduer of enemies (Rama), त्वम् you, यादृशः of such nature, ईदृशः of such person, लोके in the world, कोहि स्यात् who he may be, त्वाम् you, दुःखम् sarrow, न प्रव्यथयेत् does not pain, प्रीतिः pleasure, न वा प्रहर्षयेत् does not delight, वृद्धानाम् for the elders, सम्मतः असि beloved,  तांश्च them, संशयान् doubts, पृच्छसि ask them.

data.v: संमतश्चासि वृद्धानां तांश्च पृच्छसि संशयान् । यथा मृतस्तथा जीवन्यथासति तथा सति ।।
यस्यैष बुद्धिलाभः स्यात्परितप्येत केन सः । स एवं व्यसनं प्राप्य न विषीदितुमर्हति ।।
data.es: O lord of men, it is not proper for a person like you who knows the past and the future of human beings to feel distressed and lament over it.
data.anv: मनुजाधिप O lord of men, यः who  त्वं यथा like you, परावरज्ञः knower of past and future, सः that person, एव this, व्यसनम् distress, प्राप्य having obtained, विषीदितुं to lament, न अर्हति is not proper.

data.v: अमरोपमसत्त्वस्त्वं महात्मा सत्यसंगरः । सर्वज्ञः सर्वदर्शी च बुद्धिमांश्चासि राघव ।।
data.es: O magnanimous Rama, your nature is divine and you are true to your promises. You are omniscient, allseeing and wise.
data.anv: राघव Rama, महात्मा the magnanimous one, त्वम् you, अमरोपमसत्त्वः resemble gods in nature, सत्यसङ्गरः true to your promis, सर्वज्ञः allknowing, सर्वदर्शी च allseeing, बुद्धिमांश्च असि you are a man of wisdom.

data.v: न त्वामेवं गुणैर्युक्तं प्रभवाभवकोविदम् । अविषह्यतमं दुःखमासादयितुमर्हति ।।
data.es: It is not proper for a virtuous man like you, who is cognizant in matters of life and death, to be overwhelmed by such insufferable grief.
data.anv: एवं गुणैः by such virtues, युक्तम् endowed with, प्रभवाभवकोविदम् cognizant of life and death, त्वाम् you, अविषह्यतमम् insufferable, दुःखम् grief, आसादयितुम् to reach, नार्हति not proper.

data.v: प्रोषिते मयि यत्पापं मात्रा मत्कारणात्कृतम् । क्षुद्रया तदनिष्टं मे प्रसीदतु भवान्मम ।।
data.es: When I was away from home, my meanminded mother committed a sin for my sake which I never wished. You may pardon me graciously.
data.anv: मयि me, प्रोषिते when I was away from home, क्षुद्रया by the meanminded, मात्रा by mother, मत्कारणात् for my sake, यत् पापम् which sin, कृतम् has been committed, तत् that one, मे to me, अनिष्टम् that disagreeable act, भवान् you, मम me, प्रसीदतु graciously pardon.

data.v: धर्मबन्धेन बद्धोऽस्मि तेनेमां नेह मातरम् । हन्मि तीव्रेण दण्डेन दण्डार्हां पापकारिणीम् ।।
data.es: I am bound by a bond of righteousness for which I am unble to slay my mother who deserves severe punishment for her sinful acts.
data.anv: धर्मबन्धेन by a bond of righteousness, बद्धः अस्मि I am bound, तेन for that reason, इह now, दण्डार्हाम् deserving punishment, पापकारिणीम् doing sinful acts, इमां मातरम् this mother, तीव्रेण severe, दण्डेन punishment, न हन्मि do not slay.

data.v: कथं दशरथाज्जातः शुद्धाभिजनकर्मणः । जानन्धर्ममधर्मिष्ठं कुर्यां कर्म जुगुप्सितम् ।।
data.es: How shall I, born to Dasaratha of noble race and righteous deeds, with the knowledge of dharma, do such a reprehensible and unrighteous deed?
data.anv: शुद्धाभिजनकर्मणः of noble race and righteous deeds, दशरथात् from Dasaratha, जातः born of, धर्मम् righteousness, जानन् knowing, अधर्मिष्ठम् unrighteous, जुगुप्सितम् reprehensible, कर्म deed, कथम् how, कुर्याम् shall I do?.

data.v: गुरुः क्रियावान्वृद्धश्च राजा प्रेतः पितेति च । तातं न परिगर्हेयं दैवतं चेति संसदि ।।
data.es: King Dasaratha, my father and preceptor, is godlike to me. Devoted to meritorious acts, he departed from this world in his old age. For this reason, I cannot reproach him (publicly) in this assembly (of men).
data.anv: गुरुः preceptor, क्रियावान् one who is devoted to meritorious acts, वृद्धश्च old, राजा king, प्रेतः departed soul, पिता father, इति च for this, दैवतं चेति as a god, संसदि in the assembly, तातम् father, न परिगर्हेयम् I cannot reproach.

data.v: को हि धर्मार्थयोर्हीनमीदृशं कर्म किल्बिषम् । स्त्रियाः प्रियचिकीर्षुः सन्कुर्याद्धर्मज्ञ धर्मवित् ।।
data.es: O Rama, conversant with righteousness, will any one who knows the meaning of righteousness, do such a sinful act contrary to dharma and artha to please a woman?
data.anv: धर्मज्ञ O knower of ways of righteousness, धर्मवित् knower of righeousness, को हि who indeed, स्त्रियाः for the sake of a women, प्रियम् pleasure, चिकीर्षुः सन् desirous of doing, धर्मार्थयोः for dharma and artha, हीनम् bereft of, किल्बिषम् sinful, ईदृशम् this kind of, कर्म act, कुर्यात् will do?

data.v: अन्तकाले हि भूतानि मुह्यन्तीति पुराश्रुतिः । राज्ञैवं कुर्वता लोके प्रत्यक्षा सा श्रुतिः कृता ।।
data.es: There is an ancient saying that at the time of death, the intellect of people is deluded. By conducting himself in this way, king Dasaratha has proved it.
data.anv: भूतानि living beings, अन्तकाले at the time of death, मुह्यन्ति are deluded, इति thus, पुराश्रुतिः ancient saying, एवम् in this way, कुर्वता by doing, राज्ञा by the king, सा श्रुतिः that adage, लोके in this world, प्रत्यक्षं explicitly, कृता has been made.

data.v: साध्वर्थमभिसंधाय क्रोधान्मोहाच्च साहसात् । तातस्य यदतिक्रान्तं प्रत्याहरतु तद्भवान् ।।
data.es: Our father has trangressed righteousness due to anger or delusion or recklessness. Therefore, you may think over the matter prudently and set it right.
data.anv: क्रोधात् due to anger, मोहात् due to delusion, साहसात् due to a spirit of adventure, तातस्य father's, यत् अतिक्रान्तम् whichever trangression, तत् that, भवान् you, साधु prudently, अर्थम् meaning, अभिसन्धाय having thought over, प्रत्याहरतु will set it right.

data.v: पितुर्हि समतिक्रान्तं पुत्रो यः साधु मन्यते । तदपत्यं मतं लोके विपरीतमतोऽन्यथा ।।
data.es: One who sets right the wrongs done by his father is a true son. Otherwise the son becomes just the opposite. (He is not a son to the father).
data.anv: यः पुत्रः that son, पितुः father's, समतिक्रान्तम् transgressions, साधु as right, मन्यते sets, तत् that son, लोके in the world, अपत्यम् as son, मतम् is considered, अतः for this, अन्यथा contrary happens, विपरीतम् reverse is so.

data.v: तदपत्यं भवानस्तु मा भवान्दुष्कृतं पितुः । अभिपत्तत्कृतं कर्म लोके धीरविगर्हितम् ।।
data.es: So be a worthy son and let not the sinful act committed by our father and condemned by men of wisdom be approved by you.
data.anv: भवान् you, तत् अपत्यम् अस्तु be such a son, लोके in this world, धीरविगर्हितम् condemned by men of wisdom, दुष्कृतम् sinful, पितुः father's, कृतम् committed, कर्म act, भवान् you, अभिपत्ता an approver, मास्तु let not become.

data.v: कैकेयीं मां च तातं च सुहृदो बान्धवांश्च नः । पौरजानपदान्सर्वांस्त्रातु सर्वमिदं भवान् ।।
data.es: Protect this entire kingdom, Kaikeyi, me and father, our friends and relations, citizens of the city and inhabitants of the countryside.
data.anv: भवान् you, कैकेयीम् Kaikeyi, मां च me, तातं च father also, नः our, सुहृदः friends, बान्धवांश्च  relations, सर्वान् all, पौरजानपदान् inhabitants of the city and countryside, सर्वम् entire, इदम् this kingodm, त्रातु protect.

data.v: क्व चारण्यं क्व च क्षात्रं क्व जटाः क्व च पालनम् । ईदृशं व्याहतं कर्म न भवान्कर्तुमर्हति ।।
data.es: Where is the forest and where is kshatriya's duty? Where are matted locks and where is governance of the kingdom? It does not behave you to do such acts antithetical to each other.
data.anv: अरण्यं च the forest, क्व where, क्षात्रं च kshatriya'a duty, क्व where, जटाः matted locks, क्व where, पालनं च governance of the kingdom, क्व where, भवान् you, ईदृशम् such, व्याहतम् repulsive, कर्म act, कर्तुम् to do, न अर्हति not proper.

data.v: अथ क्लेशजमेव त्वं धर्मं चरितुमिच्छसि । धर्मेण चतुरो वर्णान्पालयन्क्लेशमाप्नुहि ।।
data.es: If you so desire to follow the path of dharma acquired out of physical exertion, then bear the trouble of governing the four castes of the social order righteously.
data.anv: अथ or, त्वम् you, क्लेशजम् born of physical exertion, धर्ममेव righteousness, चरितुम् to follow, इच्छसि यदि if you desire, चतुरः four, वर्णान् castes of social order, धर्मेण righteously, पालयन् governing, क्लेशम् exhaustion, आप्नुहि obtain.

data.v: चतुर्णामाश्रमाणां हि गार्हस्थ्यं श्रेष्ठमाश्रमम् । आहुर्धर्मज्ञ धर्मज्ञास्तं कथं त्यक्तुमर्हसि ।।
data.es: O Rama, you are the one who knows his duty. The knowers of dharma maintain that the life of a householder is the foremost among the four modes of life. How can you renounce it?
data.anv: धर्मज्ञ one who is cognizant of duty, गार्हस्थ्यम् life a of householder, चतुर्णाम् the four, आश्रमाणाम् among modes of life, श्रेष्ठम् foremost, आश्रमम् mode of life, धर्मज्ञाः knowers of dharma, प्राहुः हि say, तम्  that one, त्यक्तुम् to renounce, कथम् how, अर्हसि are entitled?

data.v: श्रुतेन बालः स्थानेन जन्मना भवतो ह्यहम् । स कथं पालयिष्यामि भूमिं भवति तिष्ठति ।।
data.es: Being younger to you in knowledge, position and birth, how can I rule the earth when you are present?
data.anv: अहम् I, श्रुतेन in knowledge, स्थानेन in position, जन्मना in birth, भवतः compared to you, बालः हि am younger, सः such me, भवति when you, तिष्ठति while living, भूमिम् the earth, कथम् how, पालयिष्यामि can I rule?

data.v: हीनबुद्धिगुणो बालो हीनः स्थानेन चाप्यहम् । भवता च विना भूतो न वर्तयितुमुत्सहे ।।
data.es: I am a child, deficient in intelligence and virtue and even inferior in position. Deserted by you, I do not wish to live.
data.anv: हीनबुद्धिगुणः deficient in intelligence and virtue, स्थानेन चापि even in position, हीनः low, बालः child, अहम् I, भवता by you, विनाभूतः deserted, वर्तयितुम् to live, न उत्सहे I  do not desire.

data.v: इदं निखिलमव्यग्रं पित्र्यं राज्यमकण्टकम् । अनुशाधि स्वधर्मेण धर्मज्ञ सह बान्धवैः ।।
data.es: O one, conversant with righteousness rule unhindered this entire kingdom along with our relations inherited from our father.
data.anv: धर्मज्ञ O one, conversant with righteousness, पित्य्रम् relating to our father, निखिलम् entire, इदं राज्यम् this kingdom, अव्यग्रम् quietly, अकण्टकम् without hindrance बान्धवैस्सह with the relations, स्वधर्मेण in accordance with your duty, अनुशाधि rule .

data.v: इहैव त्वाभिषिञ्चन्तु धर्मज्ञ सह बान्धवैः । ऋत्विजः सवसिष्ठाश्च मन्त्रवन्मन्त्रकोविदाः ।।
data.es: Let all ministers, subjects, and priests including Vasistha who are wellversed in Vedic hymns consecrate you here itself.
data.anv: सर्वाः all, प्रकृतयः the subjects, सवसिष्ठाः including Vasistha, मन्त्रकोविदाः wellversed in the Vedic hymns, ऋत्विजश्च priests also, सह along with, त्वा you, इहैव here itself, मन्त्रवत् with sacred texts अभिषिञ्चन्तु may consecrate.

data.v: अभिषिक्तस्त्वमस्माभिरयोध्यां पालने व्रज । विजित्य तरसा लोकान्मरुद्भिरिव वासवः ।।
data.es: After consecration, you too return to rule Ayodhya along with all of us like Indra who went back (to heaven), accompanied by Maruts after conquering all the worlds with his prowess.
data.anv: त्वम् you, अभिषिक्तः being consecrated, अस्माभिः along with us, पालने to govern, तरसा with vigour, लोकान् all the worlds, विजित्य having conquered, वासवः Indra, मरुद्भिरिव like Indra with Maruts, अयोध्याम् to Ayodhya, व्रज return.

data.v: ऋणानि त्रीण्यपाकुर्वन्दुर्हृदः साधु निर्दहन् । सुहृदस्तर्पयन्कामैस्त्वमेवात्रानुशाधि माम् ।।
data.es: Discharging completely the three debts, to gods, to ancestors and to sages, subduing your enemies and gratifying your friends, you alone (have the right) to dictate me.
data.anv: त्रीणि three, ऋणानि debts, अपाकुर्वन् discharging, दुर्हृदः enemies, साधु completely, निर्धहन्  subduing, सुहृदः friends, कामैः with desires, तर्पयन् gratifying, अत्र in Ayodhya, त्वमेव you alone, माम् me, अनुशाधि rule.

data.v: अद्यार्य मुदिताः सन्तु सुहृदस्तेऽभिषेचने । अद्य भीताः पालयन्तां दुर्हृदस्ते दिशो दश ।।
data.es: O my esteemed brother let all your friends be delighted today at your enthronement and your enemies flee in terror in ten different directions.
data.anv: आर्य O esteemed one, अद्य now, अभिषेचने at enthronement, ते your, सुहृदः friends, मुदिताः सन्तु let them be delighted, अद्य today, ते दुर्हृदः your enemies, भीताः frightened, दश दिशः in ten different directions, पलायन्ताम् will run away.

data.v: आक्रोशं मम मातुश्च प्रमृज्य पुरुषर्षभ । अद्य तत्र भवन्तं च पितरं रक्ष किल्बिषात् ।।
data.es: O best of men, wiping out all the censure on my mother, redeem our revered father from sin.
data.anv: पुरुषर्षभ O best of men, अद्य now, मम my, मातुः mother's, आक्रोशम् censure, प्रमृज्य wiping away, तत्र भवन्तम् revered one, पितरं च father also, किल्बिषात् from sin, रक्ष protect.

data.v: शिरसा त्वाभियाचेऽहं कुरुष्व करुणां मयि । बान्धवेषु च सर्वेषु भूतेष्विव महेश्वरः ।।
data.es: I beseech you with my head bowed low, show mercy on me and every one of our relations, like Maheswara showing compassion on all living beings.
data.anv: अहम् I, शिरसा with my head bowed low, त्वा you, अभियाचे beseech, मयि in me, सर्वेषु every one of, बान्धवेषु relations, भूतेषु in all living beings, महेश्वरः इव like Maheswara, करुणाम् compassion, कुरुष्व do.

data.v: अथ वा पृष्ठतः कृत्वा वनमेव भवानितः । गमिष्यति गमिष्यामि भवता सार्धमप्यहम् ।।
data.es: If you turn your back on my solicitations and set out for the forest I shall also go along with you from here itself.
data.anv: अथ or, भवान् you, एतत् all these solicitations, पृष्ठतः कृत्वा keeping back, इतः from here, वनमेव to the forest itself, गमिष्यति if you set out, अहमपि I also, भवता सार्धम् along with you, गमिष्यामि I shall go.

data.v: तथापि रामो भरतेन ताम्यत; प्रसाद्यमानः शिरसा महीपतिः । न चैव चक्रे गमनाय सत्त्ववा;न्मतिं पितुस्तद्वचने प्रतिष्ठितः ।।
data.es: Thus besought and propitiated by Bharata with his head bowed low and distressed, the virtuous lord of the world, Rama, firmly established in the words of his father, resolved not to go back to Ayodhya.
data.anv: ताम्यता by the distressed, भरतेन by Bharata, तथा in that way, शिरसा with head bowed low, प्रसाद्यमानः propitiated, महीपतिः lord of the earth, सत्त्ववान् virtuous, रामः Rama, पितुः father's, तद्वचने in the words (of his father), प्रतिष्ठितः established, गमनाय to go back, मतिम् resolve, न चक्रे did not make.

data.v: तदद्भुतं स्थैर्यमवेक्ष्य राघवे; समं जनो हर्षमवाप दुःखितः । न यात्ययोध्यामिति दुःखितोऽभव;त्स्थिरप्रतिज्ञत्वमवेक्ष्य हर्षितः ।।
data.es: Having seen the wonderful deternmination of Rama, people were, at once, anguished and delighted, anguished because he would not return to Ayodhya, and delighted because he was firm in his resolve.
data.anv: राघवे in Rama, अद्भुतम् that wonderful, तत् स्थैर्यम् that determination, अवेक्ष्य having seen, जनः all men, दुःखितः anguished, समम् simultaneously, हर्षम् delight, अवाप obtained, अयोध्याम् to Ayodhya, न याति will not go, इति thus, दुःखितः अभवत् were grieved, स्थिरप्रतिज्ञत्वम् firmness of resolve, अवेक्ष्य having seen, हर्षितः were delighted.

data.v: तमृत्विजो नैगमयूथवल्लभा;स्तथा विसंज्ञाश्रुकलाश्च मातरः । तथा ब्रुवाणं भरतं प्रतुष्टुवुः; प्रणम्य रामं च ययाचिरे सह ।।
data.es: All the priests, the chiefs of merchant organizations and mothers who had their senses switched off and theif tears drained dry extolled Bharata for his words. All of them, reverentially saluting Rama, implored him.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये अयोध्याकाण्डे षडुत्तरशततमस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the one hundredsixth sarga in Ayodhyakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: ऋत्विजः the priests, नैगमयूथवल्लभाः the chiefs of merchant organizations, विसंज्ञाश्रुकलाः    with senses switched off and tears drained dry, मातरः mothers, तदा then, तथा in that way, ब्रुवाणम् speaking, तं भरतम् that Bharata, प्रतुष्टुवुः extolled, रामम् to Rama, प्रणम्य   reverentially saluting, सह together, ययाचिरे च implored.

data.v: पुनरेवं ब्रुवाणं तु भरतं लक्ष्मणाग्रजः । प्रत्युवच ततः श्रीमाञ्ज्ञातिमध्येऽतिसत्कृतः ।।
data.es: Wellhonoured in the midst of relatives, the celebrated Rama, elder brother of Lakshmana, then said to Bharata who was going to speak again.
data.anv: ततः then, श्रीमान् prosperous, अभिसत्कृतः wellhonoured, लक्ष्मणाग्रजः Lakshmana's elder brother, ज्ञातिमध्ये amidst his relatives, पुनः again, एवम् thus, ब्रुवाणम् speaking, भरतम् to Bharata, प्रत्युवाच replied.

data.v: उपपन्नमिदं वाक्यं यत्त्वमेवमभाषथाः । जातः पुत्रो दशरथात्कैकेय्यां राजसत्तमात् ।।
data.es: Appropriate are the words spoken by you born to the celebrated king Dasaratha through Kaikeyi.
data.anv: राजसत्तमात् from the celebrated king, दशरथात् from Dasaratha, कैकेय्याम् to Kaikeyi, जातः born, पुत्रः son, त्वम् you, एवम् in this way, यत् which, अभ्यभाषथाः has spoken, इदम् this, वाक्यम् words, उपपन्नम् is appropriate.

data.v: पुरा भ्रातः पिता नः स मातरं ते समुद्वहन् । मातामहे समाश्रौषीद्राज्यशुल्कमनुत्तमम् ।।
data.es: Earlier when our father was to wed your mother, O dear brother, he had promised to your maternal grandfather that he would confer (on her) a kingdom with good revenue.
data.anv: भ्रातः my dear brother, पुरा earlier, सः that, नः पिता our father, ते मातरम् to your mother, समुद्वहन् at the time of wedding, मातामहे to (your) maternal grandfather, अनुत्तमम्  the best, राज्यशुल्कम् kingdom with good revenue, समाश्रौषीत् had promised.

data.v: देवासुरे च संग्रामे जनन्यै तव पार्थिवः । संप्रहृष्टो ददौ राजा वरमाराधितः प्रभुः ।।
data.es: Thereafter in the battle between gods and demons, the able king (Dasaratha) pleased (with your mother) granted her a boon (as a token of gratitude).
data.anv: पार्थिवः king, प्रभुः lord, राजा king (Dasaratha), दैवासुरे between gods and demons, सङ्ग्रामे in the battle, आराधितः being propitialed, सम्प्रहृष्टः exceedingly pleased, तव जनन्यै to your mother, वरं च boon, ददौ granted.

data.v: ततः सा संप्रतिश्राव्य तव माता यशस्विनी । अयाचत नरश्रेष्ठं द्वौ वरौ वरवर्णिनी ।।
data.es: Thereafter, O tiger among men, your illustrious mother of fair complexion, under oath demanded of that best of men, king Dasaratha, the two boons, namely kingdom for you and banishment for me. Bound by such agreement (oath), the king granted her the boons.
data.anv: नरव्याघ्र O tiger among men, ततः thereafter, यशस्विनी illustrious, वरवर्णिनी of best (fair) complexion, तव माता your mother, सम्प्रतिश्राव्य making him promise, नरश्रेष्ठम् to best of men, तव for you, राज्यम् kingdom, तथा likewise, मम to me, प्रव्राजनम् banishment, द्वौ two, वरौ boons, अयाचत demanded, तदा then, राजा च king also, नियुक्तः bound by agreement, तौ वरौ those two boons, तस्यै for her, प्रददौ granted.

data.v: तव राज्यं नरव्याघ्र मम प्रव्राजनं तथा । तच्च राजा तथा तस्यै नियुक्तः प्रददौ वरम् ।।
data.es: Thereafter, O tiger among men, your illustrious mother of fair complexion, under oath demanded of that best of men, king Dasaratha, the two boons, namely kingdom for you and banishment for me. Bound by such agreement (oath), the king granted her the boons.
data.anv: नरव्याघ्र O tiger among men, ततः thereafter, यशस्विनी illustrious, वरवर्णिनी of best (fair) complexion, तव माता your mother, सम्प्रतिश्राव्य making him promise, नरश्रेष्ठम् to best of men, तव for you, राज्यम् kingdom, तथा likewise, मम to me, प्रव्राजनम् banishment, द्वौ two, वरौ boons, अयाचत demanded, तदा then, राजा च king also, नियुक्तः bound by agreement, तौ वरौ those two boons, तस्यै for her, प्रददौ granted.

data.v: तेन पित्राहमप्यत्र नियुक्तः पुरुषर्षभ । चतुर्दश वने वासं वर्षाणि वरदानिकम् ।।
data.es: I am going to the forest to live there for fourteen years. Bring me two things: a basket and a crowbar.
data.anv: पुरुषर्षभ O best of men, तेन that is why, पित्रा by father, अहमपि even I also, वरदानिकम् as per the boon, चतुर्दश वर्षाणि fourteen years, अत्र here, वने in the forest, वासम् to dwell, नियुक्तः have been ordered.

data.v: सोऽहं वनमिदं प्राप्तो निर्जनं लक्ष्मणान्वितः । शीतया चाप्रतिद्वन्द्वः सत्यवादे स्थितः पितुः ।।
data.es: I have come to this lonely forest accompanied by Lakshmana and Sita, bent upon upholding the truth of our unrivalled father's words.
data.anv: अहम् I, लक्ष्मणान्वितः accompanied by Lakshmana, अप्रतिद्वन्द्वः unrivalled, पितुः father's, सत्यवादे truthfulness of words, स्थितः bent upon, सीतया च with Sita, निर्जनम् lonely, इदं वनम् this forest, प्राप्तः I have come.

data.v: भवानपि तथेत्येव पितरं सत्यवादिनम् । कर्तुमर्हति राजेन्द्रं क्षिप्रमेवाभिषेचनात् ।।
data.es: O Indra among kings, let your coronation be performed without delay since you are worthy and at the same time the truthfulness of our father's words be honoured.
data.anv: राजेन्द्र O Indra among kings, भवानपि you also, तथेत्येव likewise, क्षिप्रमेव quickly, अभिषेचनात् by coronation, पितरम् father, सत्यवादिनम् true to his word, कर्तुम् to do, अर्हति should.

data.v: ऋणान्मोचय राजानं मत्कृते भरत प्रभुम् । पितरं त्राहि धर्मज्ञ मातरं चाभिनन्दय ।।
data.es: O Bharata, release for my sake the competent king from his debt (of vow) and honour the righteous father and the mother as well.
data.anv: भरत O Bharata, मत्कृते for my sake, प्रभुम् competent, राजानम् king, ऋणात् from his debt (vow), मोचय redeem, धर्मज्ञम् one who knows righteousness, पितरम् चापि father also, मातरं च and mother, अभिनन्दय honour.

data.v: श्रूयते हि पुरा तात श्रुतिर्गीता यशस्विनी । गयेन यजमानेन गयेष्वेव पितॄन्प्रति ।।
data.es: Dear (brother), it is heard that long ago an illustrious king while performing a sacrifice intended for ancestors at a sacred place known as Gaya, the sacrificer Gaya chanted a Vedic hymn as follows:
data.anv: तात dear (brother), पुरा formerly, गयेष्वेव at a place known as Gaya, पितॄन् प्रति intended for ancestors, यजमानेन performing sacrifice, यशस्विना by an illustrious one, गयेन by Gaya, गीता chanted, श्रुतिः Vedic hymn, श्रूयते हि is heard.

data.v: पुं नाम्ना नरकाद्यस्मात्पितरं त्रायते सुतः । तस्मात्पुत्र इति प्रोक्तः पितॄन्यत्पाति वा सुतः ।।
data.es: Putra is so called as he delivers his father from a hell known as Put and protects the ancestors in all possible ways.
data.anv: यस्मात् since, सुतः son, पितरम् father, पुन्नाम्नः by name 'Put', नरकात् from hell, त्रायते delivers, तस्मात् for that reason, यः who, सर्वतः in everyway, पितॄन् ancestors, पाति protects, he, पुत्र: इति as putra, प्रोक्तः has been told.

data.v: एष्टव्या बहवः पुत्रा गुणवन्तो बहुश्रुताः । तेषां वै समवेतानामपि कश्चिद्गयां व्रजेत् ।।
data.es: One should desire many virtuous and learned sons so that at least one of them may go to Gaya (to perform the father's obsequies).
data.anv: गुणवन्तः virtuous, बहुश्रुताः learned, बहवः many, पुत्राः sons, एष्टव्याः are to be desired, समवेतानाम् together with, तेषाम् from among them, कश्चिदपि any one of them atleast, गयाम् to Gaya, व्रजेत् might go.

data.v: एवं राजर्षयः सर्वे प्रतीता राजनन्दन । तस्मात्त्राहि नरश्रेष्ठ पितरं नरकात्प्रभो ।।
data.es: O enhancer of the king's delight, O best of men rajarsis have decided this way. You may, therefore, O lord, protect your father against hell.
data.anv: राजनन्दन भो O enhancer of the king's delight, सर्वे all, राजर्षयः rajarsis, एवम् this way, प्रतीताः have decided, प्रभो O lord, नरश्रेष्ठ O best of men, तस्मात् therefore, पितरम् father, नरकात् against hell, त्राहि protect.

data.v: अयोध्यां गच्छ भरत प्रकृतीरनुरञ्जय । शत्रुघ्न सहितो वीर सह सर्वैर्द्विजातिभिः ।।
data.es: O valiant Bharata, go to Ayodhya accompanied by Satrughna and the twiceborn (brahmins) and keep the subjects delighted like pleased (with your rule).
data.anv: वीर O valiant one, भरत Bharata, शत्रुघ्नसहितः with Satrughna, सर्वैः all, द्विजातिभिः सह with the twiceborn (brahmins), अयोध्याम् to Ayodhya, गच्छ go, प्रकृतीः the subjects, अनुरञ्जय keep them delighted.

data.v: प्रवेक्ष्ये दण्डकारण्यमहमप्यविलम्बयन् । आभ्यां तु सहितो राजन्वैदेह्या लक्ष्मणेन च ।।
data.es: O king (Bharata) I shall also enter the Dandaka forest without delay in the company of only these two -- the princess from Videha (Sita) and Lakshmana.
data.anv: राजन् O king Bharata, अहमपि I also, अविलम्बयन् without delay, आभ्याम् of these two, वैदेह्या  with the princess from Videha (Sita), लक्ष्मणेन च and Lakshmana, सहितः in the company of, दण्डकारण्यम् Dandaka forest, प्रवेक्ष्ये shall enter.

data.v: त्वं राजा भव भरत स्वयं नराणां; वन्यानामहमपि राजराण्मृगाणाम् । गच्छ त्वं पुरवरमद्य संप्रहृष्टः; संहृष्टस्त्वहमपि दण्डकान्प्रवेक्ष्ये ।।
data.es: O Bharata, be the king of men. I shall also become the supreme king of the wild beasts in the forest. Go now happily to Ayodhya, the best of cities, and I shall enter Dandaka forest with delight.
data.anv: भरत O Bharata, त्वम् you, स्वयम् yourself, नराणाम् for men, राजा भव be king, अहमपि I also, वन्यानाम् of the wild  forest, मृगाणाम् of the beasts, राजराट् shall become supreme king, त्वम् you, सम्प्रम्हृष्टः in delight, अद्य now, पुरवरम् to the best of cities, गच्छ go, अहमपि and I also, संहृष्टः wellpleased, दण्डकान् in Dandaka forest, प्रवेक्ष्ये shall enter.

data.v: छायां ते दिनकरभाः प्रबाधमानं; वर्षत्रं भरत करोतु मूर्ध्नि शीताम् । एतेषामहमपि काननद्रुमाणां; छायां तामतिशयिनीं सुखं श्रयिष्ये ।।
data.es: Let an umbrella protect you against (scorching) sunshine and provide its cool shade over your head, O Bharata As for me, I shall happily seek the shade of these dense woodland trees.
data.anv: भरत O Bharata, वर्षत्रम् an umbrella, दिनकरभाः the sunshine, प्रबाधमानाम् repelling, ते मूर्ध्नि  over your head, शीताम् cool, छायाम् shade, करोतु let it provide, अहमपि I also, सुखी one with happiness, एतेषाम् these, काननद्रुमाणाम् woodland trees, अतिशयिनीम् dense, ताम् in that, छायाम् shade, श्रयिष्ये shall take refuge.

data.v: शत्रुघ्नः कुशलमतिस्तु ते सहायः; सौमित्रिर्मम विदितः प्रधानमित्रम् । चत्वारस्तनयवरा वयं नरेन्द्रं; सत्यस्थं भरत चराम मा विषादम् ।।
data.es: O Bharata, intelligent Satrughna will be your support and son of Sumitra (Lakshmana) as is wellknown will remain my best friend. All four of us, worthy sons of Dasaratha, shall follow the path of truth of our father. इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये अयोध्याकाण्डे सप्तोत्तरशततमस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the one hundredseventh sarga in Ayodhyakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: भरत Bharata, कुशलमतिः intelligent, शत्रुघ्नः Satrughna, ते to you, सहायः assistance, सौमित्रिः son of Sumitra (Lakshmana), मम for me, प्रधानमित्रम् as my chief friend, विदितः is wellknown, तनयवराः worthy sons, वयम् all of us, चत्वारः four, नरेन्द्रम् to Indra among men (king Dasaratha), सत्यस्थम् as one, established in truth, चराम we shall move, मा विषीद do not grieve.

data.v: आश्वासयन्तं भरतं जाबालिर्ब्राह्मणोत्तमः । उवाच रामं धर्मज्ञं धर्मापेतमिदं वचः ।।
data.es: While Rama, conversant with dharma, was consoling Bharata, Jabali an eminent brahmin addressed him in words contrary to righteousness.
data.anv: ब्राह्मणोत्तमः the most virtuous brahmin, जाबालिः Jabali, भरतम् to Bharata, आश्वासयन्तम् consoling (convincing), धर्मज्ञम् cognizant of duty, रामम् to Rama, धर्मापेतम् deviating from  righteousness, इदम् this, वचः words, उवाच said.

data.v: साधु राघव मा भूत्ते बुद्धिरेवं निरर्थका । प्राकृतस्य नरस्येव आर्य बुद्धेस्तपस्विनः ।।
data.es: Very well, O scion of the Raghu race, you are nobleminded and highsouled. You, like a common man, must not entertain such nonsensical thought.
data.anv: राघव O scion of the Raghu race (Rama), साधु very well, आर्यबुद्धेः of a nobleminded one, मनस्विनः highminded one, ते you, प्राकृतस्य नरस्येव like a common man, एवम् in that way, निरर्थिका nonsensical, बुद्धि: thought, माऽभूत् let there not be.

data.v: कः कस्य पुरुषो बन्धुः किमाप्यं कस्य केनचित् । यदेको जायते जन्तुरेक एव विनश्यति ।।
data.es: Who is whose friend? who is to get what and from whom? Man is born alone and will die alone.
data.anv: कः पुरषः which man, कस्य to whom, बन्धु: relation, कस्य to whom, केनचित् from any one, किम् what, आप्यम् is to be obtained, यत् for the reason, जन्तुः a creature, एकः alone, जायते is born, एक एव alone, विनश्यति dies.

data.v: तस्मान्माता पिता चेति राम सज्जेत यो नरः । उन्मत्त इव स ज्ञेयो नास्ति काचिद्धि कस्यचित् ।।
data.es: O Rama one who establishes relationship by saying, 'She is my mother he is my father' is to be regarded as a lunatic. In fact, no one belongs to any one.
data.anv: राम O Rama, तस्मात् therefore, यः नरः a man, माता as mother, पिता चेति as father, सज्जेत is attached, सः he, उन्मत्त इव like a madman, सः ज्ञेयः is to be regarded, कश्चित् any one,  कस्य चित् to any one, नास्ति हि is nonexistent.

data.v: यथा ग्रामान्तरं गच्छन्नरः कश्चित्क्वचिद्वसेत् । उत्सृज्य च तमावासं प्रतिष्ठेतापरेऽहनि ।।
data.es: A man who goes from one village to another takes rest somewhere on the way and the next day leaves the place and proceeds on his journey. Similarly, father, mother, home and wealth are restingplaces to a man. The wise do not get attached to them, O descendant the Kakutsthas
data.anv: काकुत्स्थ O Rama, ग्रामान्तरम् from one village to another, गच्छन् while going, कश्चित् नरः a certain man, यथा as, क्वचित् somewhere, वसेत् may rest, तम् आवासम् that place of rest, उत्सृज्य leaving, अपरे on the next, अहनि day, प्रतिष्ठेत may proceed, एवमेव in the same way, मनुष्याणाम् to men, पिता father, माता mother, गृहम् home, वसु wealth, अवासमात्रम् resting places only, अत्र in this matter, सज्जनाः wise people, न सज्जन्ते are not attached to them.

data.v: एवमेव मनुष्याणां पिता माता गृहं वसु । आवासमात्रं काकुत्स्थ सज्जन्ते नात्र सज्जनाः ।।
data.es: A man who goes from one village to another takes rest somewhere on the way and the next day leaves the place and proceeds on his journey. Similarly, father, mother, home and wealth are restingplaces to a man. The wise do not get attached to them, O descendant the Kakutsthas
data.anv: काकुत्स्थ O Rama, ग्रामान्तरम् from one village to another, गच्छन् while going, कश्चित् नरः a certain man, यथा as, क्वचित् somewhere, वसेत् may rest, तम् आवासम् that place of rest, उत्सृज्य leaving, अपरे on the next, अहनि day, प्रतिष्ठेत may proceed, एवमेव in the same way, मनुष्याणाम् to men, पिता father, माता mother, गृहम् home, वसु wealth, अवासमात्रम् resting places only, अत्र in this matter, सज्जनाः wise people, न सज्जन्ते are not attached to them.

data.v: पित्र्यं राज्यं समुत्सृज्य स नार्हति नरोत्तम । आस्थातुं कापथं दुःखं विषमं बहुकण्टकम् ।।
data.es: O most virtuous of men, you ought not to abandon this patrimonial kingdom, adopt a course, which is painful, difficult and full of thorns (dangers). This (course) is unwise and unworthy of you.
data.anv: नरोत्तम O best of men, स: such as you, पित्य्रम् father's, राज्यम् kingdom, परित्यज्य abandoning, दुःखम् painful, विषमम् difficult, बहुकण्टकम् full of thorns, कापथम् unwise course, आस्थातुम् to adopt, नार्हसि should not.

data.v: समृद्धायामयोध्यायामात्मानमभिषेचय । एकवेणीधरा हि त्वां नगरी संप्रतीक्षते ।।
data.es: Go back to that prosperous city of Ayodhya and get yourself coronated. That city is a chaste woman wearing a single braid of hair awaiting you, her lord.
data.anv: समृद्धायाम् in a prosperous, अयोध्यायाम् in the city of Ayodhya, आत्मानम् yourself, अभिषेचय get coronated, नगरी that city, एकवेणीधरा wearing a single braid of hair, त्वाम् you, सम्प्रतीक्षते is awaiting.

data.v: राजभोगाननुभवन्महार्हान्पार्थिवात्मज । विहर त्वमयोध्यायां यथा शक्रस्त्रिविष्टपे ।।
data.es: O king's son, enjoy inestimable royal pleasures in the city of Ayodhya like Indra in heaven.
data.anv: पार्थिवात्मज O king's son, महार्हान् inestimable, राजभोगान् royal plesures, अनुभवन् enjoying, त्वम् you, शक्रः Indra, त्रिविष्ठपे यथा like in heaven, अयोध्यायाम् in Ayodhya, विहर enjoy.

data.v: न ते कश्चिद्दशरतःस्त्वं च तस्य न कश्चन । अन्यो राजा त्वमन्यश्च तस्मात्कुरु यदुच्यते ।।
data.es: Dasaratha was nobody to you and you are nobody to him. That king is one person and you are another. Therefore, do what I tell you. (It does not matter what you are to him and what he means to you).
data.anv: ते to you, दशरथः Dasaratha, कश्चित् न is nobody, त्वं च you also, तस्य to him, कश्चन  न nobody, सः राजा that king, अन्यः another person, त्वम् you, अन्यः another person, तस्मात् therefore, यत् what, उच्यते is being told, कुरु do.

data.v: गतः स नृपतिस्तत्र गन्तव्यं यत्र तेन वै । प्रवृत्तिरेषा मर्त्यानां त्वं तु मिथ्या विहन्यसे ।।
data.es: That king (Dasaratha) has gone to the place where he ought to go. Such is the nature of mortals. You are fruitlessly undergoing difficulties.
data.anv: सः that, नृपतिः king, तेन by him, यत्र wherever, गन्तव्यम् ought to go, तत्र there, गतः had gone, मर्त्यानाम् mortals', प्रवृत्ति: (destiny) nature, एषा such is, त्वं तु as for you, मिथ्या fruitlessly, विहन्यसे (undergoing difficulties).

data.v: अर्थधर्मपरा ये ये तांस्ताञ्शोचामि नेतरान् । ते हि दुःखमिह प्राप्य विनाशं प्रेत्य भेजिरे ।।
data.es: I prity those who yearn for dharma and artha and not for other things since those who have experienced adversities in this world (disregarding their own interest), will be ultimately destroyed any way by death.
data.anv: ये ये all those, अर्थधर्मपराः yearning for dharma and artha, तांस्तान् for all of them, शोचामि  feel sad, इतरान् for others, न not, ते they, इह in this world, दुःखम् sorrow, प्राप्य experiencing, प्रेत्य after death, विनाशम् destruction, भेजिरे had obtained (doubt).

data.v: अष्टका पितृदैवत्यमित्ययं प्रसृतो जनः । अन्नस्योपद्रवं पश्य मृतो हि किमशिष्यति ।।
data.es: People perform ashtaka ceremony for the spirits of ancestors and offer them food. Look at the amount of food being wasted. Will the dead (ever) eat food?
data.anv: अष्टका ashtaka ceremony, पितृदैवत्यम् इति the receivers are the spirits of ancestors, अयम्   जनः these people, प्रसृतः are engaged, अन्नस्य offering of food, उपद्रवम् wastage, पश्य look, मृतः the dead, किम् what, अशिष्यति will it eat?

data.v: यदि भुक्तमिहान्येन देहमन्यस्य गच्छति । दद्यात्प्रवसतः श्राद्धं न तत्पथ्यशनं भवेत् ।।
data.es: If something eaten by one in this world can enter the body of another, then a shraddha can be performed for a person who has set out on a distant journey. Will that offering turn into food for him on his way?
data.anv: इह in this world, अन्येन by one person, भुक्तम् something eaten, अन्यस्य to other man's, देहम् body, गच्छति यदि if it reaches, प्रवसतः living in a distant place,  श्राद्धम् shraddha, दद्यात् may offer, तत् that one, पथि on the way, अशनम् न भवेत् will it not  be food?

data.v: दानसंवनना ह्येते ग्रन्था मेधाविभिः कृताः । यजस्व देहि दीक्षस्व तपस्तप्यस्व संत्यज ।।
data.es: It was to induce people to give charity that treatises are composed by intelligent men exhorting, 'perform sacrifices', 'give charity', 'be initiated', 'practise religious austerities', 'renounce', etc.
data.anv: यजस्व perform sacrifices, देहि give away, दीक्षस्व be initiated, तपः religious austerities, तप्यस्व practice, सन्त्यज renounce, एते these, ग्रन्थाः texts mannuals, मेधाविभिः by intelligent men, कृताः have been composed, दानसंवननाः हि to induce people to give charity.

data.v: स नास्ति परमित्येव कुरु बुद्धिं महामते । प्रत्यक्षं यत्तदातिष्ठ परोक्षं पृष्ठतः कुरु ।।
data.es: O highminded one thinking that the next world does not exist, practise whichever is evident and perceivable. And turn your back on what is beyond perception.
data.anv: महामते O highminded one, सः such as you, परम् the next world, नास्ति does not exist, इत्येव like that, बुद्धिम् thinking, कुरु do, यत् whatever, प्रत्यक्षम् is evident, तत् that one, आतिष्ठ you practise, परोक्षम् what is beyond perception, पृष्ठतः कुरु turn your back on.

data.v: सतां बुद्धिं पुरस्कृत्य सर्वलोकनिदर्शिनीम् । राज्यं त्वं प्रतिगृह्णीष्व भरतेन प्रसादितः ।।
data.es: Honour the decision of the wise that serves as an instance to all and accept the kingdom offered by Bharata with pleasureइत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये अयोध्याकाण्डे अष्टोत्तरशततमस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the one hundredeighth sarga in Ayodhyakanda of the holy Ramayana, the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: सः त्वम् such as you, सर्वलोकनिदर्शिनीम् that serves as an instance to all, सतां बुद्धिम्   judgement of the wise, पुरस्कृत्य treating with honour, भरतेन by Bharata, प्रसादितः pleased by, राज्यम् kingdom, प्रतिगृह्णीष्व accept.

data.v: जाबालेस्तु वचः श्रुत्वा रामः सत्यात्मनां वरः । उवाच परया युक्त्या स्वबुद्ध्या चाविपन्नया ।।
data.es: Having heard the words of the magnanimous Lakshmana, Kausalya, depressed and weeping, said to Rama:
data.anv: सत्यात्मनाम् among truthful men, वरः best, रामः Rama, जाबालेः Jabali's, वचः words, श्रुत्वा hearing, परया supreme, भक्त्या with devotion, अविपन्नया unshaken, स्वबुद्ध्या च by his own judgment, उवाच said.

data.v: भवान्मे प्रियकामार्थं वचनं यदिहोक्तवान् । अकार्यं कार्यसंकाशमपथ्यं पथ्यसंमितम् ।।
data.es: Althoug what you have said appears to be salutary, it is actually unwholesome. It appears to be beneficial but is really detrimental.
data.anv: भवान् you, मे to me, प्रियकामार्थम् with a desire to please, यत् what, वचनम् words, इह now, उक्तवान् has spoken, कार्यसङ्काशम् in the guise of an action fit to be done, अकार्यम् is unfit to be done, पथ्यसम्मतम् appears to be beneficial, अपथ्यम् is detrimental.

data.v: निर्मर्यादस्तु पुरुषः पापाचारसमन्वितः । मानं न लभते सत्सु भिन्नचारित्रदर्शनः ।।
data.es: A man not bound by morality, engaged in evil deeds and conducts himself contrary to good character is not respected by the virtuous.
data.anv: निर्मर्यादः one who transgresses all bounds of morality, पापाचारसमन्वितः one who is engaged in evil deeds, भिन्नचारित्रदर्शनः opposed to good character, पुरुषः a man, सत्सु amongst the virtuous, मानम् respect, न लभते does not obtain.

data.v: कुलीनमकुलीनं वा वीरं पुरुषमानिनम् । चारित्रमेव व्याख्याति शुचिं वा यदि वाशुचिम् ।।
data.es: It is only the character that tells whether a man is highborn or not, brave or only proud of his manliness, honest or dishonest.
data.anv: कुलीनम् highborn, अकुलीनं वा or base, वीरम् brave, पुरुषमानिनम् proud of his manliness, शुचिं वा pure or honest, यदि वा or if, अशुचिं impure or dishonest, चारित्रमेव character alone, व्याख्याति tells.

data.v: अनार्यस्त्वार्यसंकाशः शौचाद्धीनस्तथा शुचिः । लक्षण्यवदलक्षण्यो दुःशीलः शीलवानिव ।।
अधर्मं धर्मवेषेण यदीमं लोकसंकरम् । अभिपत्स्ये शुभं हित्वा क्रियाविधिविवर्जितम् ।।
कश्चेतयानः पुरुषः कार्याकार्यविचक्षणः । बहु मंस्यति मां लोके दुर्वृत्तं लोकदूषणम् ।।
कस्य यास्याम्यहं वृत्तं केन वा स्वर्गमाप्नुयाम् । अनया वर्तमानोऽहं वृत्त्या हीनप्रतिज्ञया ।।
data.es: How can I advise others for a virtuous conduct or how can I attain heaven if I break the vow which I follow at present.
data.anv: अहम् I, हीनप्रतिज्ञया by breaking the vow, अनया with this, वृत्त्या practice, वर्तमानः presently, कस्य to whom, वृत्तम् virtuous conduct, दास्यामि can I give, केन वा to whom, स्वर्गम् heaven, आप्नुयाम् can I attain.

data.v: कामवृत्तस्त्वयं लोकः कृत्स्नः समुपवर्तते । यद्वृत्ताः सन्ति राजानस्तद्वृत्ताः सन्ति हि प्रजाः ।।
data.es: The entire world conducts itself as per its own sweet will. Therefore the subjects will follow the same path as their kings.
data.anv: अयम् this, कृत्स्नः entire, लोकः a world, कामवृत्तः do whatever they wish, समुपवर्तते behaving, राजानः kings, यद्वृत्ताः सन्ति whatever be their conduct, प्रजाः the subjects, तद्वृत्ताः सन्ति हि they are sure to emulate the same conduct.

data.v: सत्यमेवानृशंस्यं च राजवृत्तं सनातनम् । तस्मात्सत्यात्मकं राज्यं सत्ये लोकः प्रतिष्ठितः ।।
data.es: Truth and nonviolence are the perpetual principles of kings. Therefore, a kingdom is based on truth. This world is firmly established in truth.
data.anv: सनातनम् eternal, राजवृत्तम् royal ways, सत्यमेव is a manifestation of truth, अनृशंसं च nonviolent, तस्मात् therefore, राज्यम् kingdom, सत्यात्मकम् of the character of truth, लोकः this world, सत्ये on truth, प्रतिष्ठितः is established.

data.v: ऋषयश्चैव देवाश्च सत्यमेव हि मेनिरे । सत्यवादी हि लोकेऽस्मिन्परमं गच्छति क्षयम् ।।
data.es: Sages and gods all accept truth (as the supreme virtue). A truthful man of this world, attains the highest state (abode).
data.anv: ऋषयश्चैव sages, देवाश्च the gods or, सत्यमेव the truth only, मेनिरे considered (supreme virtue), सत्यवादी truthful, अस्मिन् लोके in this world, परमम् highest, क्षयम् state, गच्छति  attains, हि indeed.

data.v: उद्विजन्ते यथा सर्पान्नरादनृतवादिनः । धर्मः सत्यं परो लोके मूलं स्वर्गस्य चोच्यते ।।
data.es: People are frightened at the sight of a man speaking untruth as though they have seen a serpent. Truth in this world is the greatest virtue and is said to be the very foundation of heaven.
data.anv: अनृतवादिनः from one speaking untruth, नरात् from man, सर्पात् यथा like from a serpent, उद्विजन्ते are agitated, लोके in this world, सत्यम् truth, परः greatest, धर्मः virtue, स्वर्गस्य to heaven, मूलं च is the very root, उच्यते is said to be.

data.v: सत्यमेवेश्वरो लोके सत्यं पद्मा समाश्रिता । सत्यमूलानि सर्वाणि सत्यान्नास्ति परं पदम् ।।
data.es: Truth is God. The goddess of wealth always takes refuge in truth. Truth is the root of everything. It is supreme and there is nothing above it.
data.anv: लोके in this world, सत्यमेव truth only, ईश्वरः is God, पद्मा godess of wealth, सदा always, सत्यम् in truth, आश्रिता seeks refuge, सर्वाणि all beings, सत्यमूलानि truth as basis, सत्यात् more than truth, परम् supreme ,पदम् higher state, नास्ति there is nothing.

data.v: दत्तमिष्टं हुतं चैव तप्तानि च तपांसि च । वेदाः सत्यप्रतिष्ठानास्तस्मात्सत्यपरो भवेत् ।।
data.es: Charity, sacrifice, libations, mortifications, asceticism and the Vedas have truth as their foundation. Therefore, every one should be an adherent of truth.
data.anv: दत्तम् charity, इष्टं च sacrifice, हुतं चैव libation, तप्तानि mortifications, तपांसि च asceticism, वेदाः the Vedas, सत्यप्रतिष्ठानाः have truth as the foundation, तस्मात् therefore, सत्यपरः भवेत् one should adhere to truth.

data.v: एकः पालयते लोकमेकः पालयते कुलम् । मज्जत्येको हि निरय एकः स्वर्गे महीयते ।।
data.es: One protects the world. Another runs his family. One plunges into hell. Another is honoured in heaven. (These are the fruits of truth and untruth).
data.anv: एकः one, लोकम् this world, पालयते protects, एकः one, कुलम् family, पालयते protects, एकः one, निरये into the hell, मज्जति plunges, एकः one, स्वर्गे in heaven, महीयते is honoured.

data.v: सोऽहं पितुर्निदेशं तु किमर्थं नानुपालये । सत्यप्रतिश्रवः सत्यं सत्येन समयीकृतः ।।
data.es: I am always true to any promise. I am bound by truth. Why shouId I (now) disobey my father's command (to keep his promise)?
data.anv: सत्यप्रतिश्रवः true to promise, सः अहम् that I, सत्येन by truth, समयीकृतः bound by, पितुः father's, सत्यम् vow, नियोगम् command, किमर्थम् why, नानुपालये will not I obey.

data.v: नैव लोभान्न मोहाद्वा न चाज्ञानात्तमोन्वितः । सेतुं सत्यस्य भेत्स्यामि गुरोः सत्यप्रतिश्रवः ।।
data.es: I am always true to my promise. I will not break the bridge of truth of my father out of either greed or delusion or ignorance or illusion.
data.anv: सत्यप्रतिश्रवः true to one's, गुरोः father's, सत्यस्य of truth, सेतुम् bridge, लोभात् out of  greed, नैव भेत्स्यामि will not break, मोहाद्वा or out of delusion, न not, तमोऽन्वितः due to ignorance (illusion), अज्ञानात् out of ignorance, न not.

data.v: असत्यसंधस्य सतश्चलस्यास्थिरचेतसः । नैव देवा न पितरः प्रतीच्छन्तीति नः श्रुतम् ।।
data.es: We have heard that the offerings of a man inclined to untruth, of an unstable and unsteady mind are accepted neither by the gods nor by the ancestors.
data.anv: असत्यसन्धस्य सतः one who is inclined to untruth, चलस्य of a fickle man, अस्थिरचेतसः of an unsteady mind, देवाः gods, न प्रतीच्छन्ति will not accept, पितरः ancestors, इति thus, नः for us, श्रुतम् heard.

data.v: प्रत्यगात्ममिमं धर्मं सत्यं पश्याम्यहं स्वयम् । भारः सत्पुरुषाचीर्णस्तदर्थमभिनन्द्यते ।।
data.es: I personally regard this righteousness practised by the virtuous as an evident form of truth, as the supreme self. Therefore, this burden (difficult task of living as an exile) is gratifying to me.
data.anv: अहम् I, स्वयम् personally, इमम् this, सत्यं धर्मम् righteousness in the form of truth, प्रत्यगात्मम् as supreme self, पश्यामि I perceive (consider), तदर्थम् hence, सत्पुरुषाचीर्णः practised by the virtuous, भारः this burden (of exile into the forest), अभिमन्यते I consider.

data.v: क्षात्रं धर्ममहं त्यक्ष्ये ह्यधर्मं धर्मसंहितम् । क्षुद्रौर्नृशंसैर्लुब्धैश्च सेवितं पापकर्मभिः ।।
data.es: I renounce the socalled kshatriya code of conduct followed by the mean the cruel, the greedy and by men of evil deeds which is unrighteousness under the cloak of righteousness.
data.anv: क्षुद्रैः by the mean, नृशंसैः by the cruel, लुब्धै: by the greedy, पापकर्मभिः by men of evil deeds, सेवितम् pursued, धर्मसंहितम् conforming to righteousness, अधर्मम् unrighteousness, क्षात्रं धर्मम् kshatriya code of condut, अहम् I, त्यक्षे renounce.

data.v: कायेन कुरुते पापं मनसा संप्रधार्य च । अनृतं जिह्वया चाह त्रिविधं कर्म पातकम् ।।
data.es: At first a man conceives an evil idea in his mind, then executes it through evil deed with his body and tells a lie through his tongue. Thus sinful action is three dimensional (mental, physical and vocal).
data.anv: मनसा by mind, सम्प्रधार्य having conceived, कायेन by the body, पापम् sin (evil deed), कुरुते is committed, जिह्वया with tongue, अनृतं च falsehood, आह is spoken, पातकं कर्म sinful action, त्रिविधम् is in these three ways.

data.v: भूमिः कीर्तिर्यशो लक्ष्मीः पुरुषं प्रार्थयन्ति हि । स्वर्गस्थं चानुबध्नन्ति सत्यमेव भजेत तत् ।।
data.es: Land (kingdom) glory, and wealth pursue a man, they long for him even if he is in heaven. Therefore, every one must take recourse to truth alone.
data.anv: भूमिः land, कीर्ति: fame, यशः renown, लक्ष्मीः wealth, पुरुषम् to a man, प्रार्थयन्ति हि desire to, स्वर्गस्थं च one who is in heaven, अनुपश्यन्ति will look at, ततः from, सत्यमेव truth only, भजेत take recourse to.

data.v: श्रेष्ठं ह्यनार्यमेव स्याद्यद्भवानवधार्य माम् । आह युक्तिकरैर्वाक्यैरिदं भद्रं कुरुष्व ह ।।
data.es: The course you thought excellent and 'this auspicious act' you urged me in a cleverlyworded statement to perform is ignoble indeed.
data.anv: भवान् you, श्रेष्ठम् as excellent, अवधार्य decided, भद्रम् auspicious, इदम् this course, कुरुष्व pursue, युक्ति करैः cleverlyworded, वाक्यैः with statements, माम् to me, यत् that, आह said (thought), अनार्यमेव is ignoble, स्यात् will be.

data.v: कथं ह्यहं प्रतिज्ञाय वनवासमिमं गुरोः । भरतस्य करिष्यामि वचो हित्वा गुरोर्वचः ।।
data.es: Having sworn before my father that I would live in the forest, how can I act upon Bharata's request in disregard to my father's words?
data.anv: अहम् I, इमं वनवासम् this dwelling in the forest, गुरौ to father, प्रतिज्ञाय having sworn, गुरोः father's, वचः words, हित्वा disregarding, भरतस्य Bharata's, वचः words, कथम् how, करिष्यामि shall I do?

data.v: स्थिरा मया प्रतिज्ञाता प्रतिज्ञा गुरुसंनिधौ । प्रहृष्टमानसा देवी कैकेयी चाभवत्तदा ।।
data.es: I had taken a firm vow in the presence of my father (about my stay in the forest). And then Devi Kaikeyi was immensely delighted.
data.anv: मया by me, गुरुसन्निधौ in the presence of my father, स्थिरा firm, प्रतिज्ञा vow, प्रतिज्ञाता is sworn, तदा then, सा that, देवी कैकेयी च Devi Kaikeyi, प्रहृष्यमाणा अभवत् became immensely delighted.

data.v: वनवासं वसन्नेवं शुचिर्नियतभोजनः । मूलैः पुष्पैः फलैः पुण्यैः पितॄन्देवांश्च तर्पयन् ।।
data.es: I shall spend the term of my forest life with faith and holiness and purity of mind and with regulated food and with ancestors and gods satisfied with offerings of roots, flowers and fruits, with my five senses contented and with a mind that discriminates between what ought to be done and what ought not to be done.
data.anv: अहम् I, शुचिः purified, नियतभोजनः with regulated food, पुण्यैः by holy, मूलैः with roots, पुष्पैः with flowers, फलैः with fruits, पित्रून् to ancestors, देवांश्च to gods, तर्पयन् satisfying through libation, सन्तुष्टपञ्चवर्गः with five senses contented, अकुहः honest, श्रद्धधानस्सन् with faith, कार्याकार्यविचक्षणः discriminating ought to be done and what not to, what is right and what is wrong, एवम् in this way, वनवासम् forest life, वसन् living, लोकयात्राम् the term of life, प्रवर्तये shall spend.

data.v: संतुष्टपञ्चवर्गोऽहं लोकयात्रां प्रवर्तये । अकुहः श्रद्दधानः सन्कार्याकार्यविचक्षणः ।।
data.es: I shall spend the term of my forest life with faith and holiness and purity of mind and with regulated food and with ancestors and gods satisfied with offerings of roots, flowers and fruits, with my five senses contented and with a mind that discriminates between what ought to be done and what ought not to be done.
data.anv: अहम् I, शुचिः purified, नियतभोजनः with regulated food, पुण्यैः by holy, मूलैः with roots, पुष्पैः with flowers, फलैः with fruits, पित्रून् to ancestors, देवांश्च to gods, तर्पयन् satisfying through libation, सन्तुष्टपञ्चवर्गः with five senses contented, अकुहः honest, श्रद्धधानस्सन् with faith, कार्याकार्यविचक्षणः discriminating ought to be done and what not to, what is right and what is wrong, एवम् in this way, वनवासम् forest life, वसन् living, लोकयात्राम् the term of life, प्रवर्तये shall spend.

data.v: कर्मभूमिमिमां प्राप्य कर्तव्यं कर्म यच्छुभम् । अग्निर्वायुश्च सोमश्च कर्मणां फलभागिनः ।।
data.es: Having reached this land of (religious) actions, one should perform auspicious rites. As fruit of their actions, Agni, Vayu and Soma have obtained their status.
data.anv: इमाम् this, कर्मभूमिम् the land of (religious) actions, प्राप्य having reached, यत् whichever, शुभम् is auspicious, कर्म deed, कर्तव्यम् should be performed, अग्नि: Agni, वायुश्च Vayu, सोमश्च Soma, कर्मणाम् (religious) rites, फलभागिनः have obtained a share of the fruits.

data.v: शतं क्रतूनामाहृत्य देवराट्त्रिदिवं गतः । तपांस्युग्राणि चास्थाय दिवं याता महर्षयः ।।
data.es: After performing a hundred sacrifices, king of the gods (Indra) obtained (dominion over) heaven. Great sages attained heaven after resorting to intense mortifications.
data.anv: देवराट् king of the gods (Indra), क्रतूनाम् sacrifices, शतम् hundred, अहृत्य having performed, त्रिदिवम् to heaven, गतः went, महर्षयः great sages, उग्राणि intenese, तपांसि mortifications, आस्थाय after resorting to, दिवम् heaven, याताः attained.

data.v: सत्यं च धर्मं च पराक्रमं च; भूतानुकम्पां प्रियवादितां च । द्विजातिदेवातिथिपूजनं च; पन्थानमाहुस्त्रिदिवस्य सन्तः ।।
data.es: The virtuous maintain that truthfulness, righteousness, valour, compassion towards all beings, speaking pleasing words, paying homage to gods, brahmins and guests -- all these are paths to heaven.
data.anv: सत्यं च truthfulness, धर्मं च righteousness, पराक्रमं च valour, भूतानुकम्पाम् compassion for all beings, प्रियवादितां च speaking pleasing words, द्विजातिदेवातिथिपूजनं च offering homage to gods, brahmins and guests, त्रिदिवस्य of heaven, पन्थानम् is the path, सन्तः virtuous people, आहुः say.

data.v: धर्मे रताः सत्पुरुषैः समेता;स्तेजस्विनो दानगुणप्रधानाः । अहिंसका वीतमलाश्च लोके; भवन्ति पूज्या मुनयः प्रधानाः ।।
data.es: Those supreme ascetics who are radiant, devoted to righteousness and associated with men of virtue, with charity as their chief virtue, eschewing violence and purged of their impurities are truly worthy of reverence in this world.
data.anv: धर्मे in righteousness, रताः are engaged, सत्पुरुषैः with men of virtue, समेताः are associated, तेजस्विनः of radiant, दानगुण प्रधानाः charity as their chief virtue, अहिंसकाः eschewing violence, वीतमलाः purged of their sins, प्रधानाः supreme, मुनयः ascetics, लोके in this world, पूज्याः भवन्ति are truly worthy of reverence.

data.v: क्रुद्धमाज्ञाय रामं तु वसिष्ठः प्रत्युवाच ह । जाबालिरपि जानीते लोकस्यास्य गतागतिम् । निवर्तयितुकामस्तु त्वामेतद्वाक्यमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Seeing Rama angry Vasistha intercedes, saying that Jabali is wellaware of the exits and entrances of humans on earth.
data.anv: रामम् Rama, क्रुद्धम् as wrathful, आज्ञाय having perceived, वसिष्ठः Vasistha, प्रत्युवाच ह intercedes, जाबालिरपि Jabali also, अस्य लोकस्य to this world, गतागतिम् exits and entrances, जानीते is aware.

data.v: इमां लोकसमुत्पत्तिं लोकनाथ निबोध मे । सर्वं सलिलमेवासीत्पृथिवी यत्र निर्मिता । ततः समभवद्ब्रह्मा स्वयम्भूर्दैवतैः सह ।।
data.es: At the beginning, all this was water from which the earth was created. Thereafter, the selfexistent Brahma along with the gods came into existence.
data.anv: सर्वम् all, सलिलम् एव आसीत् all this was water, यत्र where, पृथिवी the earth, निर्मिता was formed, ततः thereafter, स्वयंभूः the selfexistent, ब्रह्मा Brahma, दैवतैस्सह along with the gods, समभवत् came into existence.

data.v: स वराहस्ततो भूत्वा प्रोज्जहार वसुंधराम् । असृजच्च जगत्सर्वं सह पुत्रैः कृतात्मभिः ।।
data.es: Then he assumed the form of a boar and uplifted the earth and created this world with his progeny of purified souls.
data.anv: ततः then, सः he, वराहः in the form of a boar, भूत्वा becoming, वसुन्धराम् this earth, प्रोज्जहार uplifted, कृतात्मभिः by purified souls, पुत्रैः सह with sons, जगत् the world, असृजच्छ created.

data.v: आकाशप्रभवो ब्रह्मा शाश्वतो नित्य अव्ययः । तस्मान्मरीचिः संजज्ञे मरीचेः कश्यपः सुतः ।।
data.es: Eternal, changeless and imperishable Brahma arose from space and to him was born Marichi and to Marichi, Kasyapa.
data.anv: शाश्वतः eternal, नित्यः changeless, अव्ययः imperishable, ब्रह्मा Brahma, आकाशप्रभवः arose from space (as his birthplace), तस्मात् from him, मरीचिः Marichi, सञ्जज्ञे was born, कश्यपः Kasyapa, मरीचेः Marichi's, सुतः son.
data.md: The perpetual, everlasting, and undeteriorating Brahmā sprang from the Unmanifest (Brahmā). From him sprang Marīci; and Kasyapa is son to Marīci. And from Kaśyapa sprung Vivasvat; and Manu is son to Vivasvat.

data.v: विवस्वान्कश्यपाज्जज्ञे मनुर्वैवस्वतः स्मृतः । स तु प्रजापतिः पूर्वमिक्ष्वाकुस्तु मनोः सुतः ।।
data.es: Kasyapa begot Vivaswat (the Sun) and Vivaswat, Manu. This Manu was the first Prajapati to him whom was born Ikshvaku.
data.anv: काश्यपात् from Kasyapa, विवस्वान् Vivaswat (Sun), जज्ञे was born, मनुः Manu, वैवस्वतः Vivaswat's, सुतः son, स तु as for him, पूर्वम् first, प्रजापतिः Prajapati, इक्ष्वाकुः Ikshvaku, मनोः Manu's, सुतः son.

data.v: यस्येयं प्रथमं दत्ता समृद्धा मनुना मही । तमिक्ष्वाकुमयोध्यायां राजानं विद्धि पूर्वकम् ।।
data.es: Manu had orginally bestowed the most prosperous earth on Ikshvaku and you know Ikshvaku was the first king of Ayodhya.
data.anv: यस्य to whom, प्रथमम् originally, समृद्धा prosperous, मही earth, मनुना by Manu, दत्ता was bestowed, तम् that, इक्ष्वाकुम् Ikshvaku, अयोध्यायाम् of Ayodhya, पूर्वकम् first, राजानम् king, विद्धि please know.
data.md: This Manu is otherwise called Prajäpati; and Ikşvāku is Manu's son. And this Ikşvāku you must understand, was the first king of Ayodhyā.

data.v: इक्ष्वाकोस्तु सुतः श्रीमान्कुक्षिरेवेति विश्रुतः । कुक्षेरथात्मजो वीरो विकुक्षिरुदपद्यत ।।
data.es: Ikshvaku had an illustrious son, wellknown as Kukshi and to Kukshi was born the heroic Vikukshi.
data.anv: इक्ष्वाकोः Ikshaku's, सुतः son, श्रीमान् illustrious, कुक्षिरेवेति as Kukshi, विश्रुतः wellknown, अथ thereafter, कुक्षेः Kukshi's, आत्मजः son, वीरः heroic, विकुक्षिः Vikukshi, उदपद्यत was born.
data.md: And Ikşvāku's son, it is well known, was the graceful Kuksi. And Kuksi's son was the graceful Vikuksi.

data.v: विकुक्षेस्तु महातेजा बाणः पुत्रः प्रतापवान् । बाणस्य तु महाबाहुरनरण्यो महायशाः ।।
data.es: The son of Vikukshi was highly energetic and powerful Bana and to him was born the mightyarmed Anaranya of great renown.
data.anv: विकुक्षेः Vikukshi's, महातेजाः highly energetic, प्रतापवान् powerful, बाणः Bana, पुत्र: son, बाणस्य to Bana, महाबाहुः mighty armed, महायशाः of great renown, अनरण्यः Anaranya was born.
data.md: And Vikuksi's son was the exceedingly energetic and powerful Bāņa. And Bāna's son was the highly energetic and powerful Anaranya.

data.v: नानावृष्टिर्बभूवास्मिन्न दुर्भिक्षं सतां वरे । अनरण्ये महाराजे तस्करो वापि कश्चन ।।
data.es: When Anaranya, the best of the virtuous, was ruling the kingdom, there was no drought, no famine and not even a thief (in his kingdom).
data.anv: सताम् among the virtuous, वरे the best, अस्मिन् in this, अनरण्ये in Anaranya, महाराजे when he was king, अनावृष्टिः drought, न बभूव did not take place, दुर्भिक्षम् famine, न not, तस्करः thieves, कश्चन none, न not.

data.v: अनरण्यान्महाबाहुः पृथू राजा बभूव ह । तस्मात्पृथोर्महाराजस्त्रिशङ्कुरुदपद्यत । स सत्यवचनाद्वीरः सशरीरो दिवं गतः ।।
data.es: Mightyarmed king Prithu was the son of Anaranya and Prithu was father of the great king Trishanku. That heroic Trishanku, on account of his truthfulness ascended the heaven with his physical body.
data.anv: अनरण्यात् of Anaranya, महाबाहुः mightyarmed, पृथुः Prithu, राजा king, बभूव ह was born, तस्मात् पृथोः from that Prithu, त्रिशङ्कुः Trishanku, महाराजः great king, उदपद्यत was born, सः वीरः that heroic man, सत्यवचनात् on account of his truthfulness, सशरीरः with his physical body, दिवम् heaven, गतः ascended.

data.v: त्रिशङ्कोरभवत्सूनुर्धुन्धुमारो महायशाः । धुन्धुमारान्महातेजा युवनाश्वो व्यजायत ।।
data.es: Trishanku's son was illustrious Dundhumara, father of the exceedingly powerful Yuvanaswa.
data.anv: त्रिशङ्कोः to Trishanku, महायशाः of illustrious, दुन्धुमारः Dundhumara, सूनुः as son, अभवत् became, दुन्धुमारात् from Dundhumara, महातेजाः exceedingly powerful, युवनाश्वः Yuvanaswa, व्यजायत was born.

data.v: युवनाश्वसुतः श्रीमान्मान्धाता समपद्यत । मान्धातुस्तु महातेजाः सुसंधिरुदपद्यत ।।
data.es: Majestic Mandhata was Yuvanasva's son and father of mighty Susandhi. Sudsandhi had two sons Dhruvasandhi and Prasenjit. Renowned Bharata, slayer of enemies, was the son of Dhruvasandhi.
data.anv: श्रीमान् majestic, मान्धाता Mandhata, युवनाश्वसुतः as Yuvanasva's son, समपद्यत was born, मन्धातुः to Mandhat, महातेजाः mighty, सुसन्धि Susandhi, उदपध्यत was born, सुसंधेरपि and to Susandhi, ध्रुवसंधिः Dhruvasandhi, प्रसेनजित् Prasenjit, द्वौ two, पुत्रौ sons, यशस्वी renowned, रिपुसूदनः slayer of enemies, भरतः Bharata ध्रुवसन्धेः born to Dhruvasandhi.

data.v: सुसंधेरपि पुत्रौ द्वौ ध्रुवसंधिः प्रसेनजित् । यशस्वी ध्रुवसंधेस्तु भरतो रिपुसूदनः ।।
data.es: Majestic Mandhata was Yuvanasva's son and father of mighty Susandhi. Sudsandhi had two sons Dhruvasandhi and Prasenjit. Renowned Bharata, slayer of enemies, was the son of Dhruvasandhi.
data.anv: श्रीमान् majestic, मान्धाता Mandhata, युवनाश्वसुतः as Yuvanasva's son, समपद्यत was born, मन्धातुः to Mandhat, महातेजाः mighty, सुसन्धि Susandhi, उदपध्यत was born, सुसंधेरपि and to Susandhi, ध्रुवसंधिः Dhruvasandhi, प्रसेनजित् Prasenjit, द्वौ two, पुत्रौ sons, यशस्वी  renowned, रिपुसूदनः slayer of enemies, भरतः Bharata  ध्रुवसन्धेः born to Dhruvasandhi.

data.v: भरतात्तु महाबाहोरसितो नाम जायत । यस्यैते प्रतिराजान उदपद्यन्त शत्रवः । हैहयास्तालजङ्घाश्च शूराश्च शशबिन्दवः ।।
data.es: Mightyarmed Bharata had a son named Asita against whom the Haihayas, Talajanghas and the indomitable Sasibindus, the rival kings rose as enenmies.
data.anv: महाबाहोः of the mightyarmed, भरतात् Bharata, असितो नाम named Asita, (अ)जायत was born, यस्य to him, हैहयाः Haihayas, तालजङ्घाश्च Talajanghas, शूराः indomitable, शशिबिन्दवश्च Sasibindus also, प्रतिराजानः rival kings, शत्रवः as enemies, उदपद्यन्त rose up.
data.md: And from Dhruvasandhi sprung the famous Bharata. And from Bharata sprung Asita; to fight whom were born as hostile kings, those heroes, the Haihayas, the Talajanghas, and the Sasabindus.

data.v: तांस्तु सर्वान्प्रतिव्यूह्य युद्धे राजा प्रवासितः । स च शैलवरे रम्ये बभूवाभिरतो मुनिः । द्वे चास्य भार्ये गर्भिण्यौ बभूवतुरिति श्रुतिः ।।
data.es: Although king Asita engaged all of them in a battle, he was (defeated and) driven into exile. He retired to a delightful, tall mountain and lived a life of contentment of a sage.
data.anv: राजा the king, युद्धे in battle, तान् सर्वान् all of them, प्रतिव्यूह्य having engaged, प्रवासितः driven into exile, सः he, रम्ये in a delightful, शैलवरे on a tall mountain, अभिरतः contented, मुनिः sage, बभूव became.

data.v: भार्गवश्च्यवनो नाम हिमवन्तमुपाश्रितः । तमृषिं समुपागम्य कालिन्दी त्वभ्यवादयत् ।।
data.anv: भार्गवः descendant of Bhrigu, च्यवनो नाम Chyavana by name, हिमवन्तम् Himavat mountain, उपाश्रितः had taken shelter, कालिन्दी Kalindi, तं ऋषिम् that rishi, समुपागम्य having approached, अभ्यवादयत् paid obeisance, सः विप्रः that brahmin, पुत्रजन्मनि for the birth of a son, वरेप्सुम् craving for a boon, ताम्  to her, अभ्यवदत् said.

data.v: स तामभ्यवदद्विप्रो वरेप्सुं पुत्रजन्मनि । ततः सा गृहमागम्य देवी पुत्रं व्यजायत ।।
सपत्न्या तु गरस्तस्यै दत्तो गर्भजिघांसया । गरेण सह तेनैव जातः स सगरोऽभवत् ।।
data.es: With a motive to destroy the embryo her cowife had poisoned her. That child was born with gara or poison for which he was called Sagara.
data.anv: सपत्नया by her cowife, गर्भजिघांसया with a motive to destroy the embryo, तस्यै to her, गरः poison, दत्तः given, तेन for that reason, गरेण सहैव with poison, जातः born, सः he, सगरः Sagara, अभवत् became.
data.md: And since intending to destroy her foetus she that was co-wife with her had administered poison to her, Sagara* was born together with the poison. *Gara-poison. Sagara means, with poison, i.e. here, one born with poison.

data.v: स राजा सगरो नाम यः समुद्रमखानयत् । इष्ट्वा पर्वणि वेगेन त्रासयन्तमिमाः प्रजाः ।।
data.es: The king Sagara performed a sacrifice on the fullmoon day. And swiftly dug the ocean that frightened the people.
data.anv: सः he, सगरो नाम राजा a king, Sagara by name, यः who, इष्ट्वा having performed a sacrifice, पर्वणि on a fullmoon day, वेगेन swiftly, इमाः प्रजाः these men, त्रासयन्तम् frightening, समुद्रम् the ocean, अखानयत् excavated.

data.v: असमञ्जस्तु पुत्रोऽभूत्सगरस्येति नः श्रुतम् । जीवन्नेव स पित्रा तु निरस्तः पापकर्मकृत् ।।
data.es: We have heard that a son, Asamanja by name, was born to Sagara. For his sinful deeds he was banished by his father while he was still alive.
data.anv: असमञ्जः Asamanja, सगरस्य Sagara's, पुत्रः son, अभूत् became, इति thus, नः for us, श्रुतम् heard, पापकर्मकृत् one who indulged in sinful deeds, सः he, जीवन्नेव while he was living in the kingdom, पित्रा by father, निरस्तः banished.

data.v: अंशुमानिति पुत्रोऽभूदसमञ्जस्य वीर्यवान् । दिलीपोंऽशुमतः पुत्रो दिलीपस्य भगीरथः ।।
data.es: Valiant Anshuman was the son of Asamanja and the father of Dilipa. Dilipa's son was Bhagiratha.
data.anv: असमञ्जस्य Asamanja's, वीर्यवान् valiant, अंशुमानिति Anshuman by name, पुत्रः son, अभूत् was born, दिलीपः Dilipa, अंशुमतः Ansuman's, पुत्रः son, भगीरथः Bhagiratha, दिलीपस्य was son of Dilipa.
data.md: And Sagara's son was Asamanja, and Ansumat. And Dilīpa was son to Ansumat, and Bhagiratha to Dilīpa.

data.v: भगीरथात्ककुत्स्थस्तु काकुत्स्था येन तु स्मृताः । ककुत्स्थस्य तु पुत्रोऽभूद्रघुर्येन तु राघवः ।।
data.es: To Bhagiratha was born Kakutstha, by whom your race is wellknown. A son Raghu was born to Kakutstha and hence all of you are known as Raghavas.
data.anv: भगीरथात् from Bhagiratha, ककुत्स्थ: Kakutstha, येन by whom, काकुत्स्थाः as Kakutsthas, विश्रुताः are celebrated, ककुत्स्थस्य च to Kakutstha, रघुः Raghu, पुत्रः son, अभूत् was born, येन  by whom, राघवाः Raghavas

data.v: रघोस्तु पुत्रस्तेजस्वी प्रवृद्धः पुरुषादकः । कल्माषपादः सौदास इत्येवं प्रथितो भुवि ।।
data.es: The illustrious son of Raghu became famous in the world under the names of Kalmasapada and Sowdasa. The curse of a sage turned him a devourer of men for some years.
data.anv: रघोः Raghu, तेजस्वी illustrious, पुत्रः son, प्रवृद्धः has grown, पुरुषादकः Purushadaka, कल्माषपादः Kalmasapada, सौदासः Sowdasa, इत्येवम् like these, भुवि in this world, प्रथितः became famous.

data.v: कल्माषपादपुत्रोऽभूच्छङ्खणस्त्विति विश्रुतः । यस्तु तद्वीर्यमासाद्य सहसेनो व्यनीनशत् ।।
data.es: Shankhana was the famous son of Kalmashapada. Whoever challenged his prowess was routed with his entire army.
data.anv: शङ्खणः Shankhana, इति thus, विश्रुतः is famous, कल्माषपादपुत्रः as son of Kalmashapada, अभूत् became, यः whoever, तद्वीर्यम् with that prowess, आसाद्य having been target acquired, सहसैन्यः with his army, व्यनीनशत् was destroyed.

data.v: शङ्खणस्य तु पुत्रोऽभूच्छूरः श्रीमान्सुदर्शनः । सुदर्शनस्याग्निवर्ण अग्निवर्षस्य शीघ्रगः ।।
शीघ्रगस्य मरुः पुत्रो मरोः पुत्रः प्रशुश्रुकः । प्रशुश्रुकस्य पुत्रोऽभूदम्बरीषो महाद्युतिः ।।
अम्बरीषस्य पुत्रोऽभून्नहुषः सत्यविक्रमः । नहुषस्य च नाभागः पुत्रः परमधार्मिकः ।।
अजश्च सुव्रतश्चैव नाभागस्य सुतावुभौ । अजस्य चैव धर्मात्मा राजा दशरथः सुतः ।।
तस्य ज्येष्ठोऽसि दायादो राम इत्यभिविश्रुतः । तद्गृहाण स्वकं राज्यमवेक्षस्व जगन्नृप ।।
data.es: Being the eldest son of king Dasaratha and widely known as Rama you happen to be the heir apparent. Hence, O king, accept the kingdom and look after the people.
data.anv: राम इति as Rama, अभिविश्रुतः known far and wide, तस्य that king's, दायादः an heir, ज्येष्ठः असि are the eldest son, नृपः O king, तत् for that reason, स्वकम् is your own, राज्यम् kingdom, गृहाण accept, जनम् the people, अवेक्षस्व look after.

data.v: इक्ष्वाकूणां हि सर्वेषां राजा भवति पूर्वजः । पूर्वजे नावरः पुत्रो ज्येष्ठो राज्येऽभिषिच्यते ।।
स राघवाणां कुलधर्ममात्मनः; सनातनं नाद्य विहातुमर्हसि । प्रभूतरत्नामनुशाधि मेदिनीं; प्रभूतराष्ट्रां पितृवन्महायशाः ।।
