data.es: O woman of large eyes and fine hips, my brother is fit for you. You will (with him) shine like the radiant Sun on mount Meru. You will enjoy yourself without a cowife. You may approach him.
data.anv: विशालाक्षि O largeeyed one, वरारोहे  with fine hips, एनम् him, भ्रातरम् my brother, अर्कप्रभा radiance of the Sun, मेरुं यथा like mount Meru, असपत्ना without a cowife, भज serve him.
data.md: O you of expansive eyes, seek this brother of mine as your husband, even as the solar beam seeks Meru. (By doing so), You O supremely beautiful damsel, will not have to fear a co-wife.

data.v: इति रामेण सा प्रोक्ता राक्षसी काममोहिता । विसृज्य रामं सहसा ततो लक्ष्मणमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Thus told by Rama, the demoness, deluded with lust, left him suddenly, and said to Lakshmana:
data.anv: रामेण by Rama, इति this way, प्रोक्ता having been told, राक्षसी the demoness, काममोहिता deluded with lust, सहसा suddenly, रामम् Rama, विसृज्य leaving, ततः thereafter, लक्ष्मणम् to Lakshmana, अब्रवीत् said.
data.md: Having been thus addressed by Rāma, the Rākṣasī intoxicated with lust, at once leaving Rāma, spoke to Lakşmaņa.

data.v: अस्य रूपस्य ते युक्ता भार्याहं वरवर्णिनी । मया सह सुखं सर्वान्दण्डकान्विचरिष्यसि ।।
data.es: With my fine complexion, I will be a suitable wife for you. You can happily wander about in Dandaka forest with me.
data.anv: ते to you, अस्य रूपस्य for your form, वरवर्णिनी a woman of fine complexion, अहम् I am, युक्ता most suitable, भार्या wife, मया सह with me, सुखम् happily, दण्डकान् to Dandaka forest, विचरिष्यसि you can wander about.
data.md: I am fit to be your wife possessed of transcendental grace, having regard to this beauty of yours. And with me you will happily range these Dandakas.

data.v: एवमुक्तस्तु सौमित्री राक्षस्या वाक्यकोविदः । ततः शूर्पणखीं स्मित्वा लक्ष्मणो युक्तमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Thus addressed by the demoness Lakshmana, son of Sumitra, wellversed in the use of words gave her a befitting reply :
data.anv: राक्षस्या by that demoness, एवम् thus, उक्तः spoken, वाक्यकोविदः wellversed in the use of words, सौमित्रिः son of Sumitra, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, ततः then, स्मित्वा with a gentle smile, शूर्पणखीम् to Surpanakha, युक्तम् appropriately, अब्रवीत् said.
data.md: Thus accosted by the Räkşasi, Sumitrā's son, Lakşmana versed in speech, with a smile appropriately observed to Śūrpanakhā,

data.v: कथं दासस्य मे दासी भार्या भवितुमिच्छसि । सोऽहमार्येण परवान्भ्रात्रा कमलवर्णिनि ।।
data.es: O lotuscomplexioned woman , how can you act as a maid to a slave ? Why do you intend to be so? I am already dependent on my revered brother.
data.anv: कमलवणिनि O woman of lotus complexion, दासस्य of a servant, मे myself, भार्या wife, दासी female servant, भवितुम् will become, कथम् how, इच्छसि do you intend to be, सः such Rama, अहम् I am, आर्येण्य to that revered, परवान् dependent upon, भ्रात्रा brother.
data.md: Why wish you to be the servant of me who am a servant myself*? O lotus-hued one, I am dependant on my noble brother. The text is difficult to render literally:—Why wish you to be the female servant of me who am myself a male servant.

data.v: समृद्धार्थस्य सिद्धार्था मुदितामलवर्णिनी । आर्यस्य त्वं विशालाक्षि भार्या भव यवीयसी ।।
data.es: O largeeyed one, you have a clear complexion. You may become the younger wife of my master who is lord of great wealth. And live a happy, fulfilled life.
data.anv: विशालाक्षि  largeeyed, अमलवर्णिनी  of clear complexion, त्वम् you, समृद्धार्थस्य lord of great wealth, आर्यस्य to Rama, यवीयसी younger, भार्या wife, सिद्धार्था fulfilled, मुदिता happy, भव you may be.
data.md: O you of expansive eyes, be you securing the sumimum bonum, with a joyful heart, become, O superbly beautiful wench, the younger wife of the noble one of great good fortune.

data.v: एतां विरूपामसतीं करालां निर्णतोदरीम् । भार्यां वृद्धां परित्यज्य त्वामेवैष भजिष्यति ।।
data.es: I will devour your brother along with this disfigured, unchaste and fearful lady with a flat belly.
data.anv: विरूपाम् deformed, असतीम् unchaste, करालाम् frightful, निर्णतोदरीम् flat bellied woman, इमां मानुषीम् to this lady, ते भ्रात्रासह along with your brother, भक्षयिष्यामि I will eat up.
data.md: Renouncing this frightful, unchaste, hideous, old wife possessed of a lean abdomen; he will devote himself to you.

data.v: को हि रूपमिदं श्रेष्ठं संत्यज्य वरवर्णिनि । मानुषेषु वरारोहे कुर्याद्भावं विचक्षणः ।।
data.es: O lady of fair complexion and beautiful hips, which wise man will fall in love with any other female giving up a fine figure like you ?
data.anv: वरवर्णिनि O lady of fair complexion, वरारोहे (lady with beautiful hips)charming, विचक्षणः which wise man, को हि indeed, श्रेष्ठम् best, इदं रूपम् this figure, संत्यज्य giving up, मानुषीषु among females, भावम् love, कुर्यात् how will he have?.
data.md: O paragon among damsels, O supremely charming lady, what man possessed of discernment, passing by such grace, would bear affliction to a human female?

data.v: इति सा लक्ष्मणेनोक्ता कराला निर्णतोदरी । मन्यते तद्वचः सत्यं परिहासाविचक्षणा ।।
data.es: While Lakshmana was thus making fun of the dreadful, droopingbellied Surpanakha, she presumed his words to be true.
data.anv: लक्ष्मणेन by Lakshmana, इति thus, उक्ता having spoken, कराला fierce, निर्णतोदरी drooping bellied woman, परिहासाविचक्षणा  capable of making fun, सा that Surpanakha, तद्वचः those words, तथ्यम् to be true, मन्यते presumes
data.md: Thus accosted by Lakşmaņa, that hideous one having a lean abdomen being incapable of understanding jest, took his words as true.

data.v: सा रामं पर्णशालायामुपविष्टं परंतपम् । सीतया सह दुर्धर्षमब्रवीत्काममोहिता ।।
data.es: Deluded with passion, Surpanakha said to formidable Rama, the scorcher of foes, seated in the leafthatched hut along with Sita:
data.anv: काममोहिता deluded with passion, सा she, सीतया सह with Sita, पर्णशालायाम् in the leafthatched hut, उपविष्टं seated, परन्तपम् tormentor of foes, Rama, दुर्धर्षम् formidable, रामम् Rama, अब्रवीत् said.
data.md: Thereupon as that subduer of enemies, the irrepressible Rāma, was seated in the cottage in company with Sītā, the Rākşasī, transported with lust, said to him.

data.v: इमां विरूपामसतीं करालां निर्णतोदरीम् । वृद्धां भार्यामवष्टभ्य न मां त्वं बहु मन्यसे ।।
data.es: I will devour your brother along with this disfigured, unchaste and fearful lady with a flat belly.
data.anv: विरूपाम् deformed, असतीम् unchaste, करालाम् frightful, निर्णतोदरीम् flat bellied woman, इमां मानुषीम् to this lady, ते भ्रात्रासह along with your brother, भक्षयिष्यामि I will eat up.
data.md: Renouncing this frightful, unchaste, hideous, old wife possessed of a lean abdomen; he will devote himself to you.

data.v: अद्येमां भक्षयिष्यामि पश्यतस्तव मानुषीम् । त्वया सह चरिष्यामि निःसपत्ना यथासुखम् ।।
data.es: I shall eat up this woman now before your very eyes and I can move about happily with you without a cowife.
data.anv: तव while you, पश्यतः are seeing, अद्य now, इमाम् this, मानुषीम् to this woman, भक्षयिष्यामि I will eat up, निस्सपत्ना without a cowife, त्वया सह with you, यथासुखम् happily, चरिष्यामि I shall move about.
data.md: To-day, you looking on, I shall eat up this human female. And I shall, rid of a co-wife, happily range with you.

data.v: इत्युक्त्वा मृगशावाक्षीमलातसदृशेक्षणा । अभ्यधावत्सुसंक्रुद्धा महोल्का रोहिणीमिव ।।
data.es: While speaking this, Surpanakha, with eyes like flaming amber ran to the fawneyed Sita in great anger like a giant meteor hurtling towards the constellation of Rohini :
data.anv: अलातसदृशेक्षणा a woman of flaming ambercoloured eye, इति this way, उक्त्वा after telling, सुसङ्कृद्धा very angrily, महोल्काम् a giant meteor, रोहिणीमिव as if hurtling towards the constellation Rohini, मृगशाबाक्षीम् the fawneyed lady, अभ्यधावत् rushed towards.
data.md: Having said this, even as a mighty meteor strike Rohiņī, that one having eyes resembling live coals, waxing exceedingly enraged, rushed towards that (damsel) with the eyes of a doe.

data.v: तां मृत्युपाशप्रतिमामापतन्तीं महाबलः । निगृह्य रामः कुपितस्ततो लक्ष्मणमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Mighty Rama in a rage restrained her who was falling upon Sita like the noose of death, and said to Lakshmana:
data.anv: महाबलः mighty, रामः Rama, कुपितः  enraged, मृत्युपाशप्रतिमामापतन्तीं falling like the noose of death, ताम् her, निगृह्य  restraining, ततः after that, लक्ष्मणम् to Lakshmana, अब्रवीत् said.
data.md: Thereupon, hindering the Rākṣasi resembling the noose of death, as she was rushing on, the mighty Rāma, growing wroth said to Lakşmaņa.

data.v: क्रूरैरनार्यैः सौमित्रे परिहासः कथंचन । न कार्यः पश्य वैदेहीं कथंचित्सौम्य जीवतीम् ।।
data.es: O handsome Lakshmana it is not proper to cut jokes with wicked, uncivilized persons. Now see Sita who has somehow survived.
data.anv: सौम्य O handsome one, सौमित्रे Lakshmana, क्रूरैः by the wicked, अनार्यैः by the uncivilised one, कथञ्चन indeed, परिहासः fun, न not, कार्यः proper, कथञ्चित् somehow, जीवतीम् a living lady, वैदेहीम् Sita, पश्य see.
data.md: O Saumitri (Sumitrā's son), what is the good of jesting with a base and wicked one? No use of doing it. Look, I amiable one, Vaidehi (Videha's daughter) is well nigh dead.

data.v: इमां विरूपामसतीमतिमत्तां महोदरीम् । राक्षसीं पुरुषव्याघ्र विरूपयितुमर्हसि ।।
data.es: O tiger among men, this uncouth, bigbellied, unchaste and highly passionate demoness deserves to be formed.
data.anv: पुरुषव्याघ्र tiger among men, विरूपाम् uncouth, असतीम् unchaste , अतिमत्ताम् passionate, महोदरीम्  big bellied इमां राक्षसीम् this demoness,  विरूपयितुम् to deform, अर्हसि you should.
data.md: It behoves you, O foremost of men, to deform this frightful, unchaste Rākşasī of a huge abdomen, transported with lust.

data.v: इत्युक्तो लक्ष्मणस्तस्याः क्रुद्धो रामस्य पश्यतः । उद्धृत्य खड्गं चिच्छेद कर्णनासं महाबलः ।।
data.es: Thus instructed (by Rama), powerful Lakshmana took position by the side of Rama, angrily lifted the sword and cut off her nose and ears.
data.anv: इति this, उक्तः instructed, महाबलः powerful, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, क्रुद्धः being angry, रामस्य Rama's, पार्श्वतः by the side, खङ्गम् sword, उद्धृत्य having lifted, तस्याः her, कर्णनासम् ears and nose, चिच्छेद cut off.
data.md: Thus desired the exceedingly strong Laksmana, fired with wrath, taking out his sword, in the sight of Rāma, cut off her nose and ears.

data.v: निकृत्तकर्णनासा तु विस्वरं सा विनद्य च । यथागतं प्रदुद्राव घोरा शूर्पणखा वनम् ।।
data.es: Dreadful Surpanakha with her ears and nose cut off, roared in a hoarse voice and ran away into the forest in the same direction as she came.
data.anv: भीमदर्शना a woman of frightening appearance, सा राक्षसी that demoness, कर्णनासे ears and nose, निकृत्ते when they were cut, विस्वरम् with cracked voice, विनद्य after shouting, यथागतम् in the same way as she came, प्रदुद्राव ran away.
data.md: Her ears and nose cut off, the terrible Śūrpanakhā, uttering frightful cries, fled a main into the forest whence she had come.

data.v: सा विरूपा महाघोरा राक्षसी शोणितोक्षिता । ननाद विविधान्नादान्यथा प्रावृषि तोयदः ।।
data.es: The dreadful demoness who thus was disfigured. Drenched in blood, she thundered like a cloud in rainy season.
data.anv: विरूपा disfigured, महाघोरा very dreadful, शोणितोक्षिता drenched in blood, सा राक्षसी that demoness, प्रावृषि in rainy season, तोयदः यथा like a cloud, विविधान्  different, नादान् sounds, ननाद released.
data.md: And being deformed, and covered with gore, the dreadful Rākşasī sent up many a roar, like clouds rumbling in the rains.

data.v: सा विक्षरन्ती रुधिरं बहुधा घोरदर्शना । प्रगृह्य बाहू गर्जन्ती प्रविवेश महावनम् ।।
data.es: Dripping blood profusely, the frightful demoness lifted her arms and entered the great forestroaring.
data.anv: घोरदर्शना of frightful look, सा she, बहुधा in many ways, रुधिरम् blood, विक्षरन्ती dripping, बाहू प्रगृह्य holding her arms, गर्जन्ती while roaring, महावनम् great forest, प्रविवेश entered.
data.md: And bleeding profusely, the grimvisaged Rākṣasī, lifting up her arms, and roaring, entered the mighty forest.

data.v: ततस्तु सा राक्षससंघसंवृतं; खरं जनस्थानगतं विरूपिता । उपेत्य तं भ्रातरमुग्रतेजसं; पपात भूमौ गगनाद्यथाशनिः ।।
data.es: A disfigured demoness, she fell down like the thunderbolt from the sky on the ground while her fiercelooking brother Khara sat surrounded by demons at Janasthana.
data.anv: ततः after that, विरूपिता a disfigured woman, सा she, राक्षससङ्घसंवृतम् surrounded by demons, जनस्थानगतम्  living in Janasthana, उग्रदर्शनम्  fiercelooking, भ्रातरम् brother, तं खरम् to Khara, उपेत्य approaching, गगनात् from the sky, अशनिः thunderbolt, यथा like that, भूमौ on the ground, पपात fell down.
data.md: Then having been deformed, (the Rākşasī) approaching, her brother of fierce energy, Khara, come to Janasthāna, (seated surrounded by numbers of Raksasas), fell down to the earth, even as the thunderbolt bursts from the sky.

data.v: ततः सभार्यं भयमोहमूर्छिता; सलक्ष्मणं राघवमागतं वनम् । विरूपणं चात्मनि शोणितोक्षिता; शशंस सर्वं भगिनी खरस्य सा ।।
data.es: Thereafter the sister of Khara, wild with fear and delusion and drenched in blood, narrated all about the arrival of Rama, Sita and Lakshmana in the forest and her disfigurement.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये अरण्यकाण्डे अष्टादशस्सर्ग।।Thus ends the eighteenth sarga of Aranyakanda of the holy Ramayana the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: ततः thereafter, खरस्य to Khara, भगिनी a sister, सा she, भयमोहमूर्छिता  a woman who was wild with fear and delusion, शोणितोक्षिता drenched in blood, वनम् forest, आगतम् reached, सभार्यम् with wife, सलक्ष्मणम् with Lakshmana, राघवम् Rama, आत्मनि at her, विरूपणं च disfigurement, सर्वम् all, शशंस narrated.
data.md: Then that sister of Khara, bathed in blood, and deprived of her senses through fright, related all about Räma's arrival at the forest along with Lakşmaņa and his own wife, as well as the forest along with Lakşmana and his own wife, as well as the circumstances connected with her being deformed.

data.v: तां तथा पतितां दृष्ट्वा विरूपां शोणितोक्षिताम् । भगिनीं क्रोधसंतप्तः खरः पप्रच्छ राक्षसः ।।
data.es: Burning with anger to see his sister fallen down disfigured and drenched in blood, Khara enquired:
data.anv: तथा in that way, पतिताम्  fallen down, विरूपाम् disfigured, शोणितोक्षिताम् drenched in blood, तां भगिनीम् that sister, दृष्ट्वा on seeing, राक्षसः demons, खरः Khara, क्रोधसन्तप्तः burning with anger, पप्रच्छ enquired.
data.md: Seeing his sister deformed, and covered with blood, fallen on the ground, the Raksasa, Khara, fired with wrath asked her.

data.v: बलविक्रमसंपन्ना कामगा कामरूपिणी । इमामवस्थां नीता त्वं केनान्तकसमा गता ।।
data.es: You have sufficient strength and courage. You are capable of moving as you like and taking any form at your will. By whom have you been brought to this state and drawn close to death?
data.anv: बलविक्रमसम्पन्ना full of strength and courage, कामगा  able to move at will, कामरूपिणी who can take any form at free will, अन्तकसमागता brought close to death, त्वम् you, केन by whom, इमाम् this kind of, अवस्थाम् situation, नीता is reduced.
data.md: Endowed with strength and prowess, ranging about at will, wearing shapes at pleasure, and resembling the destroyer himself, going to whom hast you come by this condition?

data.v: देवगन्धर्वभूतानामृषीणां च महात्मनाम् । कोऽयमेवं महावीर्यस्त्वां विरूपां चकार ह ।।
data.es: Which valiant person among gods, gandharvas, sages and other great people, has disfigured you like this ?
data.anv: देवगन्धर्वभूतानाम् among gods, gandharvas and other beings, महात्मनाम् among great people, ऋषीणां च and among sages, महावीर्यः a valiant man, कः who, त्वाम् you, एवम् in this way, विरूपाम् disfigured, चकार ह has reduced verily.
data.md: Who among the gods, Gandharvas or creatures or the light souled saints is of such mighty energy as to have deformed you?

data.v: न हि पश्याम्यहं लोके यः कुर्यान्मम विप्रियम् । अन्तरेन सहस्राक्षं महेन्द्रं पाकशासनम् ।।
data.es: I can see none in this world who can offend me, nor even the thousandeyed Indra among the gods.
data.anv: लोके in the world, यः who , विप्रियम् offensive action, कुर्यात् can do, अमरेषु among gods, सहस्राक्षम् thousandeyed, पाकशासनम्  Indra, महेन्द्रम् Indra, अहम् I, न हि पश्यामि I do not see.
data.md: In this world I do not see him that would do me : wrong, not even the mighty Indra, the thousand eyed tamer of the demon Pāka.

data.v: अद्याहं मार्गणैः प्राणानादास्ये जीवितान्तकैः । सलिले क्षीरमासक्तं निष्पिबन्निव सारसः ।।
data.es: Just as the swan drinks only milk from water (mixed with milk), my arrows will (unerringly) drain the life from the enemy's body right now.
data.anv: अद्य right now, अहम् I, सलिले in waters, आसक्तम् mixed, क्षीरम् milk, निष्पिबन् drinking,  सारसः इव like the swan, जीवितान्तकैः  that can put an end to life, मार्गणैः by arrows, प्राणान् life, आदास्ये I will put out.
data.md: a crane Even as afflicted with thirst appropriate milk mixed in water (leaving the latter out), so by means of fleet an lifedestroying shafts I will among the immortals take the life of that chastiser. The frothy blood of whom, having his marrow pierced (by me) and slain by me in battle, dose the Earth wish to drink?

data.v: निहतस्य मया संख्ये शरसंकृत्तमर्मणः । सफेनं रुधिरं रक्तं मेदिनी कस्य पास्यति ।।
data.es: Whose foamy, red blood will the earth drink while I strike his vital organs with my arrows in the fight ?
data.anv: मया by me, सङ्ख्ये in fight, निहतस्य  struck down, शरसंकृत्तमर्मणः vital organs struck by arrows, कस्य whose, सफेनम् foamy, रक्तम् red, रुधिरम् blood, मेदिनी earth, पास्यति will drink.

data.v: कस्य पत्ररथाः कायान्मांसमुत्कृत्य संगताः । प्रहृष्टा भक्षयिष्यन्ति निहतस्य मया रणे ।।
data.es: Whose flesh will be eaten by cheerful flocks of (vultures), biting and tearing his body when he is killed by me in the battle ?
data.anv: मया by me, रणे in war, निहतस्य having been killed, कस्य whose, कायात् from the body, पत्ररथाः birds (vultures), सङ्गताः in groups, प्रहृष्टाः with extreme joy, मांसम् flesh, उत्कृत्य biting and tearing, भक्षयिष्यन्ति will eat.
data.md: Tearing off flesh from the corpse of whom slain by me in conflict, shall the birds so joyfully feed on it?

data.v: तं न देवा न गन्धर्वा न पिशाचा न राक्षसाः । मयापकृष्टं कृपणं शक्तास्त्रातुं महाहवे ।।
data.es: Neither gods nor devils nor gandharvas nor even demons will have the power to rescue that hapless creature dragged by me ruthlessly in the battle.
data.anv: इह here, आहवे in the battle, मया by  me, अपकृष्टम् dragged, तं कृपणम् to that helpless man, त्रातुम् to rescue, देवाः gods, न शक्ताः will not be able, पिशाचाः devils, न not, गन्धर्वाः gandharvas, न राक्षसाः not demons, न not.
data.md: Him, whom I shall wrong mightily, neither the gods, nor the Gandharvas, nor the Piśācas, nor the Rākşasas, will be able to rescue in fierce encounter.

data.v: उपलभ्य शनैः संज्ञां तं मे शंसितुमर्हसि । येन त्वं दुर्विनीतेन वने विक्रम्य निर्जिता ।।
data.es: You should tell me as you slowly regain your consciousness which bragart has overpowered you in the forest with his strength.
data.anv: दुर्विनीतेन which arrogant, येन by whom, त्वम् you, विक्रम्य  showing prowess, वने in the forest, निर्जिता defeated, तम् him, शनैः slowly, संज्ञाम् consciousness, उपलभ्य  recovered, मे to me, शंसितुम्  till, अर्हसि you should.
data.md: Recovering by degrees your sense, it behoves you to tell me what individual it was of execrable character, who by his prowess, half humbled you in the forest.

data.v: इति भ्रातुर्वचः श्रुत्वा क्रुद्धस्य च विशेषतः । ततः शूर्पणखा वाक्यं सबाष्पमिदमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: On hearing her angry brother, Surpanakha replied with words choked with tears:
data.anv: भ्रातु: brothers, विशेषतः specially, क्रुद्धस्य of an angry man, इति thus, वचः words, श्रुत्वा on hearing, ततः thereafter, शूर्पणखा Surpanakha, सबाष्पम् with tears, इदं वाक्यम् these words, अब्रवीत् spoke.
data.md: Hearing these words of his brother, who was under the influence of extreme rage, Sūrpanakhā with tears in her eyes, said.

data.v: तरुणौ रूपसंपन्नौ सुकूमारौ महाबलौ । पुण्डरीकविशालाक्षौ चीरकृष्णाजिनाम्बरौ ।।
data.es: Here are two young sons of Dasaratha, Rama and Lakshmana, who are gentle, handsome, strong, with eyes like white lotus, wearing deerskin and bark robes, living on fruits and roots, selfrestrained like ascetics and following the righteous path.
data.anv: तरुणौ two young men, रूपसम्पन्नौ both very handsome, सुकुमारौ delicate, महाबलौ very strong, पुण्डरीकविशालाक्षौ with eyes like white lotus, चीरकृष्णाजिनाम्बरौ attired in bark robes and black deer skin, फलमूलाशनौ living on fruits and roots, दान्तौ selfrestrained, तापसौ ascetics, धर्मचारिणौ both following righteous path, दशरथस्य Dasaratha's, पुत्रौ sons, रामलक्ष्मणौ Rama  and Lakshmana, भ्रातरौ both brothers, आस्ताम् are here.

data.v: गन्धर्वराजप्रतिमौ पार्थिवव्यञ्जनान्वितौ । देवौ वा मानुषौ वा तौ न तर्कयितुमुत्सहे ।।
data.es: They are kings of the gandharvas with all royal insignia. I was not able to discern whether they are gods or humans.
data.anv: गन्धर्वराजप्रतिमौ looking like kings of the gandharvas, पार्थिवव्यञ्जनान्वितौ having all royal insignia, तौ they both, देवौ वा whether gods, मानुषौ वा or humans, तर्कयितुम्  to guess, न उत्सहे I am not inclined.

data.v: तरुणी रूपसंपन्ना सर्वाभरणभूषिता । दृष्टा तत्र मया नारी तयोर्मध्ये सुमध्यमा ।।
data.es: I saw between them a young, beautiful woman of slender waist, adorned with all kinds of jewels.
data.anv: तत्र there, तयोः of both, मध्ये between, तरुणी young woman, रूपसम्पन्ना very beautiful lady, सर्वाभरणभूषिता adorned with all kinds of jewels, सुमध्यमा a woman of slender waist, नारी lady, दृष्टा was seen.
data.md: And between them I saw there a youthful female furnished with grace, and having a dainty waist; adorned with every kind of ornament.

data.v: ताभ्यामुभाभ्यां संभूय प्रमदामधिकृत्य ताम् । इमामवस्थां नीताहं यथानाथासती तथा ।।
data.es: I have been subjected to this state of an orphan unfaithful woman by both of them for the sake of that lady.
data.anv: ताम् her, प्रमदाम् lady, अधिकृत्य pertaining to her, ताभ्याम् by them, उभाभ्याम् both, अहम् I, अनाथा असती यथा like an orphan, unchaste woman, तथा likewise, इमाम् this, अवस्थाम् state, नीता reduced I am.
data.md: And it is on account of this feinale that I have like one unchaste and uncared for, have come by this condition at their hands.

data.v: तस्याश्चानृजुवृत्तायास्तयोश्च हतयोरहम् । सफेनं पातुमिच्छामि रुधिरं रणमूर्धनि ।।
data.es: I wish to drink the foamy blood of that crooked woman and of both the brothers slain on the battle front.
data.anv: अहम् I, रणमूर्धनि on the battle front, अनृजुवृत्तायाः of that crooked woman, तस्याः च her, हतयोः slain, तयोश्च their, सफेनम् foamy, रुधिरम् blood, पातुम् to drink, इच्छामि I desire.
data.md: Nor I wish in the midst of encounter to drink the frothy blood of that crooked one as well as those two slain (in battle).

data.v: एष मे प्रथमः कामः कृतस्तात त्वया भवेत् । तस्यास्तयोश्च रुधिरं पिबेयमहमाहवे ।।
data.es: O dear this is my first wish and you must fulfil it. I will drink her blood and of the two brothers, in the battle.
data.anv: तात O dear one, मे my, एषः this, प्रथमः first, कामः wish, त्वया by  you, कृतः fulfilled, भवेत् can be, अहम् I, आहवे in a battle, तस्याः her, तयोश्च their, रुधिरम् blood, पिबेयम् be able to drink.
data.md: Let this my prime wish be crowned there with fruition. her and their blood will I drink in dreadful conflict.

data.v: इति तस्यां ब्रुवाणायां चतुर्दश महाबलान् । व्यादिदेश खरः क्रुद्धो राक्षसानन्तकोपमान् ।।
data.es: As she was speaking, the inflamed Khara ordered fourteen very strong demons, comparable to Yama, the god of death, to proceed.
data.anv: तस्याम् as she, इति in that way, ब्रुवाणायाम् while speaking, खरः Khara, क्रुद्धः  angry, महाबलान् very strong ones, अन्तकोपमान्  comparable to Yama (god of death), चतुर्दश राक्षसान् fourteen demons, व्यादिदेश ordered.

data.v: मानुषौ शस्त्रसंपन्नौ चीरकृष्णाजिनाम्बरौ । प्रविष्टौ दण्डकारण्यं घोरं प्रमदया सह ।।
data.es: Two human beings equipped with weapons, clad in bark robes and deerskin have entered the dreadful Dandaka forest along with a woman of bewitching beauty.
data.anv: शस्त्रसम्पन्नौ fully equipped with weapons, मानुषौ two human beings, चीरकृष्णाजिनाम्बरौ robed in bark and deer skin, प्रमदया सह, along with a young woman, घोरम् dreadful, दण्डकारण्यम् Dandaka forest, प्रविष्टौ have entered.

data.v: तौ हत्वा तां च दुर्वृत्तामुपावर्तितुमर्हथ । इयं च रुधिरं तेषां भगिनी मम पास्यति ।।
data.es: I want you to get both of them along with that notorious woman killed. This sister of mine will drink their blood.
data.anv: तौ both of them, दुर्वृत्ताम् woman of bad behaviour, तां च her also, हत्वा after slaying, अपावर्तितुम् get from there, अर्हथ you should, मम my, इयं भगिनी this sister, तेषाम् their, रुधिरम् blood, पास्यति will drink.

data.v: मनोरथोऽयमिष्टोऽस्या भगिन्या मम राक्षसाः । शीघ्रं संपद्यतां गत्वा तौ प्रमथ्य स्वतेजसा ।।
data.es: O demons quickly go and crush them with your power and fulfil my sister's sincere wish.
data.anv: राक्षसाः O demons, स्वेन by your, तेजसा power, तौ both of them, शीघ्रम् quickly, प्रमथ्य after impounding, अस्याः her, मम भगिन्याः my sister's, इष्टः very dear, मनोरथः desire, शीघ्रम् swiftly, सम्पाद्यताम् be fulfiled.
data.md: You Rākşasas, even this is my sister's dear desire. Repairing thither, specdily accomplish this, bearing them down by your native might.

data.v: इति प्रतिसमादिष्टा राक्षसास्ते चतुर्दश । तत्र जग्मुस्तया सार्धं घना वातेरिता यथा ।।
data.es: Thus commanded, the fourteen demons along with Surpanakha rushed there like windblown clouds.
data.anv: इति this way, प्रतिसमादिष्टाः having been ordered, ते they, चतुर्दश fourteen, राक्षसाः demons, तया सार्धम् together with Surpanakha, वातेरिताः as if blown by wind, घनाः यथा like clouds, तत्र there, जग्मुः went.
data.md: Thus commissioned, those fourteen Räksasas set out there like clouds driven by the winds, accompanied by Śürpanakhā.

data.v: ततः शूर्पणखा घोरा राघवाश्रममागता । रक्षसामाचचक्षे तौ भ्रातरौ सह सीतया ।।
data.es: The frightful Surpanakha came to the hermitage of Rama and showed both the brothers and Sita to the demons.
data.anv: ततः thereafter, घोरा frightful, शूर्पणखा Surpanakha, राघवाश्रमम् Rama's hermitage, आगता came, राक्षसान् to the demons, सह सीतया with Sita, भ्रातरौ brothers, तौ both, आचचक्षे spoke about.
data.md: Then the grim Śūrpanakhā, coming to Rāghava's asylum pointed out to the Rākşasas those brother in company with Sītā.

data.v: ते रामं पर्णशालायामुपविष्टं महाबलम् । ददृशुः सीतया सार्धं वैदेह्या लक्ष्मणेन च ।।
data.es: Deluded with passion, Surpanakha said to formidable Rama, the scorcher of foes, seated in the leafthatched hut along with Sita:
data.anv: काममोहिता deluded with passion, सा she, सीतया सह with Sita, पर्णशालायाम् in the leafthatched hut, उपविष्टं seated, परन्तपम् tormentor of foes, Rama, दुर्धर्षम् formidable, रामम् Rama, अब्रवीत् said.
data.md: And they saw the mighty Rāma seated in the cottage in company with Sītā, and ministered to by Laksmana.

data.v: तान्दृष्ट्वा राघवः श्रीमानागतां तां च राक्षसीम् । अब्रवीद्भ्रातरं रामो लक्ष्मणं दीप्ततेजसं ।।
data.es: Seeing the demons along with Surpanakha arrive, said the handsome Rama, scion of the Raghu dynasty to his brother Lakshmana, who was blazing like fire :
data.anv: श्रीमान् handsome, राघवः scion of the Raghu dynasty, रामः Rama, आगतान् those who arrived, तान् them, तां राक्षसीम्  to the demoness, दृष्ट्वा  seeing, दीप्ततेजसम्  blazing like fire, भ्रातरम् brother, लक्ष्मणम् to Lakshmana, अब्रवीत् said.
data.md: And seeing her, as well as the Rākşasas who had come, Rāma remarked to his brother, Lakşınaņa of flaming energy.

data.v: मुहूर्तं भव सौमित्रे सीतायाः प्रत्यनन्तरः । इमानस्या वधिष्यामि पदवीमागतानिह ।।
data.es: O Lakshmana stand by Sita for a while. I shall kill these demons who have come here.
data.anv: सौमित्रे O Lakshmana, मुहूर्तम् for a while, सीतायाः to Sita, प्रत्यनन्तरः stand by, भव you may be, अस्याः her, पदवीम् in the way, इह here, आगतान् those who came in, इमान् these to, वधिष्यामि will kill.
data.md: O Sumitrā's son, do you for a while guard Sītā. I shall slay these that have come to this asylum here.

data.v: वाक्यमेतत्ततः श्रुत्वा रामस्य विदितात्मनः । तथेति लक्ष्मणो वाक्यं रामस्य प्रत्यपूजयत् ।।
data.es: Lakshmana heard him and in turn honoured the word of Rama, knower of the self.
data.anv: ततः then, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, विदितात्मनः knower of the self, रामस्य Rama's, एतत् this, वाक्यम् statement, श्रुत्वा after hearing, तथेति agreeing to, रामस्य  Rama's, वाक्यम् statement, प्रत्यपूजयत् in turn honoured.
data.md: Hearing these words of Rāma versed in the knowledge of self, Lakşmaņa honoured his speech by saying, So be it.

data.v: राघवोऽपि महच्चापं चामीकरविभूषितम् । चकार सज्यं धर्मात्मा तानि रक्षांसि चाब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Righteous Rama too, lifted up his great bow decked with gold and fastened the string and then said to the demons:
data.anv: धर्मात्मा righteous man, राघवोऽपि Rama too, चामीकरविभूषितम् decked with gold, महत् great, चापम् bow, सज्यम् stringed, चकार made, तानि those, रक्षांसि to the demons, अब्रवीत् च said.
data.md: And the righteous Rāghava strung his mighty bow decked with gold; and addressed the Raksasas.

data.v: पुत्रौ दशरथस्यावां भ्रातरौ रामलक्ष्मणौ । प्रविष्टौ सीतया सार्धं दुश्चरं दण्डकावनम् ।।
data.es: Rama and Lakshmana, the two sons of Dasaratha along with Sita, wife of Rama, have arrived at the hermitage.
data.anv: रामः Rama, लक्ष्मण एव च Lakshmana also, दशरथस्य Dasaratha's, इमौ both, पुत्रौ sons, भार्यया with wife, सीतया सह accompanied by Sita, आश्रमपदम् to the hermitage, प्रविष्टौ entered.
data.md: We that have entered into this untraceable forest of Dandaka in company with Sītā are the sons of Dasaratha, the brothers, Rama and Lakşmana. Why do you intend to do injury to us. Subsisting on fruits and roots, having our senses under control, carrying on asceticism and leading a Brahmacarya life, we are passing our days in the forest of Dandaka.

data.v: फलमूलाशनौ दान्तौ तापसौ धर्मचारिणौ । वसन्तौ दण्डकारण्ये किमर्थमुपहिंसथ ।।
data.es: Feeding on fruits and roots and following the righteous path, we are living in Dandaka forest like ascetics. Why are you torturing us?
data.anv: फलमूलाशिनौ both survive on fruits and roots etc, दान्तौ both are selfrestrained, धर्मचारिणौ both follow the righteous path, दण्डकारण्ये in Dandaka forest, वसन्तौ living, तापसौ ascetics, किमर्थम् why, उपहिंसथ torment.

data.v: युष्मान्पापात्मकान्हन्तुं विप्रकारान्महावने । ऋषीणां तु नियोगेन प्राप्तोऽहं सशरासनः ।।
data.es: I came here equipped with bows, arrows and weapons, asked by ascetics to kill in the battle sinners like you who are offending them.
data.anv: अहम् I, पापात्मकान् sinners, विप्रकारान् offenders, युष्मान् you, आहवे in war, हन्तुम् to kill, सशरायुधः equipped with bows, arrows and weapons, ऋषीणाम् of ascetics, नियोगेन by their order, प्राप्तः came.
data.md: It is do destroy you, wicked, and troublesome that I equipped with the bow have come here at the desire of the saints.

data.v: तिष्ठतैवात्र संतुष्टा नोपसर्पितुमर्हथ । यदि प्राणैरिहार्थो वो निवर्तध्वं निशाचराः ।।
data.es: If you care for your life, you may return, or else, if you please you may remain (die) here, O demons.
data.anv: सन्तुष्टाः satisfied, निशाचराः demons, अत्रैव here only, तिष्ठतः you may stay, उपावर्तितुम् to return, न अर्हथ you should not, यदि वा or else, प्राणैः with life, अर्थः purpose, निवर्तध्वम् you may return.
data.md: Stay there content you should not move further. If you have a care for your lives, desist, you rangers of the night.

data.v: तस्य तद्वचनं श्रुत्वा राक्षसास्ते चतुर्दश । ऊचुर्वाचं सुसंक्रुद्धा ब्रह्मघ्नः शूलपाणयः ।।
data.es: At these words, the destroyers of brahmins, the fourteen demons were inflamed. They lifted their spears and spoke:
data.anv: तस्य his, तत् वचनम् those words, श्रुत्वा on hearing, ब्रह्मघ्नाः destroyers of brahmins, शूलपाणयः spears in hand, ते those, चतुर्दश राक्षसाः fourteen demons, सुसङ्क्रुद्धाः very angry, वाचम् words, ऊचुः spoke.
data.md: Hearing those words of his, those fourteen grim Rākşasas bearing darts in their hands, exceedingly enraged, with their eyes reddened, breathing high spirits, harshly said to the sweetspeeched Rāma, having his eyes reddened whose prowess they had not seen before.

data.v: संरक्तनयना घोरा रामं रक्तान्तलोचनम् । परुषा मधुराभाषं हृष्टादृष्टपराक्रमम् ।।
क्रोधमुत्पाद्य नो भर्तुः खरस्य सुमहात्मनः । त्वमेव हास्यसे प्राणानद्यास्माभिर्हतो युधि ।।
data.es: You have incited the wrath of Khara, our great master for which you will now pay with your life in the fight.
data.anv: नः our, भर्तुः lord's, सुमहात्मनः of great, खरस्य Khara's, क्रोधम् wrath, उत्पाद्य causing, अद्य now, अस्माभिः by us, युधि in the fight, हतः killed, त्वमेव you alone, प्राणान् life, हास्यसे will give up.
data.md: Having excited there our lord. the high-souled Khara, it is you that shal: lose your life no later than this day, being slain by us in battle.

data.v: का हि ते शक्तिरेकस्य बहूनां रणमूर्धनि । अस्माकमग्रतः स्थातुं किं पुनर्योद्धुमाहवे ।।
data.es: How can you face us alone? We outnumber you? Leave alone fighting, you cannot even stand in front of us.
data.anv: बहूनाम् by many, अस्माकम् of us, अग्रतः in front of, रणमूर्धनि at the head of the battle, स्थातुम् to stand, एकस्य of  one, ते to you, का शक्तिः where is the power, आहवे in war, योद्धुम् to fight, किं पुनः why again.
data.md: What power hast you, being one to stay before us many in the field, what shall I say of your coping with us in conflict?

data.v: एभिर्बाहुप्रयुक्तैर्नः परिघैः शूलपट्टिशैः । प्राणांस्त्यक्ष्यसि वीर्यं च धनुश्च करपीडितम् ।।
data.es: Come on with daggers and sharpedged spears hurled, you will give up your life,your prowess as well as the bow held in your hand.
data.anv: एहि come on, नः us, बाहुप्रयुक्तैः by those dicharged by our arms, परिघैः by daggers, शूलपट्टिशै spears with sharp, प्राणान् your life, वीर्यं च prowess, करपीडितम् held by hand, धनुश्च the bow aslo, त्यक्षसि will shun.
data.md: In consequence of the parighas (iron-clubs), darts, and pattisas (a kind of sharp-edged sword) discharged by our arms, you will surely lose your life, along with your prowess, and this bow which you press with your hand.

data.v: इत्येवमुक्त्वा संरब्धा राक्षसास्ते चतुर्दश । उद्यतायुधनिस्त्रिंशा राममेवाभिदुद्रुवुः । चिक्षिपुस्तानि शूलानि राघवं प्रति दुर्जयम् ।।
data.es: Saying these words, the fourteen infuriated demons hurled their spears at invincible Rama.
data.anv: सङ्कृद्धाः mighty angry, ते those , राक्षसाः demons, इत्येवम् thus, उक्त्वा after saying, तानि शूलानि those spears, दुर्जयम् invincible, राघवं प्रति on Rama, चिक्षिपुः hurled.
data.md: Having said this in wrath, those fourteen Rākşasas, uplifting their weapons and daggers rushed towards Rāma.

data.v: तानि शूलानि काकुत्स्थः समस्तानि चतुर्दश । तावद्भिरेव चिच्छेद शरैः काञ्चनभूषणैः ।।
data.es: All the fourteen spears hurled turned into splinters by the same number of golden arrows released by Rama.
data.anv: काकुत्स्थ Rama, चतुर्दश fourteen, तानि शूलानि their spears, समस्तानि all of them, तावद्भि: by equal number, एव only, काञ्चनभूषणैः decorated with gold, शरैः with arrows, चिच्छेद cut to pieces.

data.v: ततः पश्चान्महातेजा नाराचान्सूर्यसंनिभान् । जग्राह परमक्रुद्धश्चतुर्दश शिलाशितान् ।।
data.es: Then the effulgent Rama, mighty angry, took fourteen arrows sharpened by stones and glowing like the Sun.
data.anv: ततः then, महातेजाः effulgent, परमक्रुद्धः  enraged, शिलाशितान् sharpened by stone, सूर्यसन्निभान् glowing like the Sun, चतुर्दश fourteen, नाराचान् arrows, जग्राह took.

data.v: गृहीत्वा धनुरायम्य लक्ष्यानुद्दिश्य राक्षसान् । मुमोच राघवो बाणान्वज्रानिव शतक्रतुः ।।
data.es: Rama took the bow, stretched it and aimed at his target, the demons and sent the arrows as Indra would release the thunderbolt.
data.anv: राघवः Rama, धनुः bow, गृहीत्वा on taking, आयम्य after stretching, लक्ष्यान् the target, राक्षसान् the demons,  उद्दिश्य aiming at, शतक्रतुः like Indra, वज्रानिव like thunderbolt, बाणान् arrows, मुमोच released.

data.v: रुक्मपुङ्खाश्च विशिखाः प्रदीप्ता हेमभूषणाः । अन्तरिक्षे महोल्कानां बभूवुस्तुल्यवर्चसः ।।
ते भित्त्वा रक्षसां वेगाद्वक्षांसि रुधिराप्लुताः । विनिष्पेतुस्तदा भूमौ न्यमज्जन्ताशनिस्वनाः ।।
data.es: Goldfeathered blazing arrows decorated with gold, released by Rama flew fast and pierced the chests of the demons. Drenched in blood they (the arrows) thundered (out of their chests) and plunged into the earth.
data.anv: रुक्मपुङ्खाः feathered with gold, दीप्ताः blazing, हेमविभूषिताः decorated with gold, ते those, विशिखाः arrows, वेगात् speedily, रक्षसाम् the demons, वक्षांसि their chests, भित्त्वा piercing, रुधिराप्लुताः  drenched in blood, तदा then, विनिष्पेतुः fell down, अशनिस्वनाः creating sounds like thunder, भूमौ on earth, न्यमज्जन्त pierced into.
data.md: And those Rākşasas, their breasts pierced with vehemence, and themselves bathed in blood, fell down to the carth, like snakes dropping down from an ant hill.

data.v: ते भिन्नहृदया भूमौ छिन्नमूला इव द्रुमाः । निपेतुः शोणितार्द्राङ्गा विकृता विगतासवः ।।
data.es: With their hearts split, their bodies drenched in blood, disfigured and lifeless, the demons fell down on earth like trees cut at the roots.
data.anv: ते they, भिन्नहृदयाः  with pierced hearts, शोणितार्द्राङ्गाः bodies drenched in blood, विकृताः disfigured, विगतासवः with their life gone, छिन्नमूलाः  cut at the roots, द्रुमाः इव like trees, भूमौ on earth, निपेतुः fell down.
data.md: And with their breasts pierced, they, dripping with blood, deformed and deprived of their lives, lay on the ground like trees whose roots have been severed.

data.v: तान्भूमौ पतितान्दृष्ट्वा राक्षसी क्रोधमूर्छिता । परित्रस्ता पुनस्तत्र व्यसृजद्भैरवं रवम् ।।
data.es: Seeing the demons fallen on the ground, the demoness wild with anger and fear roared.
data.anv: भूमौ on the ground, पतितान् fell down, तान् those, दृष्ट्वा seeing, राक्षसी the demoness,  (Surpanakha), क्रोधमूर्छिता  wild with anger, परित्रस्ता frightened, तत्र there, पुनः again, भैरवस्वनान् frihghtening sound, व्यसृजत् released.

data.v: सा नदन्ती महानादं जवाच्छूर्पणखा पुनः । उपगम्य खरं सा तु किंचित्संशुष्क शोणिता । पपात पुनरेवार्ता सनिर्यासेव वल्लरी ।।
data.es: Her blood slightly dried up, she came back afflicted to Khara and fell down like a sallaki tree, its sap oozing.
data.anv: किञ्चित् slightly, संशुष्कशोणिता blood dried up, सनिर्यासा juice exuded, सल्लकी इव like a sallaki tree, सा she, तु but, आर्ता afflicted, खरम् to Khara, उपगम्य coming, पुनरेव again, पपात fell down.
data.md: Seeing them fallen-on the ground, the Rākşasī, beyond herself in wrath, approaching Khara, with her blood a little dried up, again in distressful guise threw herself on the earth, like a plant exuding gum.

data.v: निपातितान्प्रेक्ष्य रणे तु राक्षसा;न्प्रधाविता शूर्पणखा पुनस्ततः । वधं च तेषां निखिलेन रक्षसां; शशंस सर्वं भगिनी खरस्य सा ।।
data.es: When Surpanakha saw the demons fall dead on the battleground, she ran to Khara,her brother and told in detail about the death of the demons.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये अरण्यकाण्डे विंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the twentieth sarga of Aranyakanda of the holy Ramayana the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: शूर्पणखा Surpanakha, रणे in the fight, निपातितान् fallen, राक्षसान् demons, दृश्य seeing, पुनः ततः then, प्रधाविता she ran, भगिनी sister, रक्षसाम् of demons, वधम् about the death, सर्वम् all, निखिलेन in detail, खरस्य to Khara, शशंस told.
data.md: Seeing those Rākşasas slain in battle, Śūrpanakhā again hastened (to his brother); and the sister of Khara, related in detail the slaughter of those Rākşasas.

data.v: स पुनः पतितां दृष्ट्वा क्रोधाच्छूर्पणखां खरः । उवाच व्यक्तता वाचा तामनर्थार्थमागताम् ।।
data.es: Seeing Surpanakha collapse, Khara said in clear terms about the unfortunate situation she had created:
data.anv: सः खरः Khara, पुनः again, पतिताम्  fallen down, शूर्पणखाम् Surpanakha, दृष्ट्वा saw, अनर्थार्थम् unfortunate situation, आगताम्  who came, ताम् her, व्यक्तया in a clear, वाचा words, क्रोधात् angrily, उवाच spoke.
data.md: Seeing Sūrpanakhă again lying on the ground, Khara in anger spoke out to that one, who had come to bring on evil.

data.v: मया त्विदानीं शूरास्ते राक्षसा रुधिराशनाः । त्वत्प्रियार्थं विनिर्दिष्टाः किमर्थं रुद्यते पुनः ।।
data.es: The valiant demons who feed on blood have been commissioned for your pleasure. Why are you crying again?
data.anv: मया myself, त्वत्प्रियार्थम् for your pleasure, इदानीम् just now, रुधिराशनाः  who feed on blood, शूराः heroes, ते राक्षसाः those demons, विनिर्दिष्टाः commissioned, पुनः again, किमर्थम् for what reason, रुद्यते  crying.
data.md: I had but recently commissioned for your behoof those heroic Rākşasas living on flesh. Why then do you again weep?

data.v: भक्ताश्चैवानुरक्ताश्च हिताश्च मम नित्यशः । घ्नन्तोऽपि न निहन्तव्या न न कुर्युर्वचो मम ।।
data.es: They are loyal and faithful to me. They are always my wellwishers. Even when attacked, they cannot be killed. They never fail to carry out my orders.
data.anv: भक्ताश्चैव  devoted, अनुरक्ताश्च  fond of me, नित्यशः always, मम to me, हिताश्च wellwishers, हन्यमानाः while they are being attacked, न हन्यन्ते are not killed , मम my, वचः words, न न कुर्युः never fail to carry out my orders.
data.md: Bearing regard and attached to me, and ever engaged in my welfare, they, assailed by others, are incapable of being slain; nor do they not obey my orders.

data.v: किमेतच्छ्रोतुमिच्छामि कारणं यत्कृते पुनः । हा नाथेति विनर्दन्ती सर्पवद्वेष्टसे क्षितौ ।।
data.es: I wish to know what makes you lament and roll on the ground like a serpent and hissing?
data.anv: यत्कृते for what reason, हा नाथ Ha Lord, इति saying like that, विनर्दन्ती lamenting, पुनः again, सर्पवत् like a serpent, क्षितौ on the ground, लुठसि you are rolling, एतत् this, कारणम् reason, किम् why, श्रोतुम् to hear, इच्छामि I wish.
data.md: What can it be? I would hear of the occasion owing to which again, crying ‘Ah lord,' you roll on the earth like a serpent.

data.v: अनाथवद्विलपसि किं नु नाथे मयि स्थिते । उत्तिष्ठोत्तिष्ठ मा भैषीर्वैक्लव्यं त्यज्यतामिह ।।
data.es: When I am here like a lord to protect you, why do you weep like an orphan? Get up. Give up your anxiety. Be not afraid.
data.anv: नाथे as lord, मयि me, संस्थिते is present, अनाथवत् like an orphan, विलपसि you are weeping, उत्तिष्ठ you get up, मा भैषीः do not fear, इह now, वैक्लब्यम् worry, त्यज्यताम् may be given up.
data.md: Why do you be weep like one forlorn, while I your lord, am living? Arise! Arise! Do not fear, cast off your stupor.

data.v: इत्येवमुक्ता दुर्धर्षा खरेण परिसान्त्विता । विमृज्य नयने सास्रे खरं भ्रातरमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Thus consoled by Khara, invincible Surpanakha wiped her tearful eyes and said to her brother:
data.anv: इत्येवम् thus, उक्ता addressed, खरेण by Khara, परिसान्त्विता pacified, दुर्दर्षा in invincible woman, सास्रे tearful, नयने eyes, विमृज्य wiping, भ्रातरम् to brother, खरम् to Khara, अब्रवीत् said.
data.md: Thus addressed, and consoled by Khara, that irrepressible one, wiping her eyes, spoke to Khara.

data.v: प्रेषिताश्च त्वया शूरा राक्षसास्ते चतुर्दश । निहन्तुं राघवं घोरा मत्प्रियार्थं सलक्ष्मणम् ।।
data.es: O warrior you had sent, out of anger, fourteen demons to put an end to Rama along with Lakshmana in order to please me.
data.anv: वीर O hero, त्वया by you, क्रोधात् out of anger, मत्प्रियार्थम् to please me, सलक्ष्मणम् along with Lakshmana, राघवम् Rama, निहन्तुम् to kill, ते those, चतुर्दश fourteen, राक्षसाः demons, प्रेषिताः were sent.
data.md: And you also had despatched fourteen heroic Rākṣasas, for my hehoof, for slaying the terrific Rāghava along with Lakşmaņa. But all those, bearing ill will (towards Rāma), bearing darts and pattiśas in their hands, have been slain in conflict by means of weapons penetrating into the vitals.

data.v: ते तु रामेण सामर्षाः शूलपट्टिशपाणयः । समरे निहताः सर्वे सायकैर्मर्मभेदिभिः ।।
data.es: The demons who went with spears in their hands were killed, their hearts pierced by Rama's arrows.
data.anv: सामर्षाः those spirited ones, शूलपट्टसपाणयः with spears in hands, ते those, सर्वे all, रामेण by Rama, मर्मभेदिभिः hearts pierced, सायकैः by arrows, निहताः killed.

data.v: तान्भूमौ पतितान्दृष्ट्वा क्षणेनैव महाबलान् । रामस्य च महत्कर्म महांस्त्रासोऽभवन्मम ।।
data.es: Seeing the powerful demons collapse on the ground in a moment's time through Rama's action, I was frightened.
data.anv: क्षणेनैव in moments, भूमौ on earth, पतितान् fallen down, महाबलान् mighty ones, तान् them, रामस्य Rama's, महत् great, कर्म च action, दृष्ट्वा seeing, मम to me, महान् powerful, त्रासः fear, अभवत् befell.
data.md: Seeing those possessed of great speed, in a moment laid low on the ground, as well as (witnessing) Rāma's mighty deed, great fear has taken possession of me.

data.v: सास्मि भीता समुद्विग्ना विषण्णा च निशाचर । शरणं त्वां पुनः प्राप्ता सर्वतो भयदर्शिनी ।।
data.es: O demon I am scared and sad. To me everything looks frightening. I, therefore, seek refuge in you.
data.anv: निशाचर O demon , अहम् I, समुद्विग्ना scared, विषण्णा sad, च and, अस्मि am, सर्वतः all over, भयदर्शिनी  fear in sight, पुनः again, त्वाम् your, शरणं प्राप्ता sought refuge in you.
data.md: O ranger of the night, I am afraid, and agitated, and cast down. I have (at length) found in you a refuge, seeing fear on all sides. Will you not rescue me who am sinking in this ocean of grief, having sorrow for its alligators and affright for billows?

data.v: विषादनक्राध्युषिते परित्रासोर्मिमालिनि । किं मां न त्रायसे मग्नां विपुले शोकसागरे ।।
data.es: I am drowned in a vast sea of sorrow where crocodiles in the form of distress reside. It is full of rows of waves of fright. Why do you not save me?
data.anv: विषादनक्राध्युषिते  by crocodiles of distress, परित्रासोर्मिमालिनि filled with rows of waves of fright, विपुले  vast , शोकसागरे  in sea of sorrow, मग्नाम् drowned, माम् me, किम् why, न त्रायसे you do not save?
data.md: O ranger of the night, I am afraid, and agitated, and cast down. I have (at length) found in you a refuge, seeing fear on all sides. Will you not rescue me who am sinking in this ocean of grief, having sorrow for its alligators and affright for billows?

data.v: एते च निहता भूमौ रामेण निशितैः शरैः । ये च मे पदवीं प्राप्ता राक्षसाः पिशिताशनाः ।।
data.es: The demons who live on flesh, who came following me fell down on earth and lay dead, shot by the sharp arrows of Rama.
data.anv: पिशिताशनाः  carnivorous, ये those, राक्षसाः demons, मे my, पदवीम् path, प्राप्ता came, एते च these, रामेण by Rama, भूमौ on the earth, निशितैः by sharp, शरैः arrows, निहताः were killed.
data.md: And these Rākşasas, living on flesh who had arrived at that place, have been slain by Rāma with sharpened shafts.

data.v: मयि ते यद्यनुक्रोशो यदि रक्षःसु तेषु च । रामेण यदि शक्तिस्ते तेजो वास्ति निशाचर । दण्डकारण्यनिलयं जहि राक्षसकण्टकम् ।।
data.es: O demon if you have compassion for me or for the demons, if you have the power and energy to face Rama, kill the enemy of the demons living in Dandaka forest.
data.anv: निशाचर O nightranger, ते yours, मयि in me, तेषु among them, रक्षस्सु च on demons, अनुक्रोशः have compassion, अस्ति यदि if you have, ते to you, रामेण equal to Rama, शक्तिः power, तेजो वा or brilliance, अस्ति यदि if you have, दण्डकारण्यनिलयम् living inDandaka forest, राक्षसकण्टकम् enemy of demons, जहि kill.
data.md: If you have any kindness for me as well as those sons of Rākşasas* and, O ranger of night, if you have strength and energy to cope with Rāma, do you kill this thorn of the Rákşasas, who has set up his dwelling in the forest of Dandaka. Another reading is that enemy of mine.

data.v: यदि रामं ममामित्रमद्य त्वं न वधिष्यसि । तव चैवाग्रतः प्राणांस्त्यक्ष्यामि निरपत्रपा ।।
data.es: If now you do not kill that Rama, my enemy, O shameless one, I will give up my life in your very presence.
data.anv: मम my, अमित्रम् enemy, रामम् that Rama, त्वम् you, अद्य now, न वधिष्यसि यदि if you do not kill, निरपत्रप O shameless one, तव your, अग्रतः presence, प्राणान् life, त्यक्ष्यामि will give up.
data.md: If you do not to-day slay that destroyer of foes, Rāma, I shall banishing shame, give up my life in your very presence.

data.v: बुद्ध्याहमनुपश्यामि न त्वं रामस्य संयुगे । स्थातुं प्रतिमुखे शक्तः सचापस्य महारणे ।।
data.es: Instinctively I can foresee that you and your army do not have the capability to encounter that great Rama in a fight.
data.anv: त्वम् you, सबलश्च with your army too, संयुगे in an encounter, महात्मनः of the great man, रामस्य Rama's, प्रतिमुखे face to face, स्थातुम् to stand, न शक्तः you are not capable, अहम् I, बुद्ध्या through my intellect, अनुपश्यामि I can foresee.
data.md: Meseems, you backed by your forecast are incapable of staying in battle before Rāma in high encounter. Some texts-(Rāma) equipped with the bow.

data.v: शूरमानी न शूरस्त्वं मिथ्यारोपितविक्रमः । मानुषौ यन्न शक्नोषि हन्तुं तौ रामलक्ष्मणौ ।।
data.es: You call yourself a hero, yet are not able to kill two humans like Rama and Lakshmana. Your claim to heroism is false. You are not a hero at all.
data.anv: यः who, मानुषौ two humans, तौ रामलक्ष्मणौ those Rama and Lakshmana, हन्तुम् to kill, न शक्नोषि you are not able to, त्वम् you, शूरमानी calling yourself a hero, नशूरः त्वम् you are not a hero, मिथ्यारोपितविक्रमः your claim to be a hero is false.

data.v: अपयाहि जनस्थानात्त्वरितः सहबान्धवः । निःसत्त्वस्याल्पवीर्यस्य वासस्ते कीदृशस्त्विह ।।
data.anv: निस्सत्वस्य of a man who has no strength, अल्पवीर्यस्य of less valiant one, ते your, इह here, वास: stay, कीदृशः what kind of, सहबान्धव: with your relations, त्वरितः quickly, जनस्थानात् from this Janasthana, अपयाहि go away.

data.v: रामतेजोऽभिभूतो हि त्वं क्षिप्रं विनशिष्यसि । स हि तेजःसमायुक्तो रामो दशरथात्मजः । भ्राता चास्य महावीर्यो येन चास्मि विरूपिता ।।
data.es: Let down by the brilliance of Rama, son of Dasaratha, you will be soon destroyed. He is mighty and his brother who has disfigured me is very valiant.
data.anv: त्वं you, रामतेजोभिभूतः let down by the brilliance of Rama, क्षिप्रं swiftly, हि indeed, विनशिष्यसि you will be surely destroyed, सः he, हि दशरथात्मजः son of Dasaratha, रामः Rama, तेजस्समायुक्तः endowed with brilliance, येन by whom, विरूपिता अस्मि I am disfigured, अस्य भ्राता च and his brother, महावीर्यः a very valiant man.
data.md: Overcome by the energy of Rāma, you shall speedily meet with destruction Dasaratha's son, Rāma, you shall speedily meet with destruction. Dasaratha's son, is endued with energy. His brother is possessed of high vigour by whom I have come to be deformed.

data.v: एवमाधर्षितः शूरः शूर्पणख्या खरस्तदा । उवाच रक्षसां मध्ये खरः खरतरं वचः ।।
data.es: Ashamed and accused thus in the presence of the demons, the valiant Khara spoke to Surpanakha in harsh words:
data.anv: ततः then, शूर्पणख्या by Surpanakha, एवम् in that way, रक्षसाम् of demons, मध्ये in the midst, आधर्षितः put to shame, शूरः hero, खरः Khara, खरतरम् harsher, वचः words, उवाच spoke.
data.md: On being thus taunted by Śūrpanakha, Khara spoke these sharp words in the midst of the Raksasas.

data.v: तवापमानप्रभवः क्रोधोऽयमतुलो मम । न शक्यते धारयितुं लवणाम्भ इवोत्थितम् ।।
data.es: Like the overslowing salt sea water, I am unable to contain this my excessive anger arising out of your insult.
data.anv: तव your, अवमानप्रभवः arising out of insult, मम mine, अतुलः incomparable, अयं क्रोधः this anger, उल्बणम् excessive, लवणाम्भः salt water, इव like, धारयितुम् to bear, न शक्यते is not possible for me.
data.md: Arising from this your humiliating censure, my wrath is beyond compare. I can not bear it, like salt-water cast on a sore.

data.v: न रामं गणये वीर्यान्मानुषं क्षीणजीवितम् । आत्मा दुश्चरितैः प्राणान्हतो योऽद्य विमोक्ष्यति ।।
data.es: Rama is a shortlived human. I do not care for his valour. His life span will be shortened (he will be killed) now for his own misdeeds.
data.anv: मानुषम् human being, क्षीणजीवितम् shortlived, रामम् Rama, वीर्यात् due to valour, न गणये I do not count, यः he who has, आत्मदुश्चरितैः by his own bad conduct, हतः be killed, अद्य now, प्राणान् life, विमोक्ष्यते will leave.
data.md: From my prowess I count not Rāma who is a human being possessed of a frail life him who slain by me shall to-day in consequence of his misdeed give up existence.

data.v: बाष्पः संह्रियतामेष संभ्रमश्च विमुच्यताम् । अहं रामः सह भ्रात्रा नयामि यमसादनम् ।।
data.es: Restrain your tears and your anxieties I will send Rama along with his brother to the abode of Yama.
data.anv: एषः this, बाष्पः tears, संह्रियाताम् may be controlled, सम्भ्रमश्च anxiety also, विमुच्यताम् give up, अहम् I, रामम् Rama, भ्रात्रा सह along with his brother, यमसादनम् to the abode of Yama, नयामि l will send.
data.md: Restrain your tears, and remove your fear. I shall despatch a Rāma along with his brother to the abode of Yama.

data.v: परश्वधहतस्याद्य मन्दप्राणस्य भूतले । रामस्य रुधिरं रक्तमुष्णं पास्यसि राक्षसि ।।
data.es: With his life ebbing out, killed by my axe in the fight, you will drink today, O demoness, Rama's red, hot blood.
data.anv: राक्षसि O demoness, अद्य now, संयुगे in the fight, परश्वथहतस्य of one killed by an axe, मन्दप्राणस्य whose life has gone slow, रामस्य Rama's, रक्तम् red, उष्णम् hot, रुधिरम् blood, पास्यसि you can drink.
data.md: You shall O Rākşasī, quaff on the ground the hot blood of Rāma of evil life, slain by my axe.

data.v: सा प्रहृष्ट्वा वचः श्रुत्वा खरस्य वदनाच्च्युतम् । प्रशशंस पुनर्मौर्ख्याद्भ्रातरं रक्षसां वरम् ।।
data.es: On hearing the words that came out of Khara's mouth, she was pleased. And in stupidity began praising her brother once again as the best of demons.
data.anv: सा she, खरस्य Khara's, वदनात् from the mouth, च्युतम् that came out, वचः the words, श्रुत्वा on hearing, प्रहृष्टा she was pleased, मौर्ख्यात् due to stupidity, भ्रातरम् to the brother, रक्षसाम् among demons, वरम् great, पुनः again, प्रशशंस she praised.
data.md: Overjoyed on hearing the words that dropped from Khara's mouth, she again through fickleness extolled that foremost of Rākşasas, her brother.

data.v: तया परुषितः पूर्वं पुनरेव प्रशंसितः । अब्रवीद्दूषणं नाम खरः सेनापतिं तदा ।।
data.es: Khara, accused by her earlier and admired again, said to Dusana, chief of army:
data.anv: तया by her, पूर्वम् earlier, परुषितः been acused, पुनरेव again, प्रशंसितः was praised, खरः Khara, तदा then, दूषणं नाम Dooshana by name, सेनापतिम् army chief, अब्रवीत् said.
data.md: At first reprimanded by her and then praised, Khara spoke to is general, named Dusana.

data.v: चतुर्दश सहस्राणि मम चित्तानुवर्तिनाम् । रक्षसीं भीमवेगानां समरेष्वनिवर्तिनाम् ।।
data.es: There are fourteen thousand demons at my command ready to act according to my will. They are warriors of terrific speed and will not retreat from the fight.
data.anv: मम my, चित्तानुवर्तिनाम् acting according to will, भीमवेगानाम् of terrific speed, समरेषु in war, अनिवर्तिनाम् never turn back, रक्षसाम् of demons, चतुर्दश fourteen, सहस्राणि thousand.
data.md: Do you, O gentle one, array fourteen thousand of those those Rākṣasas, gifted with furious vehemence, ever following my wish, who never turn away froin the field; who are hued like to purple clouds, who revel in cruelty*, and who are elated (in consequence of their prowess). *The North-West Province's text has some additional sloka:-Dreadful, wearing forms at will, possessing the pride of the lion, having large mouth, high-souled, revelling in cruelty, endued with strength, of fierce energy.

data.v: नीलजीमूतवर्णानां घोराणां क्रूरकर्मणाम् । लोकसिंहाविहाराणां बलिनामुग्रतेजसाम् ।।
data.es: They are of the colour of the dark blue cloud, dreadful and merciless, strong and powerful fighters who roam about forturing people.
data.anv: नीलजीमूतवर्णानाम् of the colour of the dark blue cloud, घोराणां of dreadful, कृ़रकर्मणाम् those who commit cruel acts लोकहिंसाविहाराणां those who roam about torturing people, बलिनाम् of the strong, उग्रतेजसाम् very powerful people.

data.v: तेषां शार्दूलदर्पाणां महास्यानां महौजसाम् । सर्वोद्योगमुदीर्णानां रक्षसां सौम्य कारय ।।
data.es: O handsome one, get them all, powerful like tigers, demons with large countenances, mighty and arragant, ready (for the fight).
data.anv: सौम्यः handsome, शार्दूलदर्पाणां powerful like tigers, महास्यानां having large countenances, महौजसाम् mighty, उदीर्णानाम् of the arrogant, तेषां of all such, रक्षसां demons, सर्वोद्योगं कारय get ready.

data.v: उपस्थापय मे क्षिप्रं रथं सौम्य धनूंषि च । शरांश्च चित्रान्खड्गांश्च शक्तीश्च विविधाः शिताः ।।
data.es: O goodnatured one, get my chariot, bows and arrows, wonderful swords of different kinds and sharp missiles ready quickly.
data.anv: सौम्य O good natured one, मे my, रथम् chariot, धनूंषि च bows too, शरान् arrows, चित्रान् wonderful, खङ्गांश्च swords, विविधाः of different kinds, शिताः sharp, शक्तीश्च missiles, क्षिप्रम् quickly, उपस्थापय get them ready.
data.md: And you gentle one, do you at once bring my car as well as my bows, and pasty coloured arrows and scimitars, and darts, and various whetted javelins.

data.v: अग्रे निर्यातुमिच्छामि पौलस्त्यानां महात्मनाम् । वधार्थं दुर्विनीतस्य रामस्य रणकोविदः ।।
data.es: O expert in warfare, I wish to lead those great warriors of Paulasthya family, to kill that immodest Rama.
data.anv: रणकोविदः expert in warfare, दुर्विनीतस्य of the immodest, रामस्य Rama's, वधार्थम् to kill, महात्मनाम् great self, पौलस्त्यानाम् those of Paulasthya family, अग्रे in front, निर्यातुम् to go, इच्छामि I desire.
data.md: O you versed in warfare, for slaying this haughty Rāma, I go in the very fore-front of the high-souled Paulastyas. Lit.-Pulastya's The Rākşasas commonly descended from Pulastya.

data.v: इति तस्य ब्रुवाणस्य सूर्यवर्णं महारथम् । सदश्वैः शबलैर्युक्तमाचचक्षेऽथ दूषणः ।।
data.es: While Khara was speaking thus, Dusana reported that a huge chariot of the colour of the Sun yoked with good horses of variegated hues stood ready.
data.anv: तस्य his (Khara's), इति this, ब्रुवाणस्य while (Khara was) telling, अथ at that time, दूषणः Dusana, सूर्यवर्णम् colour of the Sun, महारथम् huge chariot, शबलैः variegated colours, सदश्वैः good horses, युक्तम् fit, आचचक्षे indicated.
data.md: As he said this, Dūşaņa brought his great car hued like the sun, yoked with excellent steeds of various colours. sons. were

data.v: तं मेरुशिखराकारं तप्तकाञ्चनभूषणम् । हेमचक्रमसंबाधं वैदूर्यमय कूबरम् ।।
मत्स्यैः पुष्पैर्द्रुमैः शैलैश्चन्द्रसूर्यैश्च काञ्चनैः । माङ्गल्यैः पक्षिसंघैश्च ताराभिश्च समावृतम् ।।
ध्वजनिस्त्रिंशसंपन्नं किङ्किणीकविभूषितम् । सदश्वयुक्तं सोऽमर्षादारुरोह रथं खरः ।।
निशाम्य तं रथगतं राक्षसा भीमविक्रमाः । तस्थुः संपरिवार्यैनं दूषणं च महाबलम् ।।
data.es: The demons of terrific prowess surounded Khara and Dusana and stood by, when they saw both of them mounting the chariot.
data.anv: भीमविक्रमाः warriors of terrific prowess, राक्षसाः demons, रथस्थम् seated on the chariot, तम् him, निशाम्य seeing, एनम् him, महाबलम् very strong one, दूषणं च Dusana too, सम्परिवार्य after surrounding, तस्थुः stood by.

data.v: खरस्तु तान्महेष्वासान्घोरचर्मायुधध्वजान् । निर्यातेत्यब्रवीद्दृष्ट्वा रथस्थः सर्वराक्षसान् ।।
data.es: Khara mounted the chariot, saw the demons holding great weapons, wearing dreadful shields and holding flags, and ordered them to march.
data.anv: रथस्थः from the chariot, खरस्तु Khara on his part, महेष्वासान् those holding great weapons, घोरवर्मायुधध्वजान् those wearing dreadful shields, bearing weapons and holding flags, तान् सर्वराक्षसान् all the demons, दृष्ट्वा after seeing, निर्यात march on, इति thus, अब्रवीत् ordered.
data.md: Beholding that mighty army consisting of cars and arms and pennons, Khara as well as Dūşana, said to that multitude of Rākşasas, March forth!

data.v: ततस्तद्राक्षसं सैन्यं घोरचर्मायुधध्वजम् । निर्जगाम जनस्थानान्महानादं महाजवम् ।।
data.es: Then the army of the demons wearing dreadful shields, holding weapons and flags, and making a loud noise started in great speed from Janasthanam.
data.anv: ततः then, घोरवर्मायुधध्वजम् wearing dreadful shields, holding weapons and banners, तत् that, राक्षसं सैन्यम् army of demons, महानादम् a loud noise, महाजवम् in great speed, जनस्थानात् from Janasthana, निर्जगाम started.

data.v: मुद्गरैः पट्टिशैः शूलैः सुतीक्ष्णैश्च परश्वधैः । खड्गैश्चक्रैश्च हस्तस्थैर्भ्राजमानैश्च तोमरैः ।।
शक्तिभिः पतिघैर्घोरैरतिमात्रैश्च कार्मुकैः । गदासिमुसलैर्वज्रैर्गृहीतैर्भीमदर्शनैः ।।
राक्षसानां सुघोराणां सहस्राणि चतुर्दश । निर्यातानि जनस्थानात्खरचित्तानुवर्तिनाम् ।।
data.es: Fighting alone on foot with his sharp arrows Rama killed within a span of one and a half muhurta, the fourteen thousand dreadful demons including Dusana and Khara.
data.anv: पदातिना on foot, एकेन alone, तेन by him, तीक्ष्णैः  sharp, शरैः arows, अर्धाधिकमुहूर्तेन within the span of one and a half muhurta ( muhurtha is fortyeight minutes), भीमरूपाणाम् dreadful in appearance, रक्षसाम् demons, चतुर्दश fourteen, सहस्राणि thousand, निहतानि are killed, सहदूषणः also Dusana, खरश्च and Khara.

data.v: तांस्त्वभिद्रवतो दृष्ट्वा राक्षसान्भीमविक्रमान् । खरस्यापि रथः किंचिज्जगाम तदनन्तरम् ।।
data.es: Khara's chariot moved a bit behind the army of demons of frightening prowess who rushed forward to attack (Rama).
data.anv: अभिद्रवतः going speedily to attack, भीमविक्रमान् of frightening prowess, तान् राक्षसान् those demons, दृष्ट्वा after seeing, किञ्चित् a little, तदनन्तरम् behind, खरस्य Khara's, रथः chariot, अपि too, जगाम went.
data.md: Seeing those Rākṣasas of dreadful forms rushing out, Khara's car remaining a little away (from the press), proceeded after a short space.

data.v: ततस्ताञ्शबलानश्वांस्तप्तकाञ्चनभूषितान् । खरस्य मतमाज्ञाय सारथिः समचोदयत् ।।
data.es: Knowing the mind of Khara, the charioteer hastened the horses of the colourful chariot decorated with pure gold.
data.anv: ततः thereafter, सारथिः charioteer, तप्तकाञ्चनभूषितान् decorated with pure gold, शबलान्  colourful, तान् them, अश्वान् horses, खरस्य of Khara's, मतिम् mind, आज्ञाय knowing, समचोदयत् hastened.
data.md: Then taking the perinission of Khara, the charioteer drove at speed those powerful steeds decked in shining gold.

data.v: स चोदितो रथः शीघ्रं खरस्य रिपुघातिनः । शब्देनापूरयामास दिशश्च प्रतिशस्तथा ।।
data.es: Spurred by the charioteer, the chariot of Khara, the slayer of enemies, produced a rattle that filled all four quarters and the intermediate directions.
data.anv: तदा then, रिपुघातिनः killers of enemy, खरस्य Khara's, शीघ्रम् speedily, चोदितः spurred, सः रथः that chariot, दिशश्च the four directions, प्रदिशश्च intermediate directions, शब्देन by the sound, आपूरयामास filled.
data.md: And driven with speed, the car of Khara. slayer of foes, filled all directions with its rattle.

data.v: प्रवृद्धमन्युस्तु खरः खरस्वनो; रिपोर्वधार्थं त्वरितो यथान्तकः । अचूचुदत्सारथिमुन्नदन्पुन;र्महाबलो मेघ इवाश्मवर्षवान् ।।
data.es: Khara in extreme anger hastened, like Yama, to slay his enemy. He roared loudly like a cloud raining hail stones and impelled his charioteer to speed up. इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वालल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये अरण्यकाण्डे द्वाविंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the twentysecond sarga of Aranyakanda of the holy Ramayana the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: प्रवृद्धमन्युः whose anger increased, खरस्वनः with harsh tone, खरः Khara, रिपोः enemy's, वधार्थम् to kill, त्वरितः at quick pace, अन्तकः यथा like Yama, the god of death, अश्मवर्षवान् like hail stones, महाबलः powerful, मेघः इव like the cloud, घनम् heavy, उन्नदन् सारथिम् roaring charioteer, अचूचुदत् impelled him to drive.
data.md: Khara, fired with wrath, and having piercing voice, hastening to destroy his enemy like the destroyer himself, again urged his charioteer with roars, like a mighty cloud showering down stones.

data.v: तत्प्रयातं बलं घोरमशिवं शोणितोदकम् । अभ्यवर्षन्महामेघस्तुमुलो गर्दभारुणः ।।
data.es: As the army marched from there (Janasthana) a huge dark cloud of the colour of an ass rained dreadful inauspicious water, red as blood.
data.anv: गर्दभारुणः dark like the colour of an ass, तुमुलः fierce, महामेघः huge cloud, तस्मिन् that army, याते marched, तत् there, घोरम् dreadful, बलम् army, अशिवम् inauspicious, शोणितोदकम् water red as blood, अभ्यवर्षत् rained.
data.md: As those terrible and inauspicious forces were marching on, a mighty sable cloud with dreadful sounds began to shower down blood.

data.v: निपेतुस्तुरगास्तस्य रथयुक्ता महाजवाः । समे पुष्पचिते देशे राजमार्गे यदृच्छया ।।
data.es: The swift horses yoked to the chariot stumbled casually while galloping on the plane highway sprinkled with flowers.
data.anv: रथयुक्ताः yoked to the chariot, महाजवाः of high speed, तस्य his, तुरगाः horses, राजमार्गे on the highway, पुष्पचिते समे sprinkled with flowers evenly, देशे place, यदृच्छया casually, निपेतुः stumbled.
data.md: The steeds yoked to his (Khara's) car, gifted with great celerity, dropped down all of a sudden on the level high ways strewn with blossoms.

data.v: श्यामं रुधिरपर्यन्तं बभूव परिवेषणम् । अलातचक्रप्रतिमं प्रतिगृह्य दिवाकरम् ।।
data.es: A dark ring, bloodred in colour appeared on the border of the Sun's orb, dark in the middle. This phenomenon of the Sun appeared like a ring of moving charcoal covering the Sun.
data.anv: दिवाकरम् Sun, परिगृह्य took position, श्यामम् dark, रुधिरपर्यन्तम् red in the periphery, अलातचक्रप्रतिमम् moving firebrand creating a ring, परिवेषणम् surrounding, बभूव appeared,
data.md: A dark circle bordered with red, resembling that of charcoal, appeared in the vicinity of the sun.

data.v: ततो ध्वजमुपागम्य हेमदण्डं समुच्छ्रितम् । समाक्रम्य महाकायस्तस्थौ गृध्रः सुदारुणः ।।
data.es: A huge vulture, frightening to look at flew up and sat on top of the flag on the staff of gold.
data.anv: ततः then, महाकायः huge, सुदारुणः frightening, गृध्रः vulture, समुच्छ्रितम् erected, ध्वजम् flag, उपागम्य flying up, हेमदण्डम् golden staff, समाक्रम्य after occupying, तस्थौ sat.
data.md: And a frightful vulture, having a huge body, approaching the banner, sat upon the upraised golden flag-staff.

data.v: जनस्थानसमीपे च समाक्रम्य खरस्वनाः । विस्वरान्विविधांश्चक्रुर्मांसादा मृगपक्षिणः ।।
data.es: Flesheating beasts and birds flocked at Janasthana producing a cacophony.
data.anv: खरस्वनाः of harsh voice, मांसादाः flesheating, मृगपक्षिणः beasts and birds, जनस्थानसमीपे near Janasthana, समागम्य flocking, विविधान् different kinds of, विस्वरान् hoarse voice, चक्रुः created.

data.v: व्याजह्रुश्च पदीप्तायां दिशि वै भैरवस्वनम् । अशिवा यातु दाहानां शिवा घोरा महास्वनाः ।।
data.es: The dreadful jackals making ghastly howls turning towards the illuminated direction and produced frightening sounds indicating inauspicious time for the demons.
data.anv: घोराः frightful, महास्वनाः ghastly howls, शिवाः jackals, प्रदीप्तायाम् in the illuminated, दिशि direction, भैरवस्वनम् terrible sound, यातुधानानाम् of demons, अशिवम् inauspicious, व्याजह्रुः indicated.

data.v: प्रभिन्नगिरिसंकाशास्तोयशोषितधारिणः । आकाशं तदनाकाशं चक्रुर्भीमा बलाहकाः ।।
data.es: The clouds looked like shattered mountains pouring down bloodlike rain which filled the sky and made it appear frighteningly different.

data.md: And terrific clouds surcharged with water and blood, and resembling elephants with rent temples, enveloped the sky.

data.v: बभूव तिमिरं घोरमुद्धतं रोमहर्षणम् । दिशो वा विदिशो वापि सुव्यक्तं न चकाशिरे ।।
data.es: A terrific darkness, spread all over, produced frightening horripilation. Even the four quarters and the intermediary zones were not discernible.
data.anv: घोरम् terrible, उद्धतम् arose, रोमहर्षणम् horripilation, तिमिरम् darkness, बभूव became, दिशो वा  whether quarters, विदिशो वापि or the intermediary, व्यक्तम् clearly, न चकाशिरे did not shine.
data.md: And a dense darkness appeared, capable of making one's hair stand on end, and no quarter was distinctly visible.

data.v: क्षतजार्द्रसवर्णाभा संध्याकालं विना बभौ । खरस्याभिमुखं नेदुस्तदा घोरा मृगाः खगाः ।।
data.es: Even before Sunset the twilight looked like a fresh wound. Then wild animals, birds, kankas, jackals and vultures facing towards Khara screeched, indicating danger.
data.anv: कालं विना before Sunset, क्षतजार्द्रसवर्णाभा glow like a fresh wound, सन्ध्या twilight, बभौ appeared, तदा then, घोरमृगाः dreadful animals, खगाः birds, खरस्य of Khara, अभिमुखाः directed towards, नेदुः produced sounds, कङ्कगोमायुगृध्राश्च kanka birds, jackals, and vultures, भयशंसिनः indicating danger, चक्रुशुः screeched.
data.md: And out of season, there appeared evening hued like a cloth soaked in blood. And facing Khara, terrible beasts and birds set up cries.

data.v: नित्याशिवकरा युद्धे शिवा घोरनिदर्शनाः । नेदुर्बलस्याभिमुखं ज्वालोद्गारिभिराननैः ।।
data.es: Bad omens that always bring inauspiciousness were a dreadful evidence of what is going to happen. Jackals howled, facing Khara's army with their mouths emitting fire.
data.anv: युद्धे in war, नित्याशुभकराः always ominous, घोरनिदर्शनाः dreadful premonitions, शिवाः jackals, ज्वालोद्गारिभिः as if emitting fire, आननैः with their faces, बलस्य of the army, अभिमुखम् facing towards, नेदुः produced sounds.
data.md: Kankas, Gomayas and vultures, portending fear, began to cry. Ever inauspicious in war, jackals presaging evil, with their mouths belching forth flame, howled in the face of the forces.

data.v: कबन्धः परिघाभासो दृश्यते भास्करान्तिके । जग्राह सूर्यं स्वर्भानुरपर्वणि महाग्रहः ।।
data.es: The planet Ketu appeared like an iron beam near the Sun. Although it was not the fullmoon or newmoon day, Rahu eclipsed the Sun. Wind blew hard and the Sun was lustreless.
data.anv: भास्करान्तिके close to the Sun, परिघाभासः appearing like an iron beam, कबन्ध: Ketu, दृश्यते  seen, महाग्रहः a great planet, स्वर्भानुः Rahu, अपर्वणि  other than the new Moon, सूर्यम् Sun, जग्राह  eclipsed, मारुतः wind, शीघ्रम् swiftly, प्रवाति blew, दिवाकरः Sun, निष्प्रभः without lustre, अभूत् appeared.
data.md: And comets, resembling parighas appeared beside the sun. That mighty planet Svarbhānu seized the sun when there was no parva. And the winds blew violently; and the sun was without lustre.

data.v: प्रवाति मारुतः शीघ्रं निष्प्रभोऽभूद्दिवाकरः । उत्पेतुश्च विना रात्रिं ताराः खद्योतसप्रभाः ।।
संलीनमीनविहगा नलिन्यः पुष्पपङ्कजाः । तस्मिन्क्षणे बभूवुश्च विना पुष्पफलैर्द्रुमाः ।।
data.es: The stars rose in the sky and glittered like fireflies even before night arrived. The fishes and the aquatic birds in the lotusponds hid themselves under water. Lotuses dried up in tanks and the trees stood bereft of flowers and fruits.
data.anv: खद्योतसम्प्रभाः glittering like fireflies, ताराः stars, विना without, रात्रिम् night, उत्पेतुः rose, संलीनमीनविहगाः fishes and birds disappear, नलिन्यः lotusponds, शुष्कपङ्कजाः have dried up lotuses, तस्मिन् in that, क्षणे moment, द्रुमाः trees, पुष्पफलैः flowers and fruits, विना without, बभूवुश्च became.

data.v: उद्धूतश्च विना वातं रेणुर्जलधरारुणः । वीचीकूचीति वाश्यन्तो बभूवुस्तत्र सारिकाः ।।
data.es: Although there was no wind, dust rose like a brown cloud and the sarika birds sang (vichi kuchi) thoughtlessly.
data.anv: विना वातम् without wind, जलधरारुणः like a brownish cloud, रेणुः dust, उद्धूतः rose up, तत्र there, शारिकाः sarika bird, वीचीकूचीति thoughtlessly, वाश्यन्त्यः singing, बभूवुः been.

data.v: उल्काश्चापि सनिर्घोषा निपेतुर्घोरदर्शनाः । प्रचचाल मही चापि सशैलवनकानना ।।
data.es: Dreadful to watch were the thunderstorms and the meteors that dropped down from the sky. The earth trembled all over with mountains, groves and forests.
data.anv: घोरदर्शनाः dreadful in appearance, सनिर्घाताः thunderstorms, उल्काश्चापि meteors, निपेतुः dropped down, सशैलवनकानना mountains, groves and forests, सर्वाः all, मही earth, प्रचचाल trembled.

data.v: खरस्य च रथस्थस्य नर्दमानस्य धीमतः । प्राकम्पत भुजः सव्यः खरश्चास्यावसज्जत ।।
data.es: While the intelligent and courageous Khara was seated on the chariot and shouting, his left shoulder shook violently and throat throttled.

data.v: सास्रा संपद्यते दृष्टिः पश्यमानस्य सर्वतः । ललाटे च रुजा जाता न च मोहान्न्यवर्तत ।।
data.es: While watching all this, his eyes brimmed with tears. His forehead ached. Yet he was too deluded to beat a retreat.

data.v: तान्समीक्ष्य महोत्पातानुत्थितान्रोमहर्षणान् । अब्रवीद्राक्षसान्सर्वान्प्रहसन्स खरस्तदा ।।
data.es: Looking at these dreadful, horripilating occurrences Khara laughed and said to the demons:
data.anv: सः खरः that Khara, तदा then, उत्थितान् occurring, रोमहर्षणान् horripilation, तान् those, महोत्पातान् most dreadful phenomena, समीक्ष्य after watching, प्रहसन् while laughing, सर्वान् all, राक्षसान् demous, अब्रवीत् said.

data.v: महोत्पातानिमान्सर्वानुत्थितान्घोरदर्शनान् । न चिन्तयाम्यहं वीर्याद्बलवान्दुर्बलानिव ।।
data.es: Valiant and strong, I do not take seriously these terrifying omens boding calamity just as a strong man does not care for the weak.
data.anv: उत्थितान् produced, घोरदर्शनान् those terrific to see, इमान् these, महोत्पातान् the events boding calamity, सर्वान् all, अहम् I, वीर्यात् due to valour, बलवान् strong, दुर्बलानिव as he deals with the weak, न चिन्तयामि I do not take them seriously.

data.v: तारा अपि शरैस्तीक्ष्णैः पातयेयं नभस्तलात् । मृत्युं मरणधर्मेण संक्रुद्धो योजयाम्यहम् ।।
data.es: With my sharp arrows I can even bring down the stars from the sky. If angered, I can cause mortality to the god of death.
data.anv: अहम् I, ताराः stars, अपि even, तीक्ष्णैः with sharp, शरैः by arrows, नभस्स्थलात् from the sky, पातयामि I will dislodge, सङ्क्रुद्धः if angered, मृत्युम् god of death, मरणधर्मेण mortal nature, योजयामि  will cause.

data.v: राघवं तं बलोत्सिक्तं भ्रातरं चापि लक्ष्मणम् । अहत्वा सायकैस्तीक्ष्णैर्नोपावर्तितुमुत्सहे ।।
data.es: I do not wish to return, without killing with my sharp arrows that Rama who is proud of his strength and his brother Lakshmana.
data.anv: बलोत्सिक्तम् man proud of his strength, तं राघवम् to that Rama, अस्य and his, भ्रातरम् brother, लक्ष्मणं च and Lakshmana, तीक्ष्णैः by sharp, सायकैः with arrows, अहत्वा without killing, उपावर्तितुम् to return, नोत्सहे I am not intending.

data.v: सकामा भगिनी मेऽस्तु पीत्वा तु रुधिरं तयोः । यन्निमित्तं तु रामस्य लक्ष्मणस्य विपर्ययः ।।
data.es: Let my sister be satisfied by drinking the blood of both Rama and Lakshmana on whose account this adversity has come.
data.anv: रामस्य Rama's, लक्ष्मणस्य Lakshmana's, विपर्ययः adversity, यन्निमित्तः for whose cause, मे भगिनी my sister, तयोः their, रुधिरम् blood, पीत्वा after drinking, सकामा her desire, अस्तु be fulfilled,

data.v: न क्वचित्प्राप्तपूर्वो मे संयुगेषु पराजयः । युष्माकमेतत्प्रत्यक्षं नानृतं कथयाम्यहम् ।।
data.es: I have never faced defeat in wars, and all of you have seen it with your eyes. I am not telling you a lie.
data.anv: मे for me, संयुगेषु in wars, क्वचित् ever, पराजयः defeat, न प्राप्तपूर्वः never faced, एतत् this, युष्माकम् all of you, प्रत्यक्षम् directly witnessed, अहम् I, अनृतम् untruth, न कथयामि I am not telling.
data.md: I had never before met with defeat in conflict. You have witnessed it. I do not speak a falsehood.

data.v: देवराजमपि क्रुद्धो मत्तैरावतयायिनम् । वज्रहस्तं रणे हन्यां किं पुनस्तौ च मानुषौ ।।
data.es: When angry, I can kill even (Indra) the wielder of the thunderbolt, rider of the intoxicated Airavata and lord of the gods. What to speak of these two petty humans?
data.anv: क्रुद्धः angered, मत्तैरावतयायिनम् riding an intoxicated Airavata, वज्रहस्तम् one who wields thunderbolt, देवराजमपि even the king of the gods, रणे in war, हन्याम् I will kill, तौ both of them, कुमानुषौ human beings, किं पुनः should I say again.
data.md: Wrought up with rage, I shall slay in fight the sovereign of the celestials himself, going on his mad Airāvata, with the thunderbolt in his hand, what shall I say of those two, who are human beings?

data.v: सा तस्य गर्जितं श्रुत्वा राक्षसस्य महाचमूः । प्रहर्षमतुलं लेभे मृत्युपाशावपाशिता ।।
data.es: Fallen into the deathtrap, the great army of the demon, felt very happy on hearing Khara roaring.
data.anv: मृत्युपाशावपाशिता fallen into the trap of death, सा that, महाचमूः great army, तस्य राक्षसस्य of the demon, गर्जितम् roaring, श्रुत्वा on hearing, अतुलम् immeasureable, प्रहर्षम् joy, लेभे experienced.
data.md: Entangled in the noose of death, that mighty army of the Rākşasas hearing his challenge, experienced boundless enthusiasm.

data.v: समेयुश्च महात्मानो युद्धदर्शनकाङ्क्षिणः । ऋषयो देवगन्धर्वाः सिद्धाश्च सह चारणैः ।।
data.es: Great souls like sages, gods, gandharvas, and siddhas including celestial bards assembled to see the battle.
data.anv: महात्मानः great souls, ऋषयः sages, देवगन्धर्वाः gods and gandharvas, सिद्धाश्च: siddhas (accomplished spiritually), चारणैः सह including celestial bards, युद्धदर्शनकाङ्क्षिणः desirous of seeing the war, समीयुः assembled.
data.md: And anxious to see the encounter, there came high-souled saints, and celestials, and Gandharvas, and Siddhas, with the Cāranas. And these pious ones assembled, spoke to one another.

data.v: समेत्य चोरुः सहितास्तेऽन्यायं पुण्यकर्मणः । स्वस्ति गोब्राह्मणेभ्योऽस्तु लोकानां ये च संमताः ।।
data.es: Holy men assembled and uttered benedictions, saying, 'let there be wellbeing for the cows and brahmins associated with men of pious deeds in all the (three) worlds.
data.anv: पुण्यकर्मणः holy men, ते they, समेत्य collecting together, अन्योन्यम् to one another, सहिताः together, गोब्राह्मणेभ्यः for cows and brahmins, लोकानां of the people, सर्वशः all over, स्वस्ति अस्तु let it be auspicious, ऊचुः they spoke, ये who, अमिसङ्गताः associated

data.v: जयतां राघवो युद्धे पौलस्त्यान्रजनीचरान् । चक्रा हस्तो यथा युद्धे सर्वानसुरपुंगवान् ।।
data.es: 'Let Rama conquer the descendants of Paulasthya in the war like Visnu, the wielder of the wheel had defeated great demons'.
data.anv: चक्रहस्तः wielder of the wheel (Visnu), युद्धे in war, सर्वान् all, असुरपङ्गवान् chiefs of demons, यथा like, राघवः Rama, पौलस्त्यान् all descendants of Paulastya, सङ्ख्ये in war, रजनीचरान्  nightrangers (demons), जयताम् let him win.
data.md: Welfare to those cows, and Brāhmanas, and those that are prized by the worlds! As the discus-handed Vişņu vanquished the foremost Asuras, may Rāghava rout in battle those rangers of the night, the progeny of Pulastya!

data.v: एतच्चान्यच्च बहुशो ब्रुवाणाः परमर्षयः । ददृशुर्वाहिनीं तेषां राक्षसानां गतायुषाम् ।।
data.es: The great ascetics were talking thus and more. The gods waiting eagerly on heavenly chariots saw the army of the demons whose life span was shortened (who were doomed to death).
data.anv: एतच्चान्यच्च these matters, बहुशः more and more, ब्रुवाणाः while talking, परमर्षयः great ascetics, तत्र there, विमानस्थाः occupants of heavenly chariots, देवताश्च gods too, जातकौतूहलाः with much eagerness, गतायुषाम् those of reduced life span, तेषाम् of those, राक्षसानाम् of demons, वाहिनीम् army, ददृशुः saw.
data.md: And saying this as well as various other things, the supreme saints and the celestials stationed in the sky conceiving curiosity (as to the issue of the conflict), beheld the host of those Rākşasas, whose days had been numbered.

data.v: रथेन तु खरो वेगात्सैन्यस्याग्राद्विनिःसृतः । तं दृष्ट्वा राक्षसं भूयो राक्षसाश्च विनिःसृताः ।।
data.es: Seeing Khara, their chief on the chariot driving fast, the army of demons too marched forward.
data.anv: उग्रसैन्यः terrific army, खरः Khara, रथेन on the chariot, वेगात् speedily, विनिस्सृतः drove fast, तं राक्षसम् that demon also, दृष्ट्वा seeing, भूयः again, राक्षसाः demons, विनिस्सृताः marched.

data.v: श्येन गामी पृथुग्रीवो यज्ञशत्रुर्विहंगमः । दुर्जयः करवीराक्षः परुषः कालकार्मुकः ।।
data.es: Surrounded by twelve valiant warriors like Syenagami, Pruthugreeva, Yagnasatru, Vihangama, Durjaya, Karaviraksha, Parusha, Kalakarmuka, Meghmali, Mahamali, Sarpasya and Rudhirasana, Khara proceeded.

data.es: Surrounded by twelve valiant warriors like Syenagami, Pruthugreeva, Yagnasatru, Vihangama, Durjaya, Karaviraksha, Parusha, Kalakarmuka, Meghmali, Mahamali, Sarpasya and Rudhirasana, Khara proceeded.
data.anv: श्येनगामी moving like a hawk, पृथुग्रीवः Pruthugreeva (one with a big neck), यज्ञशत्रुः Yagnasatru (enemy of sacrifices), विहङ्गमः Vihangama (who knows how to move in the sky), दुर्जयः Durjaya (an invincible one), करवीराक्षः Karaviraksha (one whose eyes are like the oleander flower), परुषः Parusha (harsh), कालकार्मुकः Kalakarmuka (bow of death), मेघमाली Meghamali (clouds in a row), महामाली Mahamali (a long row), सर्पास्यः Sarpasya (serpentmouthed), रुधिराशनः Rudhirasana (one who feeds on blood), महावीर्याः Mahaveerya (mighty), एते all of them, द्वादश twelve, खरम् अभितः ahead of Khara, प्रतस्थुः marched.

data.v: महाकपालः स्थूलाक्षः प्रमाथी त्रिशिरास्तथा । चत्वार एते सेनाग्र्या दूषणं पृष्ठतोऽन्वयुः ।।
