data.es: Similarly Dusana proceeded with four Mahakapali, Sthulaksha, Pramathi and Trisira around him.
data.anv: महाकपालिः Mahakapali (one with a big skull), स्थूलाक्षः Sthulaksha (bigeyed), प्रमाथी Pramathi (crusher of enemy), तथा similarly, त्रिशिराः Trisira (threeheaded one), एते all of them, चत्वारः four, सेनान्यः army men, दूषणं परितः around Dusana, ययुः walked.
data.md: And Mahākapāla, Sthūlākṣa, Pramātha and Trisirā—These four going before the forces, went at the back of Dūşaņa.

data.v: सा भीमवेगा समराभिकामा; सुदारुणा राक्षसवीर सेना । तौ राजपुत्रौ सहसाभ्युपेता; मालाग्रहाणामिव चन्द्रसूर्यौ ।।
data.es: The mighty, swiftfooted army of valiant demons surrounded the princes (Rama and Lakshmana) all on a sudden like the planets around the Sun and the Moon.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये अरण्यकाण्डे त्रयोविंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the twentythird sarga of Aranyakanda of the holy Ramayana the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: भीमवेगाः very fast, समराभिकामाः eager for war, महाबलाः mighty, सा that, राक्षसवीरसेना the heroic army of demons, सहसा at once, ग्रहाणाम् of planets, माला garland, चन्द्रसूर्यौ इव like Sun and Moon, तौ those, राजपुत्रौ king's sons, अभ्युपेता: attacked.
data.md: Then as the planets dart towards the sun and moon, that heroic and dreadful army of Rākşasas, eager for victory suddenly rushed towards the princes with great vehemence.

data.v: आश्रमं प्रति याते तु खरे खरपराक्रमे । तानेवौत्पातिकान्रामः सह भ्रात्रा ददर्श ह ।।
data.es: When Khara endowed with malicious might was marching towards the hermitage, Rama and his brother saw the same omens of impending calamity the demon had seen.
data.anv: खरपराक्रमे endowed with malicious might, खरे when Khara, आश्रमं प्रति towards the hermitage, याते marched, रामः Rama, भ्रात्रा सह with his brother, औत्पातिकान् phenomena boding calamity, तानेव ददर्श ह he also saw.
data.md: When Khara of fierce prowess had come to the asylum Rāma in company with his brother saw all those evil prognostics.

data.v: तानुत्पातान्महाघोरानुत्थितान्रोमहर्षणान् । प्रजानामहितान्दृष्ट्वा वाक्यं लक्ष्मणमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: When Rama saw the most dreadful, horripilating phenomena foreboding calamity, he said to Lakshmana:
data.anv: महाघोरान् most dreadful, रोमहर्षणान horripilation, प्रजानाम् to people, अहितान् harmful, तान् those, उत्पातान् calamitous, दृष्ट्वा seeing, रामः Rama, लक्ष्मणम् Lakshmana, अब्रवीत् said.
data.md: And beholding those dreadful portents, Rāma exceedingly distressed, apprehending some calamity to the Rākşasas, observed to Lakşmaņa.

data.v: इमान्पश्य महाबाहो सर्वभूतापहारिणः । समुत्थितान्महोत्पातान्संहर्तुं सर्वराक्षसान् ।।
data.es: O longarmed Lakshmana see these calamitous phenomena that forebode mass destruction of men and demons.
data.anv: महाबाहो longarmed, सर्वभूतापहारिणः alldestructive, सर्वराक्षसान् all demons, संहर्तुम् to kill, समुत्थितान् present, इमान् these, महोत्पातान् great calamitous events, पश्य see.
data.md: O mighty armed one, behold these great presages that have taken place, capable of annihilating all beings, and which have taken place, capable of annihilating all beings, and which have for their object the utter extermination of the Raksasas!

data.v: अमी रुधिरधारास्तु विसृजन्तः खरस्वनान् । व्योम्नि मेघा विवर्तन्ते परुषा गर्दभारुणाः ।।
data.es: These rumbling clouds, brownishred like the colour of a donkey, are moving about in the sky showering streams of blood.
data.anv: रुधिरधाराः flow of blood, विसृजन्तः showering, खरस्वनाः harsh sounds, परुषाः rough, गर्दभारुणाः brownishred like the colour of donkeys, अमी these, मेघाः clouds, व्योम्नि in the sky, विवर्तन्ते are moving about.
data.md: Yonder threatening clouds of asinine sable, showering down blood and uttering loud sounds are ranging the welkin.

data.v: सधूमाश्च शराः सर्वे मम युद्धाभिनन्दिनः । रुक्मपृष्ठानि चापानि विवेष्टन्ते च लक्ष्मण ।।
data.es: O Lakshmana all my arrows are smoking and this goldplated bow welcomes me to war.
data.anv: युद्धाभिनन्दिनः welcome me to war, सर्वे all, मम शराः my arrows, सधूमाश्च smoking, लक्ष्मण Lakshmana, रुक्मपृष्ठानि coated with gold, चापानि च and bows, विचेष्टन्ते are trying.
data.md: And, O discerning one, rejoicing at the prospect of my fight, all these arrows emit smoke, and my bows plaited on the back with gold, are restless.

data.v: यादृशा इह कूजन्ति पक्षिणो वनचारिणः । अग्रतो नो भयं प्राप्तं संशयो जीवितस्य च ।।
data.es: The way the forestbirds are screeching makes me foresee danger and makes survival doubtful.
data.anv: इह here, वनचारिणः moving in the forest, पक्षिणः birds, यादृशाः in such way, कूजन्ति screeching, नः for us, अग्रतः in future, भयम् fear, प्राप्तम् is foreseen, जीवितस्य of life, संशयः च also doubtful.
data.md: Meseems from the noise of the wild birds that impending on us is danger and uncertainty to life.

data.v: संप्रहारस्तु सुमहान्भविष्यति न संशयः । अयमाख्याति मे बाहुः स्फुरमाणो मुहुर्मुहुः ।।
data.es: A mass destruction of life is going to take place. There is no doubt about it. O brave Lakshmana my right shoulder trembles again and again, indicating the defeat of the enemy. Your beaming visage presages victory.
data.anv: सुमहान् very great, सम्प्रहारस्तु destruction of life, भविष्यति will take place, संशयः doubt, न no, शूर O brave one, मुहुः मुहुः again and again, स्फुरमाणः shivering, अयम् this, मे बाहुः my (right) shoulder, सन्निकर्षे in near future, नः our, जयम् success, शत्रोः enemy's, पराजयम् defeat, आख्याति indicating, तव your, वक्त्रम् face, सप्रभं च is bright, प्रसन्नं च cheerful too, लक्ष्यते हि appears indeed.
data.md: Without doubt, there shall take place a mighty conflict. At this critical time, my arin shaking momentarily, betokens, O hero, victory to us, and defeat to the enemy. And your face appear pleasant with a delightful lustre.

data.v: संनिकर्षे तु नः शूर जयं शत्रोः पराजयम् । सुप्रभं च प्रसन्नं च तव वक्त्रं हि लक्ष्यते ।।
data.es: A mass destruction of life is going to take place. There is no doubt about it. O brave Lakshmana my right shoulder trembles again and again, indicating the defeat of the enemy. Your beaming visage presages victory.
data.anv: सुमहान् very great, सम्प्रहारस्तु destruction of life, भविष्यति will take place, संशयः doubt, न no, शूर O brave one, मुहुः मुहुः again and again, स्फुरमाणः shivering, अयम् this, मे बाहुः my (right) shoulder, सन्निकर्षे in near future, नः our, जयम् success, शत्रोः enemy's, पराजयम् defeat, आख्याति indicating, तव your, वक्त्रम् face, सप्रभं च is bright, प्रसन्नं च cheerful too, लक्ष्यते हि appears indeed.
data.md: Without doubt, there shall take place a mighty conflict. At this critical time, my arin shaking momentarily, betokens, O hero, victory to us, and defeat to the enemy. And your face appear pleasant with a delightful lustre.

data.v: उद्यतानां हि युद्धार्थं येषां भवति लक्ष्मणः । निष्प्रभं वदनं तेषां भवत्यायुः परिक्षयः ।।
data.es: O Lakshmana, while preparing for war, those whose faces look pale are, for sure, going to die.
data.anv: लक्ष्मण Lakshmana, युद्धार्थम् for war, उद्यतानाम् of those making effort, येषाम् of those, वदनम् face, निष्प्रभम् pale, भवति becomes, तेषाम् their, आयुः life, परिक्षयः shortened, भवति become.
data.md: O Lakşmaņa, the pallid face of those that prepare for conflict, auger shortening of life.

data.v: अनागतविधानं तु कर्तव्यं शुभमिच्छता । आपदं शङ्कमानेन पुरुषेण विपश्चिता ।।
data.es: A wise man who apprehends danger or one who desires his own good should plan his defence even before the onset of danger.
data.anv: आपदम् danger, शङ्कमानेन by a person apprehending, शुभम् good, इच्छता by one desirous of, विपश्चिता by a learned one, पुरुषेण by a man, अनागतविधानम् defence before the onset of danger, कर्तव्यं हि should be planned.
data.md: A considerate person that wishes for his welfare, apprehending peril, should prevent disaster ere it arrives.

data.v: तस्माद्गृहीत्वा वैदेहीं शरपाणिर्धनुर्धरः । गुहामाश्रयशैलस्य दुर्गां पादपसंकुलाम् ।।
data.es: Therefore, take shelter along with Sita in the inaccessible mountain cave, overgrown with trees, ready with your bow and arrows.
data.anv: तस्मात् therefore, वैदेहीम् to Sita, गृहीत्वा taking, शरपाणिः with arrows in hand, धनुर्धरः wielding bow, शैलस्य mountains, दुर्गाम् inaccessible, पादपसङ्कुलाम् crowded with trees, गुहाम् cave, आश्रय take shelter.
data.md: Therefore bearing arrows in your hand, and equipped with your bow, do you, taking Videha's daughter, take refuge in the mountain cavern, covered with trees and difficult of access.

data.v: प्रतिकूलितुमिच्छामि न हि वाक्यमिदं त्वया । शापितो मम पादाभ्यां गम्यतां वत्स माचिरम् ।।
data.es: O dear, I do not like you to oppose this word of honour. You must touch my feet and go without delay.
data.anv: इदं वाक्यम् these words, त्वया you, प्रतिकूलितुम् to oppose, न इच्छामि I do not desire, वत्स dear one, मम पादाभ्याम् my word of honour on my feet, शापितः असि you are bound, गम्यताम् go, चिरम् मा without delay.
data.md: That you should act contrary to my words, is what I do not wish. Swearing by my feet, go you without delay, my brother.

data.v: एवमुक्तस्तु रामेण लक्ष्मणः सह सीतया । शरानादाय चापं च गुहां दुर्गां समाश्रयत् ।।
data.es: Having been thus instructed by Rama, Lakshmana said with folded palms in the presence of Sita:
data.anv: रामेण by Rama, एवम् in that way, उक्तः having been instructed, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, संयताज्ञलिः with folded palms, सीतासमक्षम् in the presence of Sita, काकुत्स्थम् to Rama, इदम् this, अब्रवीत् said.
data.md: Thus accosted by Rama, Laksmana, taking arrows and a bow, took refuge in an inaccessible cave along with Sītā.

data.v: तस्मिन्प्रविष्टे तु गुहां लक्ष्मणे सह सीतया । हन्त निर्युक्तमित्युक्त्वा रामः कवचमाविशत् ।।
data.es: With Lakshmana and Sita inside the cave, Rama heaved his shield, saying, Oh the work is accomplished.
data.anv: तस्मिन् when he, लक्ष्मणे Lakshmana, सीतया सह with Sita, गुहाम् into the cave, प्रविष्टे entered, रामः Rama, हन्त oh, निर्युक्तम् work is accomplished, इति this, उक्त्वा having spoken, कवचम् shield, आविशत् put on.
data.md: Thereupon, saying, Ah! we have spoken it sharp, Rāma put on his mail. And adorned with that mail resembling fire Rāma appeared in the dark like a mighty flame streaming up.

data.v: सा तेनाग्निनिकाशेन कवचेन विभूषितः । बभूव रामस्तिमिरे विधूमोऽग्निरिवोत्थितः ।।
data.es: Adorned with the shield, Rama shone like smokeless fire rising in darkness.
data.anv: अग्निनिकाशेन blazing like fire, तेन by that, कवचेन by the shield, विभूषितः welldecorated, सः रामः that Rama, तिमिरे in darkness, उत्थितः arising, विधूमः smokeless, अग्निरिव like fire, बभूव looked.

data.v: स चापमुद्यम्य महच्छरानादाय वीर्यवान् । बभूवावस्थितस्तत्र ज्यास्वनैः पूरयन्दिशः ।।
data.es: Valiant Rama lifted the huge bow and arrows and stood there, filling the directions with the twangs of his bow.
data.anv: वीर्यवान् valiant, सः he, महत् huge, चापम् bow, उद्यम्य lifting, ज्यास्वनैः by the twangs of the  bowstring, दिशः all directions, पूरयन् filling, तत्र there, अवस्थितः बभूव stayed.
data.md: And uplifting his bow, and taking his arrows, that powerful one stood there, feeling all directions with the twangs of his bow-string.

data.v: ततो देवाः सगन्धर्वाः सिद्धाश्च सह चारणैः । ऊचुः परमसंत्रस्ता गुह्यकाश्च परस्परम् ।।
data.es: Then the gods along with gandharvas, siddhas, and celestial bards assembled there, wishing to witness the war.
data.anv: ततः thereafter, सगन्धर्वाः along with the celestial muscians, देवाः gods, महात्मनः great souls, सिद्धाश्च siddhas, चारणैः with bards, सह along with, युद्धदर्शनकाङ्क्षिणः desiring to see the war, समेयुः assembled.

data.v: चतुर्दश सहस्राणि रक्षसां भीमकर्मणाम् । एकश्च रामो धर्मात्मा कथं युद्धं भविष्यति ।।
data.es: Thus looking at one another they discussed among themselves how there can be war between the righteous Rama fighting singlehanded on the one hand and the fourteen thousand demons, performers of terrific deeds, on the other.
data.anv: एवम् in that way, उक्त्वा having spoken, आलोक्य च and after looking at, परस्परम् to one another, पुनः again, प्रोचुः spoke, भीमकर्मणाम् of those of terrific deeds, रक्षसाम् of demons, चतुर्दश fourteen, सहस्राणि thousands, धर्मात्मा righteous self, रामश्च Rama, एकः all alone, युद्धम् war, कथम् how, भविष्यति will it be?
data.md: Having said this, they again spoke, eyeing one another, There are fourteen thousand of the Rākşasas of dreadful deed while the righteous Rāma is single. How can fight take place (between two such parties)?

data.v: ततो गम्भीरनिर्ह्रादं घोरवर्मायुधध्वजम् । अनीकं यातुधानानां समन्तात्प्रत्यदृश्यत ।।
data.es: Then appeared on all sides the wellequipped army of demons raising deep sounds with dreadful shields, weapons and banners.
data.anv: ततः then, गम्भीरनिर्ह्रादम् deep sound, घोरवर्मायुधध्वजम् having dreadful shields, weapons and banners, यातुधानानाम् of the demons, अनीकम् army, समन्तात् on all sides, प्रत्यदृश्यत appeared before.

data.v: सिंहनादं विसृजतामन्योन्यमभिगर्जताम् । चापानि विस्फरयतां जृम्भतां चाप्यभीक्ष्णशः ।।
data.es: The forest was filled with tumultuous sounds of the warriors roaring like lions, shouting at one another, stretching the bowstrings constantly, yawning, proclaiming loudly and beating the drums.
data.anv: सिंहनादम् roar of lion, विसृजताम् released, अन्योन्यम् at one another, अभिगर्जताम् shouting loudly, चापानि bows, विस्फ़ारयताम् stretching the bows, अभीक्ष्णशः constantly, जृम्भतामपि  yawning, विप्रघुष्टस्वनानां च  proclaiming loudly, दुन्धुभींश्च अपि even drums, निघ्नताम् beating, तेषाम् of them, सुतुमुलः tumultuous, शब्दः sound, तद्वनम् that forest, पूरयामास filled.

data.v: विप्रघुष्टस्वनानां च दुन्दुभींश्चापि निघ्नताम् । तेषां सुतुमुलः शब्दः पूरयामास तद्वनम् ।।
data.es: The forest was filled with tumultuous sounds of the warriors roaring like lions, shouting at one another, stretching the bowstrings constantly, yawning, proclaiming loudly and beating the drums.
data.anv: सिंहनादम् roar of lion, विसृजताम् released, अन्योन्यम् at one another, अभिगर्जताम् shouting loudly, चापानि bows, विस्फ़ारयताम् stretching the bows, अभीक्ष्णशः constantly, जृम्भतामपि  yawning, विप्रघुष्टस्वनानां च  proclaiming loudly, दुन्धुभींश्च अपि even drums, निघ्नताम् beating, तेषाम् of them, सुतुमुलः tumultuous, शब्दः sound, तद्वनम् that forest, पूरयामास filled.

data.v: तेन शब्देन वित्रस्ताः श्वापदा वनचारिणः । दुद्रुवुर्यत्र निःशब्दं पृष्ठतो नावलोकयन् ।।
data.es: The ferocious animals of the forest got frightened and ran away to silent spots without looking back.
data.anv: तेन शब्देन by that sound, वित्रस्ताः alarmed, वनचारिणः roaming the forest, श्वापदाः animals, यत्र whereever, निश्शब्दम् silence, दुद्रुवुः ran, पृष्ठतः at the back, न व्यलोकयन् did not look back.
data.md: The universal uproar filled that (entire) forest. Scared and terrified at the hubbub the rangers of the wood fle: to quarters free from noise; nor did they cast their eyes backward.

data.v: तत्त्वनीकं महावेगं रामं समुपसर्पत । घृतनानाप्रहरणं गम्भीरं सागरोपमम् ।।
data.es: The fierce army, deep like the sea, equipped with various missiles approached Rama.
data.anv: महाघोरम् extremely frightening, धृतनानाप्रहरणम् equipped with different kinds of missiles, गम्भीरम् deep, सागरोपमम् like the sea, तत् अनीकम् that army, रामम् to Rama, समुपसर्पत came near.
data.md: And that army resembling the ocean, and rife with sounds, equipped with various weapons, with furious speed came towards Rāma.

data.v: रामोऽपि चारयंश्चक्षुः सर्वतो रणपण्डितः । ददर्श खरसैन्यं तद्युद्धाभिमुखमुद्यतम् ।।
data.es: Rama, wellversed in warfare, cast his eyes on all sides to see the army of Khara that had come prepared for war.
data.anv: रणपण्डितः wellversed in warfare, रामोऽपि even Rama, चक्षुः his eyes, सर्वतः on all sides, चारयन् while casting, युद्धाभिमुखम् facing war, उत्थितम् was standing, तत् that, खरसैन्यम् army of Khara, ददर्श he saw.
data.md: And Rāma also versed in warfare, casting his eyes around, found the forces of Khara ready for fight. Another text:-The holder of Pinaka.

data.v: वितत्य च धनुर्भीमं तूण्याश्चोद्धृत्य सायकान् । क्रोधमाहारयत्तीव्रं वधार्थं सर्वरक्षसाम् ।।
data.es: Rama stretched the formidable bow and lifted the arrows from his quiver to kill the demons and assumed intense anger.
data.anv: भीमम् formidable, धनुः bow, वितत्य  stretched, तूण्याः from the quiver, सायकान् arrows, उद्धृत्य took out, सर्व रक्षसाम् to all the demons, वधार्थम् to kill, तीव्रम् intense, क्रोधम् anger, आहारयत् gathered.
data.md: Then stretching his dreadful bow, and swiftly taking out shafts, (Rāma) for compassing the destruction of the entire body of the Rākşasas, waxed furiously enraged. And like to the flaming fire at the universal dissolution, he, growing wroth, was incapable of being looked i at.

data.v: दुष्प्रेक्ष्यः सोऽभवत्क्रुद्धो युगान्ताग्निरिव ज्वलन् । तं दृष्ट्वा तेजसाविष्टं प्राव्यथन्वनदेवताः ।।
data.es: Rama stood burning in anger like the fire of the doom's day. It was difficult even to look at him. Seeing him full of glow even the sylvan deities ran away.
data.anv: क्रुद्धः angry, सः Rama, ज्वलन् while burning, युगान्ताग्निरिव like fire rising at the end of the creation, दुष्प्रेक्ष्य: difficult even to look at अभवत्  became, तेजसा glow, आविष्टम् filled with, तम् him, दृष्ट्वा after seeing, वनदेवताः sylvan deities, प्राद्रवन् ran away.

data.v: तस्य क्रुद्धस्य रूपं तु रामस्य ददृशे तदा । दक्षस्येव क्रतुं हन्तुमुद्यतस्य पिनाकिनः ।।
data.es: Rama in anger looked like Lord Siva ready to destroy the sacrifice of Daksha.
data.anv: तदा then, क्रुद्धस्य of an angry one, तस्य his, रूपम् face, दक्षस्य Daksha's, क्रतुम् sacrifice, हन्तुम् to destroy, उद्यतस्य ready to, पिनाकिनः इव like that of Siva, ददृशे looked.
data.md: And seeing him filled with energy, the sylvan deities were extremely pained*. And the aspect of the enraged Rāma appeared like that of the holder of Pināka, intent upon destroying Dakşa's sacrifice. Another reading is:-The sylvan deities fled away.

data.v: अवष्टब्धधनुं रामं क्रुद्धं च रिपुघातिनम् । ददर्शाश्रममागम्य खरः सह पुरःसरैः ।।
data.es: Khara accompanied by his pilot party arrived at the hermitage of Rama, the destroyer of enemies and saw him in fury, standing ready with his bow.
data.anv: खरः Khara, पुरस्सरैः सह accompanied by the pilot party, आश्रमम् to the hermitage, आगम्य arrived, अवष्टब्धधनुम् holding the bow, क्रुद्धम् angry, रिपुघातिनम् destroyer of the enemy, रामम् Rama, ददर्श saw.
data.md: Coming to the asylum, Khara in company with those that went before him, saw that slayer of foes, the enraged Rāma, holding his bow. And seeing him, Khara possessing a shrill voice, raising his bow, commanded to the charioteer to drive towards Rāma, Drive on!

data.v: तं दृष्ट्वा सगुणं चापमुद्यम्य खरनिःस्वनम् । रामस्याभिमुखं सूतं चोद्यतामित्यचोदयत् ।।
data.es: On seeing Rama, Khara held his terribly twanging bow and arrow, stood facing him, and ordered the charioteer to drive towards him.
data.anv: तम् him, दृष्ट्वा seeing, खरनिस्स्वनम् producing terrible sound, सशरम् with the arrow, चापम् bow, उद्यम्य lifted, रामस्य Rama's, अभिमुखम् facing him, चोद्यताम् drive (the chariot), इति thus, सूतम् to charioteer, अचोदयत् ordered to go.
data.md: Coming to the asylum, Khara in company with those that went before him, saw that slayer of foes, the enraged Rāma, holding his bow. And seeing him, Khara possessing a shrill voice, raising his bow, commanded to the charioteer to drive towards Rāma, Drive on!

data.v: स खरस्याज्ञया सूतस्तुरगान्समचोदयत् । यत्र रामो महाबाहुरेको धुन्वन्धनुः स्थितः ।।
data.es: Commanded by Khara, the charioteer also urged the horses towards the mightyarmed Rama standing alone and wielding the bow.
data.anv: सः that, सूतः charioteer, खरस्य Khara's, आज्ञया by the order, महाबाहुः mightyarmed, एकः alone, रामः Rama, धनुः bow, चुन्वन् selecting, स्थितः stood, तुरगान् horses, समचोदयत् drove.
data.md: At Khara's command, the charioteer drove the steeds to where the mighty—arined Rāma stood alone, holding his bow.

data.v: तं तु निष्पतितं दृष्ट्वा सर्वे ते रजनीचराः । नर्दमाना महानादं सचिवाः पर्यवारयन् ।।
data.es: Seeing Khara attacking (Rama) all the demon ministers surrounded him roaring.
data.anv: निष्पतितम् fell upon, तम् him, दृष्ट्वा seeing, सचिवाः ministers, ते they, सर्वे all, रजनीचराः demons, महानादम् very loud sound, नर्दमानाः while roaring, पर्यवारयन् surrounded.
data.md: And seeing him (Khara) entered the field, all those rangers of the night-the counsellers-uttering mighty shouts, cnvironed him round.

data.v: स तेषां यातुधानानां मध्ये रतो गतः खरः । बभूव मध्ये ताराणां लोहिताङ्ग इवोदितः ।।
data.es: Seated on a chariot in the midst of the demons, Khara looked like the rising Mars in the middle of the stars.
data.anv: तेषां यातुधानाम् of the demons, मध्ये in the midst, रथगतः seated on a chariot, खरः Khara, ताराणाम् of stars, मध्ये in the middle, उदितः risen, लोहिताङ्गः the planet Mars, इव like, बभूव looked.
data.md: Khara stationed on his car in the midst of Rākşasas appeared like red bodied one risen in the midst of the stars.

data.v: ततस्तं भीमधन्वानं क्रुद्धाः सर्वे निशाचराः । रामं नानाविधैः शस्त्रैरभ्यवर्षन्त दुर्जयम् ।।
data.es: Thereafter all the infuriated demons showered on invincible Rama, wielder of a fierce bow, many kinds of weapons.
data.anv: ततः thereafter, सर्वे all, क्रुद्धाः angry, निशाचराः demons, भीमधन्वानम् wielder of the fierce bow, दुर्जयम् invincible, तं रामम् to that Rama, नानाविधैः with many kinds of, शस्स्रैः weapons, अभ्यवर्षन्त rained.
data.md: Then all the rangers of the night, waxing exceeding wroth, showered various weapons on that terrible bowman, the invincible Rāma.

data.v: मुद्गरैरायसैः शूलैः प्रासैः खड्गैः परश्वधैः । राक्षसाः समरे रामं निजघ्नू रोषतत्पराः ।।
data.es: Overtaken by anger, the demons continuously hurled at Rama hammers, spears, spikes, barbed missiles, swords and battleaxes.
data.anv: राक्षसाः demons, रोषतत्पराः overtaken by anger, मुद्गरैः with hammers, पट्टसैः with spears, शूलैः with spikes, प्रासैः with barbed missiles, खङ्गै: with swords, परश्वधः battleaxes, समरे in war, रामम् to Rama, निजघ्नुः continously hurled.
data.md: And wrought up with rage, the Rākṣasas in battle assailed him with iron clubs, and darts, and prāsas, and swords, and axes.

data.v: ते बलाहकसंकाशा महानादा महाबलाः । अभ्यधावन्त काकुत्स्थं रामं युद्धे जिघांसवः ।।
data.es: Very powerful demons like huge clouds roared, eager to kill Rama in war. They ran forward on chariots, horses and tall elephants, looking like mountain tops.
data.anv: वलाहकसङ्काशाः resembling clouds, महानादाः with huge uproar, महौजसः very powerful, ते demons, रथैः on chariots, वाजिभिरेव च on horses and, पर्वतकूटाभैः looking like tops of mountains, गजैः by elephants, युद्धे in war, जिघांसवः eager to kill, रामम् to Rama, अभ्यधावन्त ran towards.
data.md: And resembling clouds (in hue), the exceedingly strong Rākṣasas, having huge bodies, darted towards Kākutstha by means of steeds and cars.

data.v: ते रामे शरवर्षाणि व्यसृजन्रक्षसां गुणाः । शैलेन्द्रमिव धाराभिर्वर्षमाणा महाधनाः ।।
data.es: The battalions of demons sent down streams of arrows on Rama just like clouds downpour on mountains.
data.anv: ते they, रक्षसाम् of demons, गणाः battalions, रामे on Rama, वर्षमाणाः raining, वलाहकाः clouds, धाराभिः by downpour, शैलेन्द्रमिव like moutains, शरवर्षाणि rain of arrows, व्यसृजन् sent forth.
data.md: And mounted on elephants resembling mountain-peaks, numbers of Rākṣasas, intent upon staying Rāma in battle, showered arrows on him, as mighty clouds pour down showers on the monarch of mountains.

data.v: स तैः परिवृतो घोरै राघवो रक्षसां गणैः । तिथिष्विव महादेवो वृतः पारिषदां गणैः ।।
data.es: Surrounded by the terrible demons Rama appeared like Lord Siva at dusk with hosts of his retinues arounds.
data.anv: स: that, राघवः Rama, घोरैः terrible, रक्षसां गणैः by hordes of demons, परिवृत: surrounded, महादेवः Lord Siva, वृतः surrounded, परिषदाङ्गणैः with hosts of retinues, तिथिष्वि at dusk.
data.md: Rāma was hemmed in by all those fiercelooking Raksasas, even as in the evening Mahādeva is surrounded by his courtiers.

data.v: तानि मुक्तानि शस्त्राणि यातुधानैः स राघवः । प्रतिजग्राह विशिखैर्नद्योघानिव सागरः ।।
data.es: Rama resisted the weapons released by the demons like the sea, the inflow of river waters.
data.anv: सः that, राघवः Rama, यातुधानैः by the demons, मुक्तानि released, तानि those, शस्त्राणि weapons, सागरः sea, नद्योघानिव like the flow of rivers, विशिखैः with arrows, प्रतिजग्राह resisted.
data.md: And as the ocean resisted the tide of a river, Rāghava by means of arrow resist the weapons discharged by the Yātudhānas.

data.v: स तैः प्रहरणैर्घोरैर्भिन्नगात्रो न विव्यथे । रामः प्रदीप्तैर्बहुभिर्वज्रैरिव महाचलः ।।
data.es: Rama remained unhurt like a great mountain struck by many glowing thunderbolts. He felt no pain even though his limbs were hit by the dreadful weapons.
data.anv: घोरैः by the dreadful, प्रहरणै by weapons, तैः by those, भिन्नगात्रः his limbs being hit, सः रामः that Rama, प्रदीपैः by the glowing, बहुभिः by many, वज्रैः by thunderbolts, महाचल इव like the great mountain, न विव्यथे was not hurt.
data.md: As a mighty mountain, assailed by the thunderbolt, dose not feel pain, Rāma, having his person pierced by terrible flaming weapons, did not feel pain.

data.v: स विद्धः क्षतजादिग्धः सर्वगात्रेषु राघवः । बभूव रामः संध्याभ्रैर्दिवाकर इवावृतः ।।
data.es: Wounded all over the body, bleeding through the wounds caused by weapons, Rama looked like the evening Sun covered with clouds.
data.anv: विद्ध: wounded, सर्वगात्रेषु all over the body, क्षतजादिग्धः bleeding through the wounds, राघवः Rama, सः रामः that Rama, सन्ध्याभ्रैः by evening clouds, आवृतः surrounded, दिवाकरः इव like the Sun, बभूव became (appeared).
data.md: And pierced, and with his person covered with blood, Rāma, the descendant of Raghu, resembled the sun enveloped in evening clouds.

data.v: विषेदुर्देवगन्धर्वाः सिद्धाश्च परमर्षयः । एकं सहस्त्रैर्बहुभिस्तदा दृष्ट्वा समावृतम् ।।
data.es: Seeing Rama left alone surrounded by many thousands of demons, the gods, ghandarvas and siddhas became very sad.
data.anv: तदा then, बहुभिः by many, सहस्रैः by thousands, समावृतम् surrounded by, एकम् single, दृष्ट्वा seeing, देवगन्धर्वाः gods and gandharvas, सिद्धाश्च siddhas, परमर्षयः great sages, विषेदुः became sad.
data.md: And seeing him single, surrounded by many thousand, the Gods, Gandharvas, Siddhas, and supreme saints became sorrowful.

data.v: ततो रामः सुसंक्रुद्धो मण्डलीकृतकार्मुकः । ससर्ज निशितान्बाणाञ्शतशोऽथ सहस्रशः ।।
data.es: Thereafter Rama, mighty angry, bent his bow and released hundreds and thousands of unfeathered arrows.
data.anv: ततः thereafter, रामः Rama, सुसङ्कृद्धः mighty angry, मण्डलीकृतकार्मुकः bending the bow, शतशः in hundreds, अथ and, सहस्रशः thousands, विशिखान् unfeathered ones, बाणान् arrows, ससर्ज released.
data.md: Then Rama getting enraged, bringing his bow to a circle, discharged sharpened shafts by hundreds and by thousands. And as if in sport, Rāma in the conflict shot irresistible (shafts) furnished with Kanka feathers, and decked with gold, irresistible, capable of inflicting extreme pain, and resembling the noose of Death.

data.v: दुरावारान्दुर्विषहान्कालपाशोपमान्रणे । मुमोच लीलया रामः कङ्कपत्रानजिह्मगान् ।।
data.es: As if sporting, Rama discharged the arrows attached with herons' feathers. The arrows were inescapable, unbearable like that of Yama's staff, that went straight without missing the target.
data.anv: रामः Rama, रणे in war, दुरावारान् those difficult to stop, दुर्विषहान् unbearable ones, कालदण्डोपमान् those looking like Yama's staff, अजिह्मगान् going straight without missing the goal, कङ्कपत्रान् arrows furnished with herons' feathers, लीलया very easily, मुमोच discharged.

data.v: ते शराः शत्रुसैन्येषु मुक्ता रामेण लीलया । आददू रक्षसां प्राणान्पाशाः कालकृता इव ।।
data.es: The arrows like the noose of the god of death released by Rama on the enemy army easily destroyed the lives of the demons.
data.anv: रामेण by Rama, लीलया sportively, शत्रुसैन्येषु at the army of the enemy, मुक्ताः released, ते शराः those arrows, कालकृताः made by the god of death, पाशाः nooses, इव like, रक्षसाम् of the demons, प्राणान् life, आददुः pulled out.
data.md: And sportively discharged by Rāma, those arrows deprived the Rākṣasas of their lives, like the noose forged by death.

data.v: भित्त्वा राक्षसदेहांस्तांस्ते शरा रुधिराप्लुताः । अन्तरिक्षगता रेजुर्दीप्ताग्निसमतेजसः ।।
data.es: Rama's arrows pierced the bodies of the demons and drenched in blood, they, looking like burning fire, shone in the sky.
data.anv: ते शराः those arrows, तान् those, राक्षसदेहान् bodies of the demons, भित्त्वा after piercing, रुधिराप्लुताः drenched in blood, अन्तरिक्षगताः gone high up into the sky, दीप्ताग्निसमतेजसः glowing red like burning fire, रेजुः sparkled.
data.md: And piercing the persons of the Rākşasas, those arrows, soaked in blood, going up to the sky, appeared with the splendour of flaming fire.

data.v: असंख्येयास्तु रामस्य सायकाश्चापमण्डलात् । विनिष्पेतुरतीवोग्रा रक्षः प्राणापहारिणः ।।
data.es: From Rama's bow bent into a cirle, countless fierce arrows able to take the lives of demons were released.
data.anv: रामस्य Rama's, चापमण्डलात् from the bow bent into a circle, अतीव highly, उग्राः fierce, रक्षःप्राणापहारिणः which can take the lives of demons, असङ्ख्येयाः countless ones, सायकाः arrows, विनिष्पेतुः thrown out destroying.
data.md: And innumerable shafts, exceedingly fierce, capable of depriving the Rāksasas of their lives, were let go from the circle of his bow.

data.v: तैर्धनूंषि ध्वजाग्राणि वर्माणि च शिरांसि च । बहून्सहस्ताभरणानूरून्करिकरोपमान् ।।
data.es: In war Rama cut asunder the bows, flag tops, armour and heads of demons, their shoulders and thighs that were like the trunks of elephants, in their hundreds and thousands.
data.anv: रामः Rama, समरे in war, तैः by them (arrows), शतशः in hundreds, अथ and, सहस्रशः in thousands, धनूंषि bows, ध्वजाग्राणि tops of flags, वर्माणि च and armour, शिरांसि च and heads, सहस्ताभरणान् along with armlets, बाहून् shoulders, करिकरोपमान् like elephants' trunks, ऊरून् thighs, चिच्छेद cut.
data.md: And with those Rāma severed bows, in baitle by hundreds and by thousands and flag ends, and shields, and mail, and many arms with embellished hands, resembling the trunks of elephants.

data.v: ततो नालीकनाराचैस्तीक्ष्णाग्रैश्च विकर्णिभिः । भीममार्तस्वरं चक्रुर्भिद्यमाना निशाचराः ।।
data.es: The bodies of the demons torn into pieces by the very sharp iron arrows and by the arrows called vikarni, they cried and shouted aloud in pitiable voices.
data.anv: ततः then, नालीकनाराचैः with iron arrows, तीक्ष्णाग्रैः with sharp tops, विकर्णिभिः by shafts called vikarni, भिद्यमानाः torn into parts, निशाचराः demons, भीमम् terrible, आर्तस्वरम् pitiable cries, चक्रुः made.
data.md: And cut off with nālīkas (steel-pointed arrows) and, nārācas (arrows wholly made of steel), and sharp-pointed vikarnas (barbed arrows), the rangers of the night uttered dreadful howls of distress.

data.v: तत्सैन्यं निशितैर्बाणैरर्दितं मर्मभेदिभिः । रामेण न सुखं लेभे शुष्कं वनमिवाग्निना ।।
data.es: Just like the dried up forest burnt by the fire, the army was totally destroyed by Rama's arrows that pierced into the vital parts of the soldiers.
data.anv: रामेण by Rama, मर्मभेदिभिः by those piercing into vital parts, निशितैः by sharp ones, बाणैः by arrows, अर्दितम् tormented, तत् सैन्यम् that army, शुष्कम् dried up, वनम् forest, अग्निना इव as if by fire, सुखम् relief न लेभे did not have.
data.md: And like a withered wood afflicted by fire, that host harassed by the various marrowpiercing* shafts shot by Rāma, did not attain ease. Another reading is, sharpened.

data.v: केचिद्भीमबलाः शूराः शूलान्खड्गान्परश्वधान् । चिक्षिपुः परमक्रुद्धा रामाय रजनीचराः ।।
data.es: A few warriors of fierce strength approached Rama and hurled at him very powerful weapons, spears, swords and axes.
data.anv: भीमबलाः men of fierce strength, केचित् a few, शूराः warriors, रामस्य Rama's, अभिमुखम् going towards, गत्वा went, परमायुधान् very powerful weapons, शूलान् spikes, खङ्गान् swords, परश्वधान् axes, चिक्षिपुः threw.
data.md: And some heroic rangers of the night possessed of great strength, waxing furious, threw at Rāma rrāsas, and darts and axes. Another reading: remaining before Rāma, threw powerful weapons.

data.v: तानि बाणैर्महाबाहुः शस्त्राण्यावार्य राघवः । जहार समरे प्राणांश्चिच्छेद च शिरोधरान् ।।
data.es: Strongarmed Rama attacked them with his arrows and cut off their heads and took their lives.
data.anv: महाबाहुः strongarmed, राघवः Rama, समरे in war, बाणैः with arrows, तेषाम् their, शस्त्राणि weapons, आवार्य attacked, प्राणान् life, जहार took, शिरोधरान् heads, चिच्छेद cut off.
data.md: Thereupon resisting by means of shafts those weapons of theirs, the mighty-armed Rāma endued with prowess, took their lives in the conflict, and cut off the heads (of warriors).

data.v: अवशिष्टाश्च ये तत्र विषण्णाश्च निशाचराः । खरमेवाभ्यधावन्त शरणार्थं शरार्दिताः ।।
data.es: The rest of the demons hit by the arrows ran desperate towards Khara for refuge.
data.anv: तत्र there, अवशिष्टाः remaining ones, ये those, निशाचराः demons, शरार्दिताः hit by arrows, विषण्णाश्च desperate, खरमेव to Khara only, शरणार्थम् for refuge, अभ्यधावन्त ran towards.
data.md: And having their heads, and shields and bowstrings, severed, they fell as fall on the earth trees thrown down by blasts froin the wings of Suparņa*. Those rangers of the night that remained there, wounded by arrows, and losing heart, fled with speed to Khara, to seek his protection. *Lit.-Of fair feather. A name of Garuda.

data.v: तान्सर्वान्पुनरादाय समाश्वास्य च दूषणः । अभ्यधावत काकुत्स्थं क्रुद्धो रुद्रमिवान्तकः ।।
data.es: Pacifying them all, Dusana regathered them again and ran towards Rama like an angry Yama rushing towards Rudra.
data.anv: दूषणः Dusana, तान् स them, सर्वान् all, समाश्वास्य pacifying, पुनः again, आदाय bringing them together, क्रुद्धः wrathful, अन्तकः yama, रुद्रमिव like Rudra, काकुत्स्थं on Rama, अभ्यधावत ran towards.
data.md: Thereat, encouraging them, Dāsana, taking his bow, ran furiously in high rage against Răma, like the enraged Destroyer himself,

data.v: निवृत्तास्तु पुनः सर्वे दूषणाश्रयनिर्भयाः । राममेवाभ्यधावन्त सालतालशिलायुधाः ।।
data.es: Under Dusana's protection, all of them felt relieved from fear and, carrying sal and palm trees and stones as weapons, advanced towards Rama again.
data.anv: सर्वे all, दूषणाश्रयनिर्भयाः were free from fear due to Dusana's protection, पुनः again, निवृत्ताः returned, सालतालशिलायुधाः carrying sal, palm and stones as weapons, राममेव to Rama, अभ्यधावन्त advanced towards.
data.md: And rallied again (by Dāsana) and, their fear dispelled through their having founded refuge with him, they armed with sālas, tālas, and crags, darted against Rāma.

data.v: तद्बभूवाद्भुतं युद्धं तुमुलं रोमहर्षणम् । रामस्यास्य महाघोरं पुनस्तेषां च रक्षसाम् ।।
data.es: The thrilling, fierce, horrifying and horripilating battle again ensued betwen Rama and the demons.
data.anv: पुनः again, रामस्य Rama's, तेषां रक्षसां च of those demons, तुमुलम् fierce, अद्भुतम् wonderful, रोमहर्षणम् horripilating, महाघोरम् very dreadful, तत् युद्धम् that war, बभूव became.
data.md: And the Räkşasas discharged vollies of trees and crags. And capable of making one's hair stand on end, that battle was dreadful and furious and now on the side of Rāma and now again on : that of the Raksasas.

data.v: तद्द्रुमाणां शिलानां च वर्षं प्राणहरं महत् । प्रतिजग्राह धर्मात्मा राघवस्तीक्ष्णसायकैः ।।
data.es: Righteous Rama, retaliated with his sharp arrows such as the rain of trees and stones, the mighty destroyers of life.
data.anv: धर्मात्मा righteous self, सः राघवः  Rama, प्राणहरम् destroyers of life, महत् mighty, द्रुमाणाम् trees, शिलानां च of stones and, वर्षम् rain, तीक्ष्णसायकैः with sharp arrows, प्रतिजग्राह retaliated.
data.md: Thereupon by means of shafts the righteous Rāghava resisted that mighty destructive shower of trees and stones.

data.v: प्रतिगृह्य च तद्वरं निमीलित इवर्षभः । रामः क्रोधं परं भेजे वधार्थं सर्वरक्षसाम् ।।
data.es: Rama retaliated in great anger to kill without caring for the shower of weapons like a bull with its eyes closed.
data.anv: रामः Rama, निमीलितः closed his eyes, ऋषभः इव like a bull, तत् that, वर्षम् rain, प्रतिगृह्य  retaliated, सर्वरक्षसाम् all the demons, वधार्थम् to kill, परं excessively, क्रोधम् angry, भेजे felt.
data.md: Resisting that shower, Rāma with his eyes staring and resembling a bull, flew into a great rage, for the purpose of slaying the whole body of Raksasas.

data.v: ततः क्रोधसमाविष्टः प्रदीप्त इव तेजसा । शरैरभ्यकिरत्सैन्यं सर्वतः सहदूषणम् ।।
data.es: Overpowered by anger, Rama, with a blazing glow, covered Dusana and his army with his arrows.
data.anv: ततः then, क्रोधसमाविष्टः overpowered by anger, तेजसा glow, प्रदीप्त इव as though blazing, सहदूषणम् along with Dusana, सैन्यम् army, सर्वतः all over, शरैः with arrows, अवाकिरत् filled.
data.md: Then influenced by wrath, and flaming in energy, he on all sides covered the army along with Düşana with arrows.

data.v: ततः सेनापतिः क्रुद्धो दूषणः शत्रुदूषणः । जग्राह गिरिशृङ्गाभं परिघं रोमहर्षणम् ।।
data.es: Thereafter Dusana, chief of the army, angrily released at Rama equally powerful arrows comparable to thunderbolt.
data.anv: ततः thereafter, सेनापतिः chief of the army, दूषणः Dusana, क्रुद्धः angry, अशनिकल्पैः  comparable to thunderbolt, शरैः with arrows, तं राघवम् to that Rama, समवाकिरत् charged from everywhere.

data.v: वेष्टितं काञ्चनैः पट्टैर्देवसैन्याभिमर्दनम् । आयसैः शङ्कुभिस्तीक्ष्णैः कीर्णं परवसोक्षिताम् ।।
data.es: With his bow and chariot broken, charioteer and horses killed, Dusana took up a spear in his hand that appeared like a huge mountain top. Bound by golden bands, covered the iron nails, wetted with the enemy's marrow it created a horripilation. It appeared as though it could crush the army of gods and render the enemy powerless. It carried the killing touch of the thunderbolt and could break open the enemy's fort.
data.anv: छिन्नधन्वा  with broken bow, विरथः no chariot, हताश्वः  horses killled, हतसारथिः  charioteer killed, सः he, गिरिशृङ्गाभम्  looking like a huge mountain top, रोमहर्षणम् causing horripilation, काञ्चनैः with golden, पट्टैः with bands, वेष्टितम् bound, देवसैन्यप्रमर्दनम् that which can crush even gods' army, तीक्ष्णैः sharp, आयसैः made of iron, शङ्कुभिः with nails, कीर्णम् covered, परवसोक्षितम्  sprinkled with enemy's marrow, वज्राशनिसमस्पर्शम् like the touch of thunderbolt, परगोपुरदारणम् that which can break open enemies fort, परिघम्  spear, जग्राह took up .
data.md: His bow cut off, his steeds together with the charioteer slain, and himself deprived of his car, he (Dūşana) took a parigha resembling a mountain peak, able to me one's down stand on end plated with gold, capable of afflicting celestial hosts, studded with sharp iron sankus, and graced with the fal of foes;-of the touch of a thunder-bolt, able to pierce the persons of enemies*. The text may also mean able to rend the cities of foes.

data.v: वज्राशनिसमस्पर्शं परगोपुरदारणम् । तं महोरगसंकाशं प्रगृह्य परिघं रणे । दूषणोऽभ्यपतद्रामं क्रूरकर्मा निशाचरः ।।
data.es: With the spear that looked like a mighty serpent, Dusana, the cruel demon, advanced towards Rama.
data.anv: क्रूरकर्मा cruel, निशाचरः demon, दूषणः Dusana, रणे in war, महोरगसङ्काशम् mighty serpent like, तं परिघम्  spear, प्रगृह्य holding, रामम् at Rama, अभ्यद्रवत् went forward.
data.md: And taking up in that encounter the parigha (an iron club) resembling a mighty snake, that ranger of the night of cruel deeds Duşaņa, rushed towards Rāina.

data.v: तस्याभिपतमानस्य दूषणस्य स राघवः । द्वाभ्यां शराभ्यां चिच्छेद सहस्ताभरणौ भुजौ ।।
data.es: Seeing Dusana going to pounce upon him, Rama cut off with two arrows both his arms adorned with armlets.
data.anv: सः राघवः that Rama, अभिपतमानस्य  pouncing on him, तस्य दूषणस्य that Dusana, सहस्ताभरणौ adorned with armlets, भुजौ द्वाभ्याम् with two, शराभ्याम् with arrows, चिच्छेद cut.
data.md: And as Dūsuņa was rushing forward, Rāghava by means of a couple of shafts cut off his two arms with the ornaments.

data.v: भ्रष्टस्तस्य महाकायः पपात रणमूर्धनि । परिघश्छिन्नहस्तस्य शक्रध्वज इवाग्रतः ।।
data.es: With the hands amputated, his huge spear, like the banner of Indra, slipped off his hands and fell down on the ground on the battle front.
data.anv: रणमूर्धनि on the battle front, छिन्नहस्तस्य of one whose hands were cut off, तस्य his, महाकायः huge body, परिघः spear, भ्रष्टः fallen down, शक्रध्वजः इव like the banner of Indra, अग्रतः in front, पपात fell down.
data.md: And the huge parigha (an iron club) escaping from (Dusana's grasp) fell forward on the field like the banner of Sakra.

data.v: स कराभ्यां विकीर्णाभ्यां पपात भुवि दूषणः । विषाणाभ्यां विशीर्णाभ्यां मनस्वीव महागजः ।।
data.es: Dusana fell down on the ground with broken hands like a proud elephant with both his tusks shattered.
data.anv: सः दूषणः  Dusana, विकीर्णाभ्याम्  scattered, कराभ्याम् with both hands, विशीर्णाभ्याम् shattered to pieces, विषाणाभ्याम् with two tusks, मनस्वी proud one, महागजः इव like a mighty elephant, भुवि ground, पपात fell down.
data.md: And like a nighty elephant whose husks have fallen off, Dūşana, on his arms having been severed, fell down to the earth.

data.v: दृष्ट्वा तं पतितं भूमौ दूषणं निहतं रणे । साधु साध्विति काकुत्स्थं सर्वभूतान्यपूजयन् ।।
data.es: Seeing Dusaana collapse dead on the ground, all beings hailed Rama, saying, 'Well done, well done'.
data.anv: रणे in battle, निहतम् killed, भूमौ on the ground, पतितम् fallen down, तं दूषणम् that Dusana, दृष्ट्वा seeing, सर्वभूतानि all beings, काकुत्स्थम् Rama, साधु साधु इति saying, 'well done well done', अपूजयन् hailed.
data.md: Seeing Dūşaņa down on the ground, and slain in battle, all creatures, saying, ''well done! well done!" paid homage to Kākutstha.

data.v: एतस्मिन्नन्तरे क्रुद्धास्त्रयः सेनाग्रयायिनः । संहत्याभ्यद्रवन्रामं मृत्युपाशावपाशिताः । महाकपालः स्थूलाक्षः प्रमाथी च महाबलः ।।
data.es: Meanwhile all the three army chiefs, Mahakapala, Sthulaksha, and the mighty Pramathi ran towards Rama in anger, bound (as though) by the noose of death.
data.anv: एतस्मिन् अन्तरे meanwhile, क्रुद्धाः angry  , महाकपालः Mahakapala, स्थूलाक्षः Stulaksha, महाबलः mighty, प्रमाथी च Pramathi, त्रयः all three, सेनाग्रयायिनः army chiefs, मृत्युपाशावपाशिताः  bound by the noose of death, संहृत्य all together, रामम् Rama, अभ्यद्रवन् ran towards.
data.md: In the meantime, three generals, getting wioth, being entrapped in the noose of death, rushed against Rāma in a body, viz; Mahakapāla, Stūlākșa, and the mighty Pramāthī the Rāksasa, Mahākapäla, upraising a large dart, and Sthulaksa, taking a pattisa, and Pramāthi all axe.

data.v: महाकपालो विपुलं शूलमुद्यम्य राक्षसः । स्थूलाक्षः पट्टिशं गृह्य प्रमाथी च परश्वधम् ।।
data.es: Mahakapala had a huge spear, Sthulaksha, a sharpedged spear and Pramathi, a battleaxe.
data.anv: महाकपालः Mahakapala, विपुलम् huge, शूलम् spear, उद्यम्य  lifted up, स्थूलाक्षः Sthulaksha, राक्षसः demon, पट्टिसम् sharpedged spear, गृह्य holding, प्रमाथी च and Pramathi too, परश्वधं च with a battleaxe.

data.v: दृष्ट्वैवापततस्तांस्तु राघवः सायकैः शितैः । तीक्ष्णाग्रैः प्रतिजग्राह संप्राप्तानतिथीनिव ।।
data.es: On seeing them rushing to attack him with sharp weapons, Rama received them quickly with pointed arrows as though they were guests.
data.anv: राघवः Rama, तूर्णम् quickly, आपततः  attacking, दृष्ट्वैव on seeing, शितैः with sharp weapons, तीक्ष्णाग्रैः  pointed , सायकैः with arrows, सम्प्राप्तान् those who arrived, अतिथीनिव like guests, प्रतिजग्राह received.
data.md: And as Rāghava beheld them advance, he resisted them by means of sharp and keen-edged shafts, even as one receives guests that have come.

data.v: महाकपालस्य शिरश्चिच्छेद रघुनङ्गनः । असंख्येयैस्तु बाणौघैः प्रममाथ प्रमाथिनम् ।।
data.es: Mahakapala's head was cut to pieces with sharp arrows and Pramathi was killed with a countless series of arrows. Pramathi's body, like a huge tree with many branches collapsed on the ground.
data.anv: परमेषुभिः sharp arrows, महाकपालस्य Mahakapala's, शिरः head, चिच्छेद cut to pieces, असङ्ख्येयैः with innumerable, बाणौघैः  arrows, प्रमाथिनम् Pramathi also, प्रममाथ killed, सः he, हतः dead, विटपी with branches, महाद्रुमः इव like a huge tree, भूमौ on the ground, पपात fell down.
data.md: And Raghu's son split Mahākapāla's head, afflicted Pramăthſ with countless shafts, and lodged the eyes of Sthūlāksya with sharp shafts.

data.v: स्थूलाक्षस्याक्षिणी तीक्ष्णैः पूरयामास सायकैः । स पपात हतो भूमौ विटपीव महाद्रुमः ।।
data.es: Rama filled the eyes of Sthulaksha with sharp arrows, and in anger shot five thousand arrows at the five thousand followers of Dusana in a moment and sent them to the abode of Yama.
data.anv: स्थूलाक्षस्य Sthulaksha's, अक्षिणी eyes, तीक्ष्णैः with sharp, सायकैः with arrows, पूरयामास filled, कुपितः an angry, पञ्चसाहस्रैः with five thousand, बाणौघैः with arrows, दूषणस्य Dusana's, पञ्चसाहस्रान् five thousand, अनुगान् followers, क्षणात् in a moment, यमसादनम् to the abode of Yama, अनयत् sent.

data.v: ततः पावकसंकाशैर्हेमवज्रविभूषितैः । जघनशेषं तेजस्वी तस्य सैन्यस्य सायकैः ।।
data.es: Powerful Rama thereafter slayed the remaining army with his weapons studded with gold and diamonds and glowing like fire.
data.anv: तेजस्वी powerful Rama, ततः then, पावकसङ्काशैः  glowing like fire, हेमवज्रविभूषितैः studded with gold and diamonds, सायकैः arrows, तस्य his, सैन्यस्य army's, शेषम् remaining, जघान slayed.
data.md: Threat with shafts resembling fire, and decked with diamonds and with gold, (Rāma) possessed of energy destroyed the rest of his (Khara's) forces.

data.v: ते रुक्मपुङ्खा विशिखाः सधूमा इव पावकाः । निजघ्नुस्तानि रक्षांसि वज्रा इव महाद्रुमान् ।।
data.es: The goldtipped arrows which resembled fire covered with smoke shattered the army of demons like huge trees knocked down by thunder.
data.anv: रुक्मपुङ्खाः goldtipped arrows, सधूमाः covered with smoke, पावकाः इव like fire, ते विशिखाः tips of arrows, वज्राः thunderbolts, महाद्रुमानिव like huge trees, तानि those, रक्षांसि demons, निजघ्नुः shattered.
data.md: And as the thunderbolt slay the mighty, Asuras, those shafts studded with gold, and like to smoking fire, slew those Rākşasas.

data.v: रक्षसां तु शतं रामः शतेनैकेन कर्णिना । सहस्रं च सहस्रेण जघान रणमूर्धनि ।।
data.es: Rama killed a hundred demons with one hundred arrows by a single stroke. The same way he killed a thousand of them with a thousand arrows on the battle front.
data.anv: रामः Rama, रक्षसाम् of demons, शतम् one hundred, एकेन कर्णिना by a single stroke, शतेन one hundred, सहस्रम् thousand, सहस्रेण thousand, रणमूर्धनि on the battle front, जघान killed.
data.md: And in the field Rāma slew an hundred Rāks asa with an hundred Karnis, and a thousand (again) with a thousand.

data.v: तैर्भिन्नवर्माभरणाश्छिन्नभिन्नशरासनाः । निपेतुः शोणितादिग्धा धरण्यां रजनीचराः ।।
data.es: The demons fell down on the ground with their shields and ornaments broken, their bows stained with blood splintered.
data.anv: तैः by them, भिन्नवर्माभरणाः  with broken shields and ornaments, छिन्नभिन्नशरासनाः the bows broken to pieces, रजनीचराः demons, शोणिता दिग्धाः smeared with blood, धरण्याम् on the ground, निपेतुः fell.
data.md: And, their armour and ornaments severed, and their bows broken in shivers, those rangers of the night fell down on the earth, bathed in blood.

data.v: तैर्मुक्तकेशैः समरे पतितैः शोणितोक्षितैः । आस्तीर्णा वसुधा कृत्स्ना महावेदिः कुशैरिव ।।
data.es: The entire ground was littered with bodies of demons fallen in the battle with loose hair and with drops of blood on them looking like a great sacrificial altar strewn all over with kusa grass.
data.anv: समरे in the battle, पतितैः by those fallen down, मुक्तकेशैः loose hair, शोणितोक्षितैः by those wet with blood, तैः those, कृत्स्ना entire, वसुधा ground, महावेदिः a great sacrificial altar, कुशैरिव like the Kusa grass, आस्तीर्णा was spread all over.
data.md: And as a spacious dais is covered with Kusa, the entire field was scattered with the Rākṣasas fallen in battle with hair dishevelled, and covered with blood.

data.v: क्षणेन तु महाघोरं वनं निहतराक्षसं । बभूव निरय प्रख्यं मांसशोणितकर्दमम् ।।
data.es: With the slaughtered bodies of demons lying on the ground, the forest in a moment looked very dreadful like hell with the mud of soil soaked with flesh and blood.
data.anv: निहतराक्षसम् with demons killed, वनम् the forest, क्षणेन तु in a moment, महाघोरम् very dreadful, मांसशोणितकर्दमम् soil soaked with the mud of flesh and blood, निरयप्रख्य like a hell, बभूव appeared.
data.md: And at that time that fearful forest, with the Rākṣasas slaughtered, and with its clay mired with flesh and blood, resembled hell itself.

data.v: चतुर्दश सहस्राणि रक्षसां भीमकर्मणाम् । हतान्येकेन रामेण मानुषेण पदातिना ।।
data.es: Fourteen thousand formidable demons were killed by Rama, a pedestrian human, singlehanded.
data.anv: मानुषेण by a human being, पदातिना going on foot, रामेण Rama, एकेन alone, भीमकर्मणाम्  of formidable  acts, रक्षसाम् demons, चतुर्दश fourteen, सहस्राणि thousands, हतानि were killed.
data.md: Fourteen thousand Rākṣasas of dreadful deeds were slain by Rāma single, a human being, fighting, (moreover) on foot.

data.v: तस्य सैन्यस्य सर्वस्य खरः शेषो महारथः । राक्षसस्त्रिशिराश्चैव रामश्च रिपुसूदनः ।।
data.es: Of that entire army great warrior Khara,Trisira and Rama, destroyer of foes alone remained.
data.anv: महारथः great warrior, खरः Khara, राक्षसः demon, त्रिशिराः Trisira, तस्य सैन्सस्य सर्वस्य of that entire army, शेषः were remanant, रिपुसूदनः destroyer of foes, रामश्च Rama also.
data.md: And the remnant of his (Khara's) forces were that mighty car-warrior, Khara himself, and the Raksasa, Trisirā; and (on the other side) was that destroyer of foes-Rāma.

data.v: ततस्तु तद्भीमबलं महाहवे; समीक्ष्य रामेण हतं बलीयसा । रथेन रामं महता खरस्ततः; समाससादेन्द्र इवोद्यताशनिः ।।
data.es: Thereafter seeing the formidable army killed by mighty Rama, Khara lifted a thunderbolt like Indra, and advanced towards Rama in a great chariot.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वालमिकिय आदिकाव्ये अरण्यकाण्डे षङ्विंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the twentysixth sarga in Aranyakanda of the holy Ramayana the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: ततः thereafter, खरः Khara, महाहवे in the great fight, बलीयसा by the mighty, रामेण by Rama, हतम् killed, तत् that, भीमबलम् formidable army, समीक्ष्य  seeing, तदा then, उद्यताशनिः  raised thunderbolt, इन्द्र इव like Indra, महता with a great, रथेन chariot, रामम् Rama, समाससाद went forward.
data.md: Then seeing that dreadful army destroyed in terrible conflict by the mighty Rāma, Khara ascending a great car, advanced before Rāma, like Indra with the upraised thunderbolt. Then seeing that dreadful army destroyed in terrible conflict by the mighty Rāma, Khara ascending a great car, advanced before Rāma, like Indra with the upraised thunderbolt.

data.v: खरं तु रामाभिमुखं प्रयान्तं वाहिनीपतिः । राक्षसस्त्रिशिरा नाम संनिपत्येदमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: As Khara advanced towards Rama, Trisira the chief of the army approached him and said these words:
data.anv: रामाभिमुखम् approaching Rama, प्रयान्तम् marching towards, खरम् Khara, वाहिनीपतिः chief of army, त्रिशिराः Trisira, नाम by name, राक्षसः demon, सन्निपत्य going near, इदम् these words, अब्रवीत् spoke.
data.md: As Khara was advancing before Rāma, that leader of the army named Triſirā, approaching him, said.

data.v: मां नियोजय विक्रान्त संनिवर्तस्व साहसात् । पश्य रामं महाबाहुं संयुगे विनिपातितम् ।।
data.es: O valiant one assign this work to me. Refrain from this audacity. See how I am going to put down the mightyarmed Rama in the battle.
data.anv: विक्रान्तः valiant Khara, माम् me, नियोजय assign, साहसात् audacity, निवर्तस्व put down, संयुगे in the combat, विनिपातितम् thrown down, महाबाहुम् mightyarmed , रामम् Rama, पश्य you can see.
data.md: Do you employ me, who am possessed of prowess, and yourself desist from this rashness. Behold the mighty-armed Rāma brought down in battle.

data.v: प्रतिजानामि ते सत्यमायुधं चाहमालभे । यथा रामं वधिष्यामि वधार्हं सर्वरक्षसाम् ।।
data.es: I promise you on my weapon that I will kill Rama.He who killed all demons deserves to be slain.
data.anv: अहम् I, ते to you, सत्यम् truth, प्रतिजानामि I promise, आयुधं च on my weapon, आलभे I am touching, यथा as, सर्वरक्षसाम् of all demons, वधार्हम् should be slain, रामम् Rama, वधिष्यामि I will kill.
data.md: I swear (to you) truly; I touch this weapon, (to say) that I will stay Rāma, who deserves to be slain by all the Rākşasas.

data.v: अहं वास्य रणे मृत्युरेष वा समरे मम । विनिवर्त्य रणोत्साहं मुहूर्तं प्राश्निको भव ।।
data.es: Restrain yourself for a moment from the enthusiasm to fight the war. Please act as an arbitrator and see who is killing whom.
data.anv: रणोत्साहात् from the enthusiasm to fight, विनिवृत्य  restraining, रणे in fight, अहम् I, अस्य his, मृत्युः death, वा or, समरे in war, एषः this person, मम mine, मुहूर्तम् for a moment, प्राश्निकः a judge भव become.
data.md: Either I shall prove his death in battle, or he shall prove mine. Restraining your martial ardour, do you for a while become a witness.

data.v: प्रहृष्टो वा हते रामे जनस्थानं प्रयास्यसि । मयि वा निहते रामं संयुगायोपयास्यसि ।।
data.es: If Rama is killed be happy and go to Janasthana or else if I am killed you can fight.
data.anv: रामे when Rama, हते is killed, प्रहृष्टः with joy, जनस्थानम् to Janasthanam, प्रयास्यसि वा you will go or else, मयि वा when myself, निहते am killed, संयुगाय to the fight, रामम् Rama, उपयास्यसि वा you can fight.
data.md: Either, joyed in consequence of Rāma being slain, you shall repair to Janasthāna; or I being slain you shall enter the field (against him).

data.v: खरस्त्रिशिरसा तेन मृत्युलोभात्प्रसादितः । गच्छ युध्येत्यनुज्ञातो राघवाभिमुखो ययौ ।।
data.es: When Khara was prevailed upon by Trisara in that manner with a wish to face death, Khara permitted him by saying 'You may go and fight'.Accordingly he advanced towards Rama.
data.anv: खरः Khara, तेन by him, त्रिशिरसा by Trisira, मृत्युलोभात् due to eagerness to face death, प्रसादितः persuaded, गच्छ you may go, युध्य you may fight, इति thus, अनुज्ञातः permitted, राघवाभिमुखः forward to Rama, ययौ he went.
data.md: Thus satisfied by Trisirā, from his desire to meet with death, the latter, on being permitted with Go, proceeded towards Rāma.

data.v: त्रिशिराश्च रथेनैव वाजियुक्तेन भास्वता । अभ्यद्रवद्रणे रामं त्रिशृङ्ग इव पर्वतः ।।
data.es: Trisira who looked a mountain with three peaks also got horses harnessed to a shining chariot and to attack Rama proceeded.
data.anv: त्रिशिराश्च Trisira also, वाजियुक्तेन  horses harnessed, भास्वता shining, रथेनैव in a chariot, त्रिशृङ्गः three peaked Trishringa, पर्वतः इव mountain like, रणे in war, रामम् Rama, अभ्यद्रवत् attacked.
data.md: And like a hill with three sumınits, Trisirā rushed towards Rāma on an effulgent car yoked with steeds.

data.v: शरधारा समूहान्स महामेघ इवोत्सृजन् । व्यसृजत्सदृशं नादं जलार्द्रस्येव दुन्दुभेः ।।
data.es: Trisira unleashed a stream of arrows like a huge cloud (releasing rain). They produced sound, a drum drenched with water, creates.
data.anv: सः that Trisira, महामेघ इव like a huge cloud, शरधारासमूहान् streams of arrows, उत्सृजन्  unleashing, जलार्द्रस्य drenched with water, दुन्दुभेः of the drum, सदृशम् similar, नादम् sound, व्यसृजत् released.
data.md: And as a mighty cloud pours down shower, (Trisirā) discharging vollies of shafts, uttered a roar resembling the sound of a wet kettledrum.

data.v: आगच्छन्तं त्रिशिरसं राक्षसं प्रेक्ष्य राघवः । धनुषा प्रतिजग्राह विधुन्वन्सायकाञ्शितान् ।।
data.es: On seeing demon Trisira advancing towards him, Rama shook sharp arrows off his bow.
data.anv: राघवः Rama, आगच्छन्तम् advancing towards him, राक्षसम् the demon, त्रिशिरसम् Trisira, प्रेक्षय observing, शितान् sharp, सायकान् arrow, धनुषा setting the bow, विधुन्वन् shaking, प्रतिजग्राह retaliated.
data.md: And seeing that the Rākşasa Trisirã was advancing, Raghava resisted (his attack) by discharging sharpened shafts.

data.v: स संप्रहारस्तुमुलो राम त्रिशिरसोर्महान् । बभूवातीव बलिनोः सिंहकुञ्जरयोरिव ।।
data.es: The tumultuous combat between Rama and Trisira looked like the strong fight between a lion and an elephant.
data.anv: रामत्रिशिरसोः between Rama and Trisira, तुमुलः tumultuous, महान् great, सः सम्प्रहारः that fight, अतीव very, बलिनोः strong ones, सिंहकुञ्जरयोः इव as between a lion and an elephant, बभूव took place.
data.md: And that encounter of those exceedingly powerful ones, Rāma and Triſiră was fierce, like to that between a lion and an elephant.

data.v: ततस्त्रिशिरसा बाणैर्ललाटे ताडितस्त्रिभिः । अमर्षी कुपितो रामः संरब्धमिदमब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Then Rama hit with three arrows on the forehead by Trisira flew into a fury and said in a state of great excitement:
data.anv: ततः then, अमर्षी intolerant, रामः Rama, त्रिशिरसा by Trisira, त्रिभिः with three, बाणैः arrows, ललाटे on the forehead, ताडितः was hit, कुपितः a furious one, संरब्धम् very agitated, इदम् this way, अब्रवीत् he said.
data.md: Then struck on the forehead by a brace of shafts shot by Trisirā, the wrathful Rāma enraged, and inflamed with anger, said.

data.v: अहो विक्रमशूरस्य राक्षसस्येदृशं बलम् । पुष्पैरिव शरैर्यस्य ललाटेऽस्मि परिक्षतः । ममापि प्रतिगृह्णीष्व शरांश्चापगुणच्युतान् ।।
data.es: Oh see the strength of this undaunted demon whose arrows fell like flowers on my forehead and only left a scratch.
data.anv: अहो Oh, विक्रमशूरस्य of an undaunted hero, राक्षसस्य of the demon, बलम् strength, ईदृशम् this amount, यस्य his, शरैः with arrows, पुष्पैरिव with flowers, अस्मिन् ललाटे this forehead, परिक्षतः scratched.
data.md: Ah! such is the strength of the heroic Rākşasas! I have been wounded in the forehead with shafts resembling flowers. Do you also take the arrows shot from my bow.

data.v: एवमुक्त्वा तु संरब्धः शरानाशीविषोपमान् । त्रिशिरो वक्षसि क्रुद्धो निजघान चतुर्दश ।।
data.es: Receive the arrows released from my bowstring. Saying so, the angry and agitated Rama discharged fourteen arrows, venomous like a snake, on the chest of Trisira .
data.anv: मम my, चापगुणातच्च्युतान् released from the string of the bow, शरानपि arrows too, प्रतिगृह्णीष्व you may receive, एवम् in that manner, उक्त्वा having said, संरब्धः agitated, क्रुद्धः angry, अशीविषोपमान् like the poison of a venomous snake, चतुर्दश fourteen, शरान् arrows, त्रिशिरोवक्षसि on the chest of Trisira, निजघान hit.
data.md: Saying this, (Rāma) enraged, and influenced by wrath, wounded Trisiră in the breast with fourteen arrows.

data.v: चतुर्भिस्तुरगानस्य शरैः संनतपर्वभिः । न्यपातयत तेजस्वी चतुरस्तस्य वाजिनः ।।
data.es: With four arrows having strong joints, the mighty hero (Rama) threw down his enemy's four swiftfooted horses.
data.anv: तेजस्वी mighty man, सन्नतपर्वभिः with those having strong joints, चतुर्भिः with four, शरैः with arrows, तस्य his, अस्य his (Rama's), तुरगान् swift, चतुरः four, वाजिनः horses, न्यपातयत threw down.
data.md: And that energetic one by means of four shafts having their joints bent, brought down his four steeds. And by means of eight arrows (Rāma) laid low the charioteer from the front of the car.

data.v: अष्टभिः सायकैः सूतं रथोपस्थे न्यपातयत् । रामश्चिच्छेद बाणेन ध्वजं चास्य समुच्छ्रितम् ।।
data.es: Rama brought down the charioteer with eight arrows and with one tore down the lofty banner of the chariot to shreds.
data.anv: रामः Rama, अष्टभिः with eight, सायकैः arrows, सूतम् charioteer, रथोपस्थात् from the top of the chariot, न्यपातयत् brought down, बाणेन by one dart, अस्य his, समुच्छ्रितम् very lofty, ध्वजम् banner, चिच्छेद shattered to pieces.

data.v: ततो हतरथात्तस्मादुत्पतन्तं निशाचरम् । बिभेद रामस्तं बाणैर्हृदये सोऽभवज्जडः ।।
data.es: Rama then hit the demon with arrows on his chest while he was running away from the broken chariot. The demon became numb.
data.anv: ततः then, रामः Rama, तस्मात् from that, हतरथात् from a broken chariot, उत्पतन्तम् one who was running away, तं निशाचरम् that demon, बाणैः with arrows, हृदये in the chest, बिभेद hit, सः he, जडः a numb man, अभवत् became.
data.md: And Rāma with a shaft severed his upraised standard. Then as that ranger of the night was descending from his broken car, Rāma pierced his breast with arrows, and thereat he was stupified.

data.v: सायकैश्चाप्रमेयात्मा सामर्षस्तस्य रक्षसः । शिरांस्यपातयत्त्रीणि वेगवद्भिस्त्रिभिः शतैः ।।
data.es: The mighty Rama in fury dismembered the heads of that demon with three sharp and swift arrows.
data.anv: अप्रमेयात्मा a man of boundless strength, रामः Rama, सामर्षः an enraged one, वेगवद्भि: swift, शितैः with sharp ones, त्रिभिः three, सायकैः with arrows, तस्य रक्षसः that demon's, शिरांसि head, अपातयत् cut down.
data.md: Thereupon, that one of immeasurable prowess, out of anger by means of three shafts possessed of celerity, brought down Trisira's three heads.

data.v: स भूमौ शोणितोद्गारी रामबाणाभिपीडितः । न्यपतत्पतितैः पूर्वं स्वशिरोभिर्निशाचरः ।।
data.es: The demon with his heads decapitated, hit by Rama's arrows a little while ago, fell down, vomitting blood.
data.anv: रामबाणाभिपीडितः hit by the arrows of Rama, सः निशाचरः that demon, रुधिरोद्गारी vomitting blood, पूर्वम् a little while ago, पतितैः fallen down, स्वशिरोभिः with his heads, न्यपतत् fell down.
data.md: And that ranger of the night present in the field, afflicted by the shafts of Rāma, after his heads had fallen first, fell, vomiting smoking gore.

data.v: हतशेषास्ततो भग्ना राक्षसाः खरसंश्रयाः । द्रवन्ति स्म न तिष्ठन्ति व्याघ्रत्रस्ता मृगा इव ।।
data.es: Those surviving demons who were under the protection of Khara got scared and retreated fast and fled like deer frightened by a tiger.
data.anv: ततः then, खरसंश्रया under the protection of Khara, हतशेषाः surviving, राक्षसाः demons, भग्नाः with broken hearts, व्याघ्रतस्ताः those scared of  tiger, मृगाः यथा like deer, द्रवन्ति स्म fast retreated, न तिष्ठन्ति did not stop.
data.md: And the Räksasas remaining after the rest had been slain, belonging to Khara's original forces losing heart, began to flee like deer terrified at a hunter.

data.v: तान्खरो द्रवतो दृष्ट्वा निवर्त्य रुषितः स्वयम् । राममेवाभिदुद्राव राहुश्चन्द्रमसं यथा ।।
data.es: Personally persuading the fleeing army to come back, the angry Khara leaped forward towards Rama just as Rahu approaches the moon.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये अरण्यकाण्डे सप्तविंशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the twentyseventh sarga of Aranyakanda of the holy Ramayana the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: रुषितः angry, खरः Khara, द्रवतः retreating, तान् them, दृष्ट्वा on seeing, स्वयम् personally, निवर्त्य turning them back, राहुः Rahu, चन्द्रमसं यथा as towards Moon राममेव towards Rama alone, अभिदुद्राव ran after.

data.v: निहतं दूषणं दृष्ट्वा रणे त्रिशिरसा सह । खरस्याप्यभवत्त्रासो दृष्ट्वा रामस्य विक्रमम् ।।
data.es: Khara was overtaken by fear at the prowess of Rama, when he saw Dusana and Trisira killed.
data.anv: रणे in combat, त्रिशिरसा सह with Trisira, निहतम्  killed, दूषणम् Dusana, दृष्ट्वा  seeing, रामस्य Rama's, विक्रमम् prowess, दृष्ट्वा  seeing, खरस्यापि to Khara also, त्रासः fear, अभवत् overcame.
data.md: Seeing Düşaņa slain in fight along with Trisiră, Khara, witnessing Rāma's prowess, was filled with fear.

data.v: स दृष्ट्वा राक्षसं सैन्यमविषह्यं महाबलम् । हतमेकेन रामेण दूषणस्त्रिशिरा अपि ।।
data.es: Khara, the mighty demon, saw his large, irrepressible army killed. He saw Trisira and Dusana slain singlehanded by Rama. Nervous, he advanced towards Rama wage war just as Namuchi approached Indra.
data.anv: महाबलः extremely strong, राक्षसः demon, खरः Khara, अविसह्यम् irrepressible, राक्षसम् demon, सैन्यम् army, एकेन  alone, रामेण by Rama, हतम् killed, त्रिशिरोदूषणावपि Trisira and Dusana also, दृष्ट्वा  seeing, हतभूयिष्टम् very many killed, तत् बलम् the strength, विमनाः nervous प्रेक्ष्य witnessing, नमुचिः Namuchi, वासवं यथा similar to Indra, रामम् Rama, आससाद went towards.
data.md: Seeing that irresistible Raksasa host-even Düşaņa and Triſirā-slain by the mighty Rāma alone, and seeing the great courage that was made in the army, that Raksasa, Khara, was seized with despondency. Then as Namuci advances against Väsava, Khara stretching his powerful bow, advanced against Răma.

data.v: तद्बलं हतभूयिष्ठं विमनाः प्रेक्ष्य राक्षसः । आससाद खरो रामं नमुचिर्वासवं यथा ।।
data.es: Khara, the mighty demon, saw his large, irrepressible army killed. He saw Trisira and Dusana slain singlehanded by Rama. Nervous, he advanced towards Rama wage war just as Namuchi approached Indra.
data.anv: महाबलः extremely strong, राक्षसः demon, खरः Khara, अविसह्यम् irrepressible, राक्षसम् demon, सैन्यम् army, एकेन  alone, रामेण by Rama, हतम् killed, त्रिशिरोदूषणावपि Trisira and Dusana also, दृष्ट्वा  seeing, हतभूयिष्टम् very many killed, तत् बलम् the strength, विमनाः nervous प्रेक्ष्य witnessing, नमुचिः Namuchi, वासवं यथा similar to Indra, रामम् Rama, आससाद went towards.
data.md: Seeing that irresistible Raksasa host-even Düşaņa and Triſirā-slain by the mighty Rāma alone, and seeing the great courage that was made in the army, that Raksasa, Khara, was seized with despondency. Then as Namuci advances against Väsava, Khara stretching his powerful bow, advanced against Răma.

data.v: विकृष्य बलवच्चापं नाराचान्रक्तभोजनान् । खरश्चिक्षेप रामाय क्रुद्धानाशीविषानिव ।।
data.es: Khara drew his strong bowstring in anger and released the bloodhungry arrows, which appeared like venomous snakes.
data.anv: खरः Khara, बलवत् strong, चापम् bowstring, विकृष्य drawing, क्रुद्धान् angry, आशीविषानिव like venom of a poisonous serpent, रक्तभोजनान् whose food is blood, नाराचान् arrows, रामाय at Rama, चिक्षेप sent forth.
data.md: Khara hurled at Rāma nārācas revelling in blood, resembling infuriated venomous snakes.

data.v: ज्यां विधुन्वन्सुबहुशः शिक्षयास्त्राणि दर्शयन् । चचार समरे मार्गाञ्शरै रथगतः खरः ।।
data.es: Khara, sat on the chariot, and with a twang of his bowstring released arrows in all directions, exhibiting his skill in the use of weapons.
data.anv: रथगतः sittting on the chariot, खरः Khara, सुबहुशः in many ways, ज्याम् bowstring, विधून्वन् while making a twang, शिक्षया with training, अस्त्राणि weapons, दर्शयन् while exhibiting, समरे in war, शरैः arrows, मार्गाणि in all directions, चचार released.
data.md: Repeatedly twanging his twanging his bow, Khara, mounted on his car, began to range the field, displaying his weapons through his acquired skill.

data.v: स सर्वाश्च दिशो बाणैः प्रदिशश्च महारथः । पूरयामास तं दृष्ट्वा रामोऽपि सुमहद्धनुः ।।
data.es: When Rama, the great warrior, saw Khara approaching him, he fixed powerful arrows on his bow and covered all directions and intermediate quarters with his arrows.
data.anv: महारथः great warrior, सः he, सर्वाः all, दिशः sides, प्रदिशश्च intermediate directions, बाणैः arrows, पूरयामास filled, तम् him, दृष्ट्वा saw, रामोऽपि even Rama, सुमहत् powerful, धनुः bow, पूरयामास started filling.
data.md: And that mighty car-warrior covered all sides with his shafts. And secing this, Rāma of a tremendous bow with shafts incapable of being borne, and resembling tongues of flaming fire, entirely enveloped the welkin, even as a cloud pour down showers.

data.v: स सायकैर्दुर्विषहैः सस्फुलिङ्गैरिवाग्निभिः । नभश्चकाराविवरं पर्जन्य इव वृष्टिभिः ।।
data.es: He rained sparkling arrows which were irresistible. He filled the sky with arrows just as the raingod fills it with rain without leaving any space.
data.anv: सः he, दुर्विसहैः by irresistible, सस्फुलिङ्गैः with sparkling, अग्निभिः इव like fire, सायकैः with arrows, पर्जन्यः cloud, वृष्टिभिः इव with showers like, नभः the sky, अविवरम् not leaving any space, चकार filled.
data.md: And that mighty car-warrior covered all sides with his shafts. And secing this, Rāma of a tremendous bow with shafts incapable of being borne, and resembling tongues of flaming fire, entirely enveloped the welkin, even as a cloud pour down showers.

data.v: तद्बभूव शितैर्बाणैः खररामविसर्जितैः । पर्याकाशमनाकाशं सर्वतः शरसंकुलम् ।।
data.es: The arrows released by Khara and Rama on one another filled the entire sky. Everywhere only arrows and no sky could be seen.
data.anv: खररामविसर्जितैः  released by Khara and Rama, शितैः by sharp, बाणैः with arrows, तत् that, पर्याकाशम्  surrounding sky, सर्वतः all over, शरसङ्कुलम् filled with arrows, अनाकाशम् as though there is no sky, बभूव appeared.
data.md: With the sharpened shafts shot by Khara and Rāma, the entire firmament on all sides was thronged.

data.v: शरजालावृतः सूर्यो न तदा स्म प्रकाशते । अन्योन्यवधसंरम्भादुभयोः संप्रयुध्यतोः ।।
data.es: While they were engaged in the battle, eager to kill each other the sky was covered with arrow and the Sun could not be seen.
data.anv: अन्योन्यवधसंरम्भात् eager to kill each other, उभयोः both, सम्प्रयुध्यतोः of those waging (fighting), तदा then, शरजालावृतः covered with arrows, सूर्यः Sun, न प्रकाशते स्म not seen.
data.md: And as each enraged was engaged in coping with the other, the sun, enveloped in a net-work of shafts, did not appear.

data.v: ततो नालीकनाराचैस्तीक्ष्णाग्रैश्च विकर्णिभिः । आजघान रणे रामं तोत्रैरिव महाद्विपम् ।।
data.es: The bodies of the demons torn into pieces by the very sharp iron arrows and by the arrows called vikarni, they cried and shouted aloud in pitiable voices.
data.anv: ततः then, नालीकनाराचैः with iron arrows, तीक्ष्णाग्रैः with sharp tops, विकर्णिभिः by shafts called vikarni, भिद्यमानाः torn into parts, निशाचराः demons, भीमम् terrible, आर्तस्वरम् pitiable cries, चक्रुः made.
data.md: As a mighty elephant is struck with the goad, Rāma in the conflict attacked (his opponent) with nalikas and nārācas and sharp-pointed vikarna.

data.v: तं रथस्थं धनुष्पाणिं राक्षसं पर्यवस्थितम् । ददृशुः सर्वभूतानि पाशहस्तमिवान्तकम् ।।
data.es: Demon Khara positioned on the chariot, bow in hand, appeared to all beings like Yama, god of death holding the noose.
data.anv: रथस्थम् on the chariot, धनुष्पाणिम् holding the bow in hand, पर्यवस्थितम् seated, तं राक्षसम् that demon, पाशहस्तम् holding the noose, अन्तकम् इव like the god of death (Yama), सर्वभूतानि all beings, ददृशुः observed.
data.md: And as that Rākşasa sat on his car, bow in hand, all creatures saw him, as if he were the very destroyer with the noose in his hand.

data.v: तं सिंहमिव विक्रान्तं सिंहविक्रान्तगामिनम् । दृष्ट्वा नोद्विजते रामः सिंहः क्षुद्रमृगं यथा ।।
data.es: When Rama saw Khara aggressively advancing like a lion to attack him, he was not perturbed, for he knew he was a fawn before a lion (which Rama was).
data.anv: सिंहमिव like a lion, विक्रान्तम् aggressive, सिंह विक्रान्तगामिनम् advancing to attack, तम् him, दृष्ट्वा seeing, रामः Rama, सिंहः lion, क्षुद्रमृगं यथा just like a fawn, नोद्विजते not perturbed.
data.md: Seeing that one powerful like the lion, and gifted with the vigorous gait of the lion, Rāma was not moved, as a lion seeing a puny deer (is not moved).

data.v: ततः सूर्यनिकाशेन रथेन महता खरः । आससाद रणे रामं पतङ्ग इव पावकम् ।।
data.es: Then Khara mounting a great chariot which was glowing like the Sun, advanced towards Rama just as an insect hurtles towards fire.
data.anv: ततः then, खरः Khara, सूर्यनिकाशेन glowing like the Sun, महता great, रथेन on a chariot, रामम् to Rama, पतङ्ग insect, पावकम् इव like going towards fire, रणे war, आससाद went forward.
data.md: And then as an insect falls into a flame, Khara mounting a mighty car, resembling the sun, approached Rāma.

data.v: ततोऽस्य सशरं चापं मुष्टिदेशे महात्मनः । खरश्चिच्छेद रामस्य दर्शयन्पाणिलाघवम् ।।
data.es: Exhibiting his agility of the hand, Khara shattered the bow and the arrow in the grip of Rama ,the great soul.
data.anv: ततः then, खरः Khara, पाणिलाघवम् agility of the hand, दर्शयन् exhibiting, महात्मनः of the great self, अस्य रामस्य Rama's, सशरम् along with the arrow, चापम् bow, मुष्टिदेशे at the grip, चिच्छेद shattered.
data.md: And, displaying his lightness of hand, Khara severed the bow of the magnanimous Rāma, with the arrow (fixed on it) at the place where it is grasped.

data.v: स पुनस्त्वपरान्सप्त शरानादाय वर्मणि । निजघान रणे क्रुद्धः शक्राशनिसमप्रभान् ।।
data.es: The influriated Khara this time took up seven arrows blazing like Indra's thunderbolt and hit his armour.
data.anv: सः that, खरः Khara, क्रुद्धः angry, पुनः again, शक्राशनिसमप्रभान् blazing like Indra's thunderbolt, अपरान् others, सप्त seven, शरान् arrows, आदाय taking up, वर्मणि at the  armour, निजघान hit.
data.md: Then taking up seven other shafts, resplendent like the thunderbolt of Sakra, Khara, enraged, sent them into (Rāma's) main-joints, and then afflicting Rāma of unparalleled energy with a thousand shafts, Khara sent up in that conflict a loud shout.

data.v: ततस्तत्प्रहतं बाणैः खरमुक्तैः सुपर्वभिः । पपात कवचं भूमौ रामस्यादित्यवर्चसः ।।
data.es: The armour of Rama who looked radiant like the Sun fell on the ground, struck by the welljointed darts released by Khara.
data.anv: ततः thereafter, खरमुक्तैः shot by Khara, सुपर्वभिः by the welljointed, बाणैः with darts, प्रहतम् struck, आदित्यवर्चसः a man radiant like the Sun, रामस्य Rama's, तत् that, कवचम् armour, भूमौ on the ground, पपात fell down.
data.md: And riven by the shafts discharged by Khara, Rāma's mail resembling the sun fell to the ground.

data.v: स शरैरर्पितः क्रुद्धः सर्वगात्रेषु राघवः । रराज समरे रामो विधूमोऽग्निरिव ज्वलन् ।।
data.es: Wounded all over the body, bleeding through the wounds caused by weapons, Rama looked like the evening Sun covered with clouds.
data.anv: शरैः with darts, सर्वगात्रेषु in all limbs, अर्दितः afflicted, राघवः a scion of Raghu race, सः रामः that Rama, क्रुद्धः angry, विधूमः without smoke, ज्वलन् while burning, अग्निरिव like fire, समरे in fight, रराज glowed.
data.md: And pierced with those arrow, all over his body, and inflamed with rage, Rāghava appeared in the field, like a smokeless flaming fire.

data.v: ततो गम्भीरनिर्ह्रादं रामः शत्रुनिबर्हणः । चकारान्ताय स रिपोः सज्यमन्यन्महद्धनुः ।।
data.es: Then Rama, destroyer of foes, strung another great bow of fearful sound in order to put an end to the enemy.
data.anv: ततः then, शत्रुनिबर्हणः destroyer of foes, रामः Rama, रिपोः enemy, अन्ताय to put an end to, गम्भीरनिर्ह्रादम् deep sound, अन्यत् another one, महत् great, धनुः bow, सज्यम् string, चकार  did.
data.md: Then that destroyer of foes, Rāma, for compassing the end of his enemy, stringed another mighty bow, sending forth solemn sounds, the redoubtable Vaisnava bow that had been conferred on him by the Maharşi.

data.v: सुमहद्वैष्णवं यत्तदतिसृष्टं महर्षिणा । वरं तद्धनुरुद्यम्य खरं समभिधावत ।।
data.es: Thereafter Rama advanced, aiming at Khara the superior Vaishnava bow given by sage Agastya.
data.anv: तत् thereafter, यत् that, सुमहत् very powerful, वैष्णवम् Vaishnava, धनुः bow, महर्षिणा by the sage, अतिसृष्टम् given, वरम् best, तत् that, उद्यम्य aiming, खरम् Khara, समभिधावत advanced.
data.md: Then that destroyer of foes, Rāma, for compassing the end of his enemy, stringed another mighty bow, sending forth solemn sounds, the redoubtable Vaisnava bow that had been conferred on him by the Maharşi.

data.v: ततः कनकपुङ्खैस्तु शरैः संनतपर्वभिः । चिच्छेद रामः संक्रुद्धः खरस्य समरे ध्वजम् ।।
data.es: Rama took up in a rage the welljointed, smooth darts with golden feathers and broke the flag post of the chariot of Khara to pieces.
data.anv: ततः then, रामः Rama, सङ्क्रुद्धः enraged, कनकपुङ्खैः with golden feathers, सन्नतपर्वभिः welljointed and smooth, शरैः darts, समरे in war, खरस्य of Khara, ध्वजम् flag on the chariot, बिभेद broken to pieces.
data.md: And uplifting that superior bow, Rāma rushed against Khara. Then with shafts having bent knots and golden feathers, Rāma, wrought up with rage, severed in battle Khara's standard.

data.v: स दर्शनीयो बहुधा विच्छिन्नः काञ्चनो ध्वजः । जगाम धरणीं सूर्यो देवतानामिवाज्ञया ।।
data.es: The beautiful, golden flag post, broken into several pieces, fell down on earth.It appeared as if the Sun had come down to earth at the behest of the gods.
data.anv: बहुधा many ways, विकीर्णः broken, दर्शनीयः a beautiful one, सः that, काञ्चनध्वजः golden flag post, देवतानाम् of deities, आज्ञया by order, सूर्यः इव like Sun, धरणीम् on the ground, जगाम fell down.
data.md: And on that exceedingly graceful golden standard being hewn down it seemed as if the sun dropped to the earth at the behest of the celestials.

data.v: तं चतुर्भिः खरः क्रुद्धो रामं गात्रेषु मार्गणैः । विव्याध हृदि मर्मज्ञो मातङ्गमिव तोमरैः ।।
data.es: Quite enraged, Khara who knew how to hit the tender parts (of the body) in an encounter sent out four arrows on Rama. It was like poking an elephant's limbs with a javelin.
data.anv: क्रुद्धः enraged, मर्मज्ञः one who knows the tender parts of the body, खरः Khara, युधि in war, तं रामम् that Rama, चतुर्भिः four, मार्गणैः with arrows, मातङ्गम् elephant, तोमरैरिव like with a javelin, गात्रेषु on his limbs, विव्याध hit.
data.md: And thereat Khara, understanding the import of things, fired with wrath, pierced Rāma's breast with five arrows, like one striking an elephant with a goad.

data.v: स रामो बहुभिर्बाणैः खरकार्मुकनिःसृतैः । विद्धो रुधिरसिक्ताङ्गो बभूव रुषितो भृशम् ।।
data.es: Rama, hit by the arrows released from the bow of Khara, all his limbs drenched in blood, became very furious.
data.anv: सः रामः that Rama, खरकार्मुकनिस्सृतैः by those arrows released from the bow of Khara, बहुभिः several, बाणैः arrows, विद्धः hit, रुधिरसिक्ताङ्गः one whose limbs were drenched in blood, भृशम् very, रुषितः furious, बभूव became.
data.md: Rāma on being pierced with a good many shafts discharged from Khara's bow, and having his body bathed in blood, was highly wroth.

data.v: स धनुर्धन्विनां श्रेष्ठः प्रगृह्य परमाहवे । मुमोच परमेष्वासः षट्शरानभिलक्षितान् ।।
data.es: The best among archers and a supreme shooter, he lifted the bow, fixed his target and released six arrows in the great fight.
data.anv: परमाहवे in that great war, धन्विनाम् among archers, श्रेष्ठः best one, परमेष्वासः supreme shooter of arrows, सः he, धनुः bow, प्रगृह्य lifting, अभिलक्षितान् setting his goal, षट् six, शरान् arrows, मुमोच released.
data.md: Thereupon that foremost of bowmen, and wielder of a mighty bow, taking six shafts, let them go, after aiming at them.

data.v: शिरस्येकेन बाणेन द्वाभ्यां बाह्वोरथार्पयत् । त्रिभिश्चन्द्रार्धवक्त्रैश्च वक्षस्यभिजघान ह ।।
data.es: Rama hit one arrow on the head, two on the shoulders and three of the shape of the crescent moon on the chest (of the enemy).
data.anv: एकेन with one, बाणेन with an arrow, शिरसि on head, अथ and, द्वाभ्याम् with two, बाह्वोः on shoulders, अर्दयत् hit, त्रिभिः three, चन्द्रार्धवक्त्रैः Moon shaped, वक्षसि on the chest, अभिजघान ह struck.
data.md: And with one shaft he pierced Khara's head, with two his arms, and with three arrows headed like half-moons, Rāma wounded Khara in the chest.

data.v: ततः पश्चान्महातेजा नाराचान्भास्करोपमान् । जिघांसू राक्षसं क्रुद्धस्त्रयोदश शिलाशितान् ।।
data.es: Then the effulgent Rama, mighty angry, took fourteen arrows sharpened by stones and glowing like the Sun.
data.anv: ततः then, महातेजाः effulgent, परमक्रुद्धः  enraged, शिलाशितान् sharpened by stone, सूर्यसन्निभान् glowing like the Sun, चतुर्दश fourteen, नाराचान् arrows, जग्राह took.

data.v: ततोऽस्य युगमेकेन चतुर्भिश्चतुरो हयान् । षष्ठेन च शिरः संख्ये चिच्छेद खरसारथेः ।।
त्रिभिस्त्रिवेणुं बलवान्द्वाभ्यामक्षं महाबलः । द्वादशेन तु बाणेन खरस्य सशरं धनुः । छित्त्वा वज्रनिकाशेन राघवः प्रहसन्निव । त्रयोदशेनेन्द्रसमो बिभेद समरे खरम् ।।
data.es: Rama, like Indra, strong and mighty, broke the yoke of Khara's chariot with one arrow, the four horses with four arrows, and with the sixth the charioteer's head, with three others the main pole of the chariot, with two the axle of the chariot, and with the twelfth Khara's bow and arrows were splintered. As if laughing at him, he pierced Khara's body with the thirteenth arrow.
data.anv: इन्द्रसमः like Indra, बलवान् strong, महाबलः powerful, राघवः Rama, सङ्ख्ये in war, एकेन with one, अस्य his, रथस्य chariot's, युगम् yoke, चतुर्भिः with four, चतुरः four, हयान् horses, षष्ठेन with the sixth one, खरस्य Khara's, रथसारथेः charioteer, शिरः head, त्रिभिः with three, त्रिवेणुम्  main pole, द्वाभ्याम् with two, अक्षम् axle, द्वादशेन twelfth, बाणेन arrow, खरस्य Khara's, सशरम् along with arrow, धनुः bow, छित्वा made into pieces, प्रहसन्निव as if laughing at, समरे in the fight, वज्रनिकाशेन diamond like arrow, त्रयोदशेन with the thirteenth, खरम् to Khara, बिभेद pierced.

data.v: प्रभग्नधन्वा विरथो हताश्वो हतसारथिः । गदापाणिरवप्लुत्य तस्थौ भूमौ खरस्तदा ।।
