data.anv: दीनमनसः dejected at heart, मृगपक्षिणः animals and birds, दीनम् piteous, महात्मानम् great soul, तम् him, सव्यम् कृत्वा keeping him to the left, आसेदुः remained, घोरान् horrifying, स्वरान् sounds, ससृजुश्च released.
data.md: And birds and beasts approached that highsouled one distressed and depressed in spirit; and staying on his left set up frightful cries.

data.v: तानि दृष्ट्वा निमित्तानि महाघोराणि राघवः । ततो लक्षणमायान्तं ददर्श विगतप्रभम् ।।
data.es: On seeing such dreadfu omens at that time, Rama hurried back to his hermitage.
data.anv: राघवः Rama, महाघोराणि very dreadful, तानि निमित्तानि such omens, दृष्ट्वा after seeing, अथ then, त्वरितः hastened, जवेन with speed, आत्मनः his, आश्रमम् hermitage, न्यवर्तत returned.
data.md: As he was witnessing the exceedingly dreadful signs, Rāghava saw Lakşmaņa coming with a lacklustre (countenance); and Lakşmaņa came up to Rāma.

data.v: ततोऽविदूरे रामेण समीयाय स लक्ष्मणः । विषण्णः स विषण्णेन दुःखितो दुःखभागिना ।।
data.es: He then saw Lakshmana coming towards him with a cheerless face. When the sad, depressed Lakshmana came near, he saw Rama (equally) despondent and griefstricken.
data.anv: ततः thereafter, आयान्तम् while coming, विगतप्रभम् dull, लक्ष्मणम् to Lakshmana, ददर्श saw, ततः then, विषण्णः a despondent one, दुःखितः one in grief, सः लक्ष्मणः that Lakshmana, सुविषण्णेन with a despondent one, दुःखभागिना immersed in sorrow, रामेण Rama, अविदूरे not very far, समीयाय went near.

data.v: संजगर्हेऽथ तं भ्राता जेष्ठो लक्ष्मणमागतम् । विहाय सीतां विजने वने राक्षससेविते ।।
data.es: In this situation Rama the elder brother rebuked Lakshmana for having left Sita behind in a desolate forest infested with demons.
data.anv: अथ at that time, ज्येष्ठः भ्राता elder brother Rama, राक्षससेविते in a place infested with demons, विजने in a desolate, वने forest, सीताम् Sita, विहाय leaving, आगतम् one who came, तं लक्ष्मणम् to that Lakshmana, सञ्जगर्हे rebuked.
data.md: And depressed in spirit, he was rendered still more sad by that one who, afflicted with depression shared his sorrow. And, seeing that (Laksmana) bad come, leaving Sita in that solitary wood frequented by Rākşasas, his brother fell to reprimanding him.

data.v: गृहीत्वा च करं सव्यं लक्ष्मणं रघुनन्दनः । उवाच मधुरोदर्कमिदं परुषमार्तवत् ।।
data.es: Rama, the delight of the Raghus, took hold of Lakshmana's left hand, and in sadness said these sweet harsh words :
data.anv: रघुनन्दनः a delight of the Raghu dynasty, आर्तिमत् piteously, सव्यं करम् left hand, गृहीत्वा on taking hold, मधुरोदर्कम् sweet as ever, परुषम् harsh, इदम् this, लक्ष्मणम् to Lakshmana, उवाच said.
data.md: And taking Lakşmaņa's left hand, the son of Raghu in extreme distress sweetly spoke these rough words,

data.v: अहो लक्ष्मण गर्ह्यं ते कृतं यत्त्वं विहाय ताम् । सीतामिहागतः सौम्य कच्चित्स्वस्ति भवेदिति ।।
data.es: O gentle Lakshmana you are to blame for coming here, leaving Sita behind. Alas will she be safe now?
data.anv: सौम्य O gentle one, लक्ष्मण Lakshmana, यः who, त्वम् you, ताम् her, सीताम् Sita, विहाय leaving, इह here, आगतः came, ते to you, गर्ह्यम् blameworthy, कृतम् done, इह here, स्वस्ति safe, भवेत् कच्चित् will she be safe, अहो Alas.
data.md: Alas! Laksmana, you have committed a censurable.,act; leaving Sita, O mild one, you have come hither. Is it well with her?

data.v: न मेऽस्ति संशयो वीर सर्वथा जनकात्मजा । विनष्टा भक्षिता वाप राक्षसैर्वनचारिभिः ।।
data.es: O heroic Lakshmana I see many inauspicious omens. I think Sita might have been lost or eaten away by the demons of the forest. There is no doubt about it.
data.anv: वीर O great hero, मे to me, भूयिष्ठम् many, अशुभान्येव inauspicious omens only, यथा similarly, प्रादुर्भवन्ति got manifested, जनकात्मजा Sita, सर्वथा by all means, विनष्टा she is lost, वनचारिभिः by forsetrangers, राक्षसैः demons, भक्षिता वापि must have been eaten up, मे for me, संशयः doubt, नास्ति is not.
data.md: I make no doubt, O hero, but that Janaka's daughter has either been slain or devoured by Rākṣasas ranging the forest.

data.v: अशुभान्येव भूयिष्ठं यथा प्रादुर्भवन्ति मे । अपि लक्ष्मण सीतायाः सामग्र्यं प्राप्नुयावहे ।।
data.md: And, considering the many omens that take place before me, O Laksmana, I do not know whether we shall light upon welfare of Janaka's daughter Sita being alive, O best of men.

data.v: इदं हि रक्षोमृगसंनिकाशं; प्रलोभ्य मां दूरमनुप्रयातम् । हतं कथंचिन्महता श्रमेण; स राक्षसोऽभून्म्रियमाण एव ।।
data.es: Appearing in the guise of a deer, this demon allured me to a great distance. With much effort he was somehow killed. but he assumed his demoniac form while dying.
data.anv: मृगसन्निकाशम् appearing like a deer, इदं रक्षः this demon, अनुप्रयान्तम् who followed, माम् me, दूरम् far, प्रलोभ्य alluring, महता with great, श्रमेण with effort, कथञ्चित् somehow, हतम् killed, सः he, म्रियमाणः while on the verge of death, एव too, राक्षसः demon, अभूत् turned.
data.md: This Rākşasa, who, wearing the shape of a deer, and, alluring me, had drawn me far, has in some sort been slain by me wiih much ado; and he became a Rāksasa at the time of his death.

data.v: मनश्च मे दीनमिहाप्रहृष्टं; चक्षुश्च सव्यं कुरुते विकारम् । असंशयं लक्ष्मण नास्ति सीता; हृता मृता वा पथि वर्तते वा ।।
data.es: With my heart dejected and depressed, my left eye throbbing, O Lakshmana, I have no doubt that Sita is either abducted or dead or abandoned on the way.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये अरण्यकाण्डे सप्तपञ्चाशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the fiftyseventh sarga of Aranyakanda of the holy Ramayana the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: इह here, दीनम् depressed, मे मनश्च my heart, अप्रहृष्टम् sorrowful, सव्यं चक्षुश्च left eye, विकारम् throbbing, कुरुते doing, लक्ष्मण Lakshmana, असंशयम् no doubt, सीता Sita, नास्ति is not alive, हृता either abducted, मृता वा or died, पथि on the way, वर्तते वा lies.
data.md: Yet my mind is poor and cheerless; and my left eye throbs. Doubtless, O Laksmana, Sita is not, she is either carried away, or dead, or is wandering on the way. SECITION 58

data.v: स दृष्ट्वा लक्ष्मणं दीनं शून्ये दशरथात्मजः । पर्यपृच्छत धर्मात्मा वैदेहीमागतं विना ।।
data.es: Rama, son of Dasaratha, the righteous self, saw Lakshmana downcast and dejected. Seeing him without Sita, Rama enquired:
data.anv: धर्मात्मा righteous self, सः दशरथात्मजः that son of Dasaratha, शून्ये downcast, वैदेहीं विना without Vaidehi, आगतम् who came, दीनम् depressed, लक्ष्मणम् Lakshmana, दृष्ट्वा seeing, पर्यपृच्छत questioned.
data.md: Seeing Lakşmana cast down, cheerless, and come without Vaidehī, the righteous son of Dasaratha, asked him.

data.v: प्रस्थितं दण्डकारण्यं या मामनुजगाम ह । क्व सा लक्ष्मण वैदेही यां हित्वा त्वमिहागतः ।।
data.es: Where is that princess from Videha who accompanied me when I entered Dandaka forest ? Why have you come here leaving her behind ?
data.anv: लक्ष्मण Lakshmna, दण्डकारण्यम् to Dandakaranyam, प्रस्थितम् entered, माम् me, या who,   अनुजगाम ह followed, याम् whom, हित्वा having left, त्वम् you, इह here, आगतः came, सा वैदेही that Vaidehi, क्व where is she?
data.md: Where, O Laksmana is that Vaidehi, who has followed me to the Dandaka forest, and leaving whom you have come hither?

data.v: राज्यभ्रष्टस्य दीनस्य दण्डकान्परिधावतः । क्व सा दुःखसहाया मे वैदेही तनुमध्यमा ।।
data.es: Where is that princess from Videha, a sharer of my sorrows, Sita of slender waist who followed this hapless prince disloged from the kingdom into the Dandaka forest?
data.anv: राज्यभ्रष्टस्य forsaking the kingdom, दण्डकान् Dandaka, परिधावतः running about, दीनस्य of a dejected, मे mine, दुःखसहाया a sharer of my sorrow, तनुमध्यमा lady of slender waist, सा वैदेही that Vaidehi, क्व where is she?
data.md: Where is that one of a slender waist, who is the help in trouble of me, deprived of my kingdom, dispirited, and running about the Dandakas?

data.v: यां विना नोत्सहे वीर मुहूर्तमपि जीवितुम् । क्व सा प्राणसहाया मे सीता सुरसुतोपमा ।।
data.es: O warrior Lakshmana where is that Sita without whom I have no interest to live for a moment, who was like the daughter of a god and a sustainer of my life?
data.anv: वीर O Warrior, यां विना without whom, मुहूर्तमपि even for a moment, जीवितुम् to live, नोत्सहे I have no interest, सा she, सुरसुतोपमा who resembles the daughter of a god, मे my, प्राणसहाया sustainer of my life, सीता Sita, क्व Where is she?
data.md: Without whom, O hero, I cannot live for a moment-where is that life's help of me Sītā resembling the daughter of a celestial?

data.v: पतित्वममराणां वा पृथिव्याश्चापि लक्ष्मण । विना तां तपनीयाभां नेच्छेयं जनकात्मजाम् ।।
data.es: O Lakshmana I desire no lordship of the gods or of the entire earth without that daughter of Janaka, that lady of golden complexion.
data.anv: लक्ष्मण Lakshmana, तपनीयाभाम् goldenhued lady, ताम् she, जनकात्मजां विना without Janaka's daughter, अमराणाम् of gods, पतित्वम् lordship, पृथिव्याश्च of the earth, नेच्छेयम् do not desire.
data.md: O Laksmana, without Janaka's daughter (hued) like burning gold, I covet not the sovereignty of the celestials or the earth.

data.v: कच्चिज्जीवति वैदेही प्राणैः प्रियतरा मम । कच्चित्प्रव्राजनं सौम्य न मे मिथ्या भविष्यति ।।
data.es: O gentle Lakshmana I wonder if Vaidehi, who is dearer to me than my life is still alive I hope my banishment from the kingdom is not going to prove false.
data.anv: सौम्य O gentle, मम my, प्राणैः than life, प्रियतरा dearer, वैदेही Vaidehi, जीवति कच्चित् will she be alive, मे my, प्रव्राजनम् banishment from kingdom, मिथ्या prove to be false, न भविष्यति कच्चित् shall not become.
data.md: Is Vaidehī, dearer to me than my life still living? Shall this exile of mine be of no avail?

data.v: सीतानिमित्तं सौमित्रे मृते मयि गते त्वयि । कच्चित्सकामा सुखिता कैकेयी सा भविष्यति ।।
data.es: O Saumitri when I am dead on account of Sita, and you are back, Kaikeyi with her desire fulfilled will be happy, indeed.
data.anv: सौमित्रे Saumitri, सीतानिमित्तम् on account of Sita, मयि when I will be, मृते dead, त्वयि when you, गते will be gone, सा कैकेयी that Kaikeyi, सकामा with her desire fulfilled, सुखिता a happy soul, भविष्यति कच्चित् will be indeed.

data.v: सपुत्रराज्यां सिद्धार्थां मृतपुत्रा तपस्विनी । उपस्थास्यति कौसल्या कच्चिन्सौम्य न कैकयीम् ।।
data.es: O handsome one I wonder if that lady of renunciation, Kausalya with her son dead, will have to serve Kaikeyi whose desire would be fulfilled, and who will enjoy the power of the throne in the company of her son
data.anv: सौम्य O handsome one, मृतपुत्रा  with her son dead, तपस्विनी a lady of renunciation, कौसल्या Kausalya, सपुत्रराज्याम् who enjoys the company of a son and power of the throne, सिद्धार्थाम् accomplished her desire, कैकयीम् Kaikeyi, न उपस्थास्यति कच्चित् cease to serve indeed.
data.md: O Sumitrā's son, on my dying for Sītā and your returning (to the city). shall Kaikeyi have her desire, and attain felicity; and shall Kausalyā, her son dead, and herself wearing the guise of a female mendicant, humbly wait upon Kaikeyi when she shall have succeeded in obtaining the kingdom for her son?

data.v: यदि जीवति वैदेही गमिष्याम्याश्रमं पुनः । सुवृत्ता यदि वृत्ता सा प्राणांस्त्यक्ष्यामि लक्ष्मण ।।
data.es: O Lakshmana, only if Vaidehi is alive will I enter the cottage again or else I will give up my life if that virtuous lady is no more.
data.anv: लक्ष्मण O Lakshmana, वैदेही Vaidehi, जीवति यदि if she is living only, पुनः again, आश्रमम् to the cottage, गमिष्यामि will go, यदि वा or else, सुवृत्ता virtuous, वृत्ता dead, प्राणान् life, त्यक्ष्यामि I will give up.
data.md: If Vaidehī live, I will then return to the asylum; but O Lakşmaņa, if that one of excellent character should happen to be dead, I will also renounce my life.

data.v: यदि मामाश्रमगतं वैदेही नाभिभाषते । पुनः प्रहसिता सीता विनशिष्यामि लक्ष्मण ।।
data.es: I will die if Sita, princess from Videha, is not there to speak to me with her sweet smile when I return to the cottage, O Lakshmana
data.anv: लक्ष्मण Lakshmana, आश्रमगतम् when I return to the cottage, माम् me, वैदेही Vaidehi, सीता Sita, प्रहसिता with her sweet smile, पुनः again, नाभिभाषते यदि if she does not speak to me, विनशिष्यामि I will die.
data.md: If, O Laksmana, Vaidehi ever precluding her speech with a smile should not speak to me when I arrive at the asylum, I shall give up my life.

data.v: ब्रूहि लक्ष्मण वैदेही यदि जीवति वा न वा । त्वयि प्रमत्ते रक्षोभिर्भक्षिता वा तपस्विनी ।।
data.es: Tell me, O Lakshmana if Sita is alive or not, whether she was eaten up by demons when you were off your guard.
data.anv: लक्ष्मण Lakshmana, वैदेही Vaidehi, जीवति वा alive or, न वा not, त्वयि you, प्रमत्ते were not alert, तपस्विनी lady of renunciation, रक्षोभिः by the demons, भक्षिता वा have they eaten, ब्रूहि tell me.
data.md: tell me, O Laksmana, whether Do you Videha's daughter live or not; or whether, in consequence of your acting heedlessly, that forlorn wench has been devoured by Raksasas.

data.v: सुकुमारी च बाला च नित्यं चादुःखदर्शिनी । मद्वियोगेन वैदेही व्यक्तं शोचति दुर्मनाः ।।
data.es: Vaidehi is delicate, young and she has never faced any sorrow.She will be certainly disheartened due to separation from me.
data.anv: सुकुमारी च a delicate, बाला च young also, नित्यम् always, अदुःखदर्शिनी never experienced sorrow, वैदेही Vaidehi, दुर्मनाः troubled mind, मद्वियोगेन by separation from me, शोचति thinking of, व्यक्तम् it is true.
data.md: Of a tender frame, and a mere girl, Vaidehi, never having experienced unhappiness being cast down, surely weep for my separation.

data.v: सर्वथा रक्षसा तेन जिह्मेन सुदुरात्मना । वदता लक्ष्मणेत्युच्चैस्तवापि जनितं भयम् ।।
data.es: The evilminded, wicked demon calling out loudly 'O Lakshmana' must have by all means instilled fear in your mind.
data.anv: जिह्मेन by the wicked, सुदुरात्मना by the evilminded, लक्ष्मण इति saying Lakshmana thus, उच्चैः loudly, वदता calling out, तेन by him, रक्षसा demon, सर्वथा by all means, तवापि for you also, भयम् fear, जनितम् is created.
data.md: When that exceedingly wicked Rākşasa cried, Lakşmaņa at the top of his voice, was you also seized with fear?

data.v: श्रुतश्च शङ्के वैदेह्या स स्वरः सदृशो मम । त्रस्तया प्रेषितस्त्वं च द्रष्टुं मां शीघ्रमागतः ।।
data.es: I am afraid, Vaidehi, frightened by hearing the voice which was like mine sent you to see me, and you came all at once.
data.anv: वैदेह्या by Vaidehi, मम of me, सदृशः similar, सः that, स्वरः voice, श्रुतः was heard, शङ्के       I doubt, त्रस्तया by a frightened lady, प्रेषितः sent, त्वं च you too, माम् me, द्रष्टुम् to see, शीघ्रम् quickly, आगतः came.
data.md: And I apprehend that voice resembling mine was heard by Vaidehī; and, despatched by her from fear, you may have come hither swiftly to see* me. Some texts-to rescue me.

data.v: सर्वथा तु कृतं कष्टं सीतामुत्सृजता वने । प्रतिकर्तुं नृशंसानां रक्षसां दत्तमन्तरम् ।।
data.es: You have definitely done a great mistake by leaving Sita alone in the forest. This has given a chance to the cruel demons to wreak revenge.
data.anv: सीताम् Sita, वने in the forest, उत्सृजता leaving alone, सर्वथा by all means, कष्टम् difficult, कृतम् done, प्रतिकर्तुम् to take revenge, नृशंसानाम् of the cruel, रक्षसाम् of demons, अन्तरम् chance, दत्तम् is given.
data.md: You have every way acted unwisely in having left Şītā alone in the wood. By this you have afforded opportunity to the cruel Rākşasas to repair the mischief (I have done them).

data.v: दुःखिताः खरघातेन राक्षसाः पिशिताशनाः । तैः सीता निहता घोरैर्भविष्यति न संशयः ।।
data.es: The dreadful, carnivorous demons aggrieved over my murder of Khara must have undoubtedly killed Sita.
data.anv: पिशिताशनाः flesheaters, राक्षसाः demons, खरघातेन by the death of Khara, दुःखिताः are aggrieved, घोरैः dreadful, तैः by them, सीता Sita, निहता killed, भविष्यति may be, संशयः doubt, न no.
data.md: The Rākşasas subsisting flesh are aggrieved because of Khara having been slain; and now, without doubt, those terrible ones have slain Sita.

data.v: अहोऽस्मि व्यसने मग्नः सर्वथा रिपुनाशन । किं त्विदानीं करिष्यामि शङ्के प्राप्तव्यमीदृशम् ।।
data.es: O destroyer of enemies I am completely drowned in sorrow. What can I do at this moment. Alas, I am destined to suffer.
data.anv: शत्रुसूदन O destroyer of enemies, सर्वथा in all respects, अस्मिन् in this, व्यसने in sorrow, मग्नः I am drowned, इदानीम् at this time, किं नु करिष्यामि what can I do?, ईदृशम् such, प्राप्तव्यम् destined, शङ्के I fear, अहो alas
data.md: Alas! absolutely sunk am I in peril, O destroyer of foes. What shall I do now? I fear such an event was appointed for me.

data.v: इति सीतां वरारोहां चिन्तयन्नेव राघवः । आजगाम जनस्थानं त्वरया सहलक्ष्मणः ।।
data.es: While thus brooding over the beautiful Sita, the scion of the Raghus along with Lakshmana hurried towards Janasthana.
data.anv: राघवः Raghava, इति thus, वरारोहाम् beautiful, सीताम् Sita, चिन्तयन्नेव while brooding over only, सह लक्ष्मणः along with Lakshmana, त्वरया quickly, जनस्थानम्  Janasthanam, आजगाम he went.
data.md: Thus thinking of Sītā, paragon among women, Rāghava hastily went to Janasthāna in company with Laksmana. on

data.v: विगर्हमाणोऽनुजमार्तरूपं; क्षुधा श्रमाच्चैव पिपासया च । विनिःश्वसञ्शुष्कमुखो विषण्णः; प्रतिश्रयं प्राप्य समीक्ष्य शून्यम् ।।
data.es: Thus blaming his dejected brother, the valiant Rama entered the hermitage, sighing deeply, his face pale and his throat dried up with hunger, exhaustion and thirst. Reaching his dwellingplace, he found it empty. He thoroughly searched the hermitage and the places where she used to move about on the premises. And 'so it has happened', he sadly said to himself, his hair raised on end.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये अरण्यकाण्डे अष्टपञ्चाशस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the fiftyeighth sarga of Aranyakanda of the holy Ramayana the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: वीरः hero, आर्तरूपम् dejected, अनुजम् brother, विगर्हमाणः  blaming him, क्षुधा hunger, श्रमाच्चैव due to exhaustion, पिपासया and thirsty, विनिःश्वसन् sighing deeply, शुष्कमुखः face dried up, विवर्णः turned pale, प्रतिश्रयम् restingplace, प्राप्य reaching, शून्यम् empty, समीक्ष्य seeing, स्वम् his, आश्रमम् hermitage, सम्प्रविगाह्य searching thoroughly, कांश्चित् some of the places, विहारदेशान् places where she was moving about, अनुसृत्य after following her, निवासभूमौ in the dwelling place, एतत् all that, तदेव इति this itself, प्रहृष्टरोमा with horripilation, व्यथितः pained, बभूव became.
data.md: Taking to task his younger brother of distressed visage, Rāma, afflicted with hunger and thirst, and dejected in spirits, sighing heavily with a countenance turned pale, entered the asylum and found it vacant.

data.v: स्वमाश्रमं संप्रविगाह्य वीरो; विहारदेशाननुसृत्य कांश्चित् । एतत्तदित्येव निवासभूमौ; प्रहृष्टरोमा व्यथितो बभूव ।।
data.md: And entering his own asylum that hero went to the play-grounds (of Sītā) and remembering the sporting ground (of Sītā) in that abode, he was filled with grief and his down stood on end.

data.v: अथाश्रमादुपावृत्तमन्तरा रघुनन्दनः । परिपप्रच्छ सौमित्रिं रामो दुःखार्दितः पुनः ।।
data.es: Rama, the delight of the Raghus, once again questioned Lakshmana who had come out of the hermitage, deeply hurt:
data.anv: अथ and then, रघुनन्दनः delight of the Raghus, रामः Rama, दुःखार्दितम् afflicted, आश्रमात् from the hermitage, उपावृत्तम् returned, सौमित्रिम् Lakshmana, अन्तरा in the midst, पुनः again, परिपप्रच्छ questioned.
data.md: Then coming out of the hermitage, Raghu's descendant, Rāma, after a while, from grief, spoke these words to the son of Sumitrā,

data.v: तमुवाच किमर्थं त्वमागतोऽपास्य मैथिलीम् । यदा सा तव विश्वासाद्वने विहरिता मया ।।
data.es: Why did you come, leaving the princess from Mithila alone in the forest when I had left her under your trust ?
data.anv: तम् him, उवाच had said, तव your, विश्वासात् with the confidence, मया myself, सा she, वने  in the forest, यदा as such, विरहिता left, मैथिलीम् Maithili, किमर्थम् for what reason, उपास्य having left her, त्वम् you, आगतः came.
data.md: When confiding myself in you, I had left Maithilī with you in the wood, why then did you go out, leaving her behind?

data.v: दृष्ट्वैवाभ्यागतं त्वां मे मैथिलीं त्यज्य लक्ष्मण । शङ्कमानं महत्पापं यत्सत्यं व्यथितं मनः ।।
data.es: When I saw you, O Lakshmana, coming without Sita, my mind was oppressed with evil thought which have come true.
data.anv: लक्ष्मण Lakshmana, मैथिलीम् Maithili, त्यज्य left, अभ्यागतम् your coming, त्वाम् your, दृष्ट्वैव on seeing, मनः in my mind, महत् great, पापम् evil, शङ्कमानम् doubted, व्यथितम् (इति) यत् I was pained, सत्यम् it was true.
data.md: O Laksmana, directly I saw you approach, renouncing Maithilī, my mind, apprehending great wrong, became really aggrieved.

data.v: स्फुरते नयनं सव्यं बाहुश्च हृदयं च मे । दृष्ट्वा लक्ष्मण दूरे त्वां सीताविरहितं पथि ।।
data.es: O Lakshmana, as I saw you from a distance without Sita, my left eye, my shoulder and my heart throbbed.
data.anv: लक्ष्मण Lakshmana, सीताविरहितम् without Sita, त्वाम् you, दूरे at a distance, पथि on the way, दृष्ट्वा seeing, मे mine, सव्यम् left, नयनम् eye, बाहुश्च shoulder, स्फुरते throbbing, मे my, हृदयं च heart too.
data.md: O Lakşmaņa, seeing you coming at a distance, renouncing her, my left eye and arm as well as my heart keep throbbing.

data.v: एवमुक्तस्तु सौमित्रिर्लक्ष्मणः शुभलक्षणः । भूयो दुःखसमाविष्टो दुःखितं राममब्रवीत् ।।
data.es: Thus addressed, virtuous Lakshmana, overwhelmed with sorrow replied to the grief stricken Rama:
data.anv: एवम् in that way, उक्तः having been spoken, सौमित्रिः Lakshmana, शुभलक्षणः endowed with good  traits, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, भूयः again, दुःखसमाविष्टः drowned in greater sorrow, दुःखितम् sorrowful, रामम् to Rama, अब्रवीत् said.
data.md: Thus accosted, Laksmana having auspicious signs, afflicted with great grief, said to the aggrieved Rāma,

data.v: न स्वयं कामकारेण तां त्यक्त्वाहमिहागतः । प्रचोदितस्तयैवोग्रैस्त्वत्सकाशमिहागतः ।।
data.es: I did not leave her on my own nor have I come here of my own accord. I came to you, provoked by her angry words.
data.anv: अहम् I, ताम् her, स्वयम् on my own, त्यक्त्वा after leaving, कामकारेण by my own desire, इह here, न आगतः not come, तयैव by herself, उग्रैः with angry words, प्रचोदितः provoked, इह here, त्वत्सकाशम् to you, आगतः I came.
data.md: I have not come hither, of my own accord, renouncing Sītā; but I have come to you, having been urged thereto by herself with rudeness.

data.v: आर्येणेव परिक्रुष्टं हा सीते लक्ष्मणेति च । परित्राहीति यद्वाक्यं मैथिल्यास्तच्छ्रुतिं गतम् ।।
data.es: Uttered loudly, 'Alas Sita, Alas, Lakshmana, save me', as if these were the words of your noble self, reached Sita's ears.
data.anv: हा सीते Alas, Sita, हा लक्ष्मण Alas, Lakshmana, इति च these words, परित्राहि इति save  me, यत् such, आर्येणेव as if your noble self, पराक्रुष्टम् loudly, तत् then, मैथिल्याः Maithili's, श्रुतिम् to her ears, गतम् reached.
data.md: The cries of O Laksimana, save me, as if uttered by the master, came to the ears of Maithili.

data.v: सा तमार्तस्वरं श्रुत्वा तव स्नेहेन मैथिली । गच्छ गच्छेति मामाह रुदन्ती भयविह्वला ।।
data.es: The princess from Mithila heard this cry of pain and, wild with fear, urged me out of her love for you to go.
data.anv: सा मैथिली that Maithili, तम् that, आर्तस्वरम् cry of pain, श्रुत्वा hearing, रुदन्ती crying, तव स्नेहेन  because of her love for you, भयविह्वला wild with fear, गच्छ गच्छ इति go, go, माम् to me said, आह pleaded.
data.md: Hearing those distressful accents, Maithili from affection [for you], breaking out into lamentations, and overwhelmed with fear, spoke to me, Off, off.

data.v: प्रचोद्यमानेन मया गच्छेति बहुशस्तया । प्रत्युक्ता मैथिली वाक्यमिदं त्वत्प्रत्ययान्वितम् ।।
data.es: When I was repeated asked to go, I said this in order to instil confidence in the princess from Mithila :
data.anv: गच्छ इति saying go, तया Sita, बहुशः many ways, प्रचोद्यमानेन while being provoked, मया by me, मैथिली Maithili, त्वत्प्रत्ययान्वितम्  cofidence in her, इदम् these, वाक्यम् words, प्रत्युक्ता replied.
data.md: On being repeatedly urged, with Go, answered Maithili in these words, tending to inspire her confidence.

data.v: न तत्पश्याम्यहं रक्षो यदस्य भयमावहेत् । निर्वृता भव नास्त्येतत्केनाप्येवमुदाहृतम् ।।
data.es: 'No one can cause fear in Rama. I do not see any demon who can hold a threat to him. Give up fear. Some one might have said it.
data.anv: अस्य his, यत् Rama, भयम् fear, आवहेत् who can cause, तत् such, रक्षः demon, अहम् I, न पश्यामि I do not see, निर्वृता give up fear, भव your, एतत् this, नास्ति does not exist, केनापि by some one, एवम् in that way, उदाहृतम् is uttered.
data.md: I do not see such a Rākṣasa, as can excite his fear. Do you desist. These cries do not come from him; but must have been uttered by someone else.

data.v: विगर्हितं च नीचं च कथमार्योऽभिधास्यति । त्राहीति वचनं सीते यस्त्रायेत्त्रिदशानपि ।।
data.es: 'How can Rama who is capable of saving even gods speak such unworthy, demeaning words, 'Save me, O Sita'
data.anv: सीते O Sita, यः he, त्रिदशानपि even gods, त्रायेत् he may save, आर्यः capable one, विगर्हितम् demeaning, नीचं च lowly, त्राहि इति saying 'save me', वचनम् words, कथम् how, अभिधास्यति will speak out?
data.md: How can he that can rescue the celestials themselves, utter, O Sītā, such a blame-worthy and base word as-save me?

data.v: किंनिमित्तं तु केनापि भ्रातुरालम्ब्य मे स्वरम् । विस्वरं व्याहृतं वाक्यं लक्ष्मण त्राहि मामिति । न भवत्या व्यथा कार्या कुनारीजनसेविता ।।
data.es: O fair lady, for some reason some demon has uttered these words 'Save me, save me' adapting my brother's voice.
data.anv: शोभने O fair lady, किं निमित्तं तु for some reason, केनापि राक्षसेन by some demon, मे भ्रातुः my brother's, स्वरम् voice, आलम्ब्य adapting, त्राहि त्राहि इति 'save me, save me', वाक्यम् these words, ईरितम् is said.
data.md: Some one for some purpose, assuming my brother's voice, is crying-O Laksmana, save me.

data.v: अलं वैक्लव्यमालम्ब्य स्वस्था भव निरुत्सुका । न चास्ति त्रिषु लोकेषु पुमान्यो राघवं रणे । जातो वा जायमानो वा संयुगे यः पराजयेत् ।।
data.es: 'You should not feel agitated or dispirited. Be composed. There is no one either born or going to be born in the three worlds who can defeat Rama in war. He cannot be conquered in a battle even by gods led by indra.'
data.anv: वैक्लब्यम् bewilderment, आलम्ब्य resorting to, अलम् no need, निरुत्सुका frustrated, स्वस्था भव you should be calm, यः whoever, संयुगेरणे in an encounter, राघवम् Rama, पराजयेत् defeat, सः he, पुमान् a man, त्रिषु लोकेषु in the three worlds, जातो वा is born in the past, जायमानो वा or going to be born, नास्ति is not there, राघवः Rama, शक्रपुरोगमैः by those led by Indra, देवैः by gods, युद्धे in war, न जय्यः cannot be conquered.
data.md: Do not be over-whelmed; and banish your anxiety. There breathes no person, nor yet shall there be born any one in these three worlds who in the field shall vanquish Rāghava in fight. Rāghava is incapable of being beaten in battle by the very gods headed by Indra.'

data.v: एवमुक्ता तु वैदेही परिमोहितचेतना । उवाचाश्रूणि मुञ्चन्ती दारुणं मामिदं वचः ।।
data.es: Deluded by her senses, Vaidehi said these words, shedding tears when I tried to console her:
data.anv: एवम् in that way, उक्ता  consoled, वैदेही Vaidehi, परिमोहितचेतना of deluded intellect, अश्रूणि tears, मुञ्चन्ती shedding, माम् me, दारुणं harsh, इदं वचः these words, उवाच said.
data.md: Thus addressed (by me) Vaidehi, deprived of her sense, shedding tears, spoke to me these cruel words,

data.v: भावो मयि तवात्यर्थं पाप एव निवेशितः । विनष्टे भ्रातरि प्राप्ते न च त्वं मामवाप्स्यसि ।।
data.es: 'You have an extremely sinful intention of getting me when your brother is dead. But you will not be able to gain me.
data.anv: भ्रातरि brother, विनष्टे is deceased, प्राप्तुम् to get, मयि me, अत्यर्थम् extremely, पापः भाव एव sinful thought only, तव you, निवेशितः is set, त्वम् you, माम् me, न च अवाप्स्यसि will not be able to gain.
data.md: You cherish the vile idea that on your brother perishing, you shall come by me; but me you shall never have.

data.v: संकेताद्भरतेन त्वं रामं समनुगच्छसि । क्रोशन्तं हि यथात्यर्थं नैनमभ्यवपद्यसे ।।
data.es: 'Since you are not reaching out to Rama who is helplessly crying for his rescue, you must have followed Rama, instructed by Bharata (to do him harm)'৷৷
data.anv: अत्यर्थम् intensely, क्रोशन्तम्  shouting for help, यथा as, एवम् in this, नाभ्यवपद्यसे  are not going, त्वम् you, भरतेन by Bharata, सङ्केतात् instruction, रामम् Rama,समनुगच्छसि followed.
data.md: As you do not go to him albeit he is crying loudly (for help), you follow Rāma in consonance with a hint from Bharata.

data.v: रिपुः प्रच्छन्नचारी त्वं मदर्थमनुगच्छसि । राघवस्यान्तरप्रेप्सुस्तथैनं नाभिपद्यसे ।।
data.es: 'You are an enemy moving in disguise with an interest in me. You are waiting for an opportunity to set aside Rama. That is why you are not rushing to him.'
data.anv: प्रच्छन्नचारी in disguise, रिपुः enemy, त्वम् you, राघवस्य Rama's, अन्तरप्रेप्सुः waiting for an opportunity, मदर्थम् for my sake, अनुगच्छसि are following, तथा like this, एनम् him, नाभिपद्यसे not going now.
data.md: A foe going about in disguise, you follow Rāma for my sake, prying into Rāghava's draw backs; and it is for this that you do not go (to him)?

data.v: एवमुक्तो हि वैदेह्या संरब्धो रक्तलोचनः । क्रोधात्प्रस्फुरमाणौष्ठ आश्रमादभिनिर्गतः ।।
data.es: At these words from the princess of Videha, I came out of the hermitage in an agitated mood with my eyes turned red and lips quivering in anger.
data.anv: वैदेह्या by Vaidehi, एवम् in that way, उक्तः having spoken, संरब्धः an agitated person, क्रोधात् in anger, रक्तलोचनः with reddened eye, स्फुरमाणोष्ठः quivering lips, आश्रमात् from the hermitage, अभिनिर्गतः came out.
data.md: Thus accosted by Vaidehi, I, with eyes reddened in wrath, and my nether lip swollen in ire, rushed out of the asylum.

data.v: एवं ब्रुवाणं सौमित्रिं रामः संतापमोहितः । अब्रवीद्दुष्कृतं सौम्य तां विना यत्त्वमागतः ।।
data.es: To Lakshmana thus reporting, Rama, overcome with grief, said,(Even then) O noble brother your coming here, leaving her behind, is a wrong step taken.
data.anv: एवम् in that way, ब्रुवाणम् as he was telling, सौमित्रिम् Lakshmana, सन्तापमोहितः overtaken by grief, रामः Rama, अब्रवीत् said, सौम्य noble, यत् since, त्वम् you, तां विना without her, आगतः came, दुष्कृतम् a wrong act, कृतम् is done.
data.md: When Saumitri had spoken thus, Rāma transported by grief; said to Laksmana, O gentle one, you have done wrong in having come out hither without her.

data.v: जानन्नपि समर्थं मां रक्षसां विनिवारणे । अनेन क्रोधवाक्येन मैथिल्या निःसृतो भवान् ।।
data.es: You have come out of the hermitage provoked by Maithili's angry words, even though you are aware that I am capable of warding off the demons.
data.anv: माम् me, रक्षसाम् of demons, विनिवारणे in warding off, समर्थम् capable, जानन्नपि even knowing , भवान् yourself, मैथिल्याः Maithili's, अनेन by this, क्रोधवाक्येन angry words, निस्सृतः came out.
data.md: Although you knew (full well) that I was able to withstand the Rākşasas, yet did you sally out at the angry words of Mithila's daughter.

data.v: न हि ते परितुष्यामि त्यक्त्वा यद्यासि मैथिलीम् । क्रुद्धायाः परुषं श्रुत्वा स्त्रिया यत्त्वमिहागतः ।।
data.es: I am not happy with you as you have come here deserting Sita on the plea that she was angry and spoke harsh words.
data.anv: मैथिलीम् Maithili, त्यक्त्वा left, यद्यासि that you came, ते with you, न परितुष्यामि not pleased, त्वम् you, क्रुद्धायाः angry, परुषम् harsh, श्रुत्वा  listening, ताम् her, विहाय  deserting, इह here, आगतः came.
data.md: I am not pleased with you that hearing her harsh speech spoken in wrath, you have come hither, leaving Vaidehi behind.

data.v: सर्वथा त्वपनीतं ते सीतया यत्प्रचोदितः । क्रोधस्य वशमागम्य नाकरोः शासनं मम ।।
data.es: Provoked by the words of Sita spoken in anger you came without respecting my orders. It is definitely an act of disobedience.
data.anv: सीतया by Sita, प्रचोदितः you are urged, क्रोधस्य by anger's, वशम् grip, आपन्नः came, मम my, शासनम् orders, नाकरोः (इति) यत् not respected, सर्वथा by all means, ते your, अविनीतम् act of disobedience.
data.md: You have every way done wrong in not acting out my mandate in consequence of being urged by Sītā, and under the influence of indignation.

data.v: असौ हि राक्षसः शेते शरेणाभिहतो मया । मृगरूपेण येनाहमाश्रमादपवादितः ।।
data.es: This demon who misled me in the guise of a deer and took me away from the hermitage, lies dead, killed by my arrow.
data.anv: मृगरूपेण in the guise of a deer, येन by whom, अहम् I, आश्रमात् from the hermitage, अपवाहितः was taken away, असौ राक्षसः this demon, मया by me, शरेण with an arrow, अभिहतः he is killed, शेते lies.
data.md: That Rākṣasa lie low, being wounded by my shafts—that had drawn me away from the asylum wearing the form of a deer.

data.v: विकृष्य चापं परिधाय सायकं; सलील बाणेन च ताडितो मया । मार्गीं तनुं त्यज्य च विक्लवस्वरो; बभूव केयूरधरः स राक्षसः ।।
data.es: Bending the bow I fixed the arrow and released it at ease. Hit by that arrow he gave up his guise of the deer and assuming the form of a demon with a bracelet on his arm fell down groaning.
data.anv: मया by me, चापम् bow, विकृष्य bending, सायकम् an arrow, परिधाय after fixing, सलीलबाणेन arrow released with ease, ताडितः beaten , सः he, मार्गीम्  a deer, तनुम् body, त्यज्य having, सविक्लबस्वर: painful voice, केयूरधरः with a bracelet, राक्षसः demon, बभूव lay down.
data.md: I hit him stretching my brow slightly and fixing the shaft on it; when, renouncing his deerform he became a Rākṣasa wearing a bracelet and began to emit distressful shrieks.

data.v: शराहतेनैव तदार्तया गिरा; स्वरं ममालम्ब्य सुदूरसंश्रवम् । उदाहृतं तद्वचनं सुदारुणं; त्वमागतो येन विहाय मैथिलीम् ।।
data.es: Hit by the arrow, the demon imitating my voice cried out in desperation which could be clearly audible even from a distance. On hearing the dreadful words you deserted Sita and came here.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये अरण्यकाण्डे एकोनषष्टितमस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the fiftyninth sarga of Aranyakanda of the holy Ramayana the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: तदा then, शराहतेनैव as soon as he was hit by the arrow, आर्तया in distress, गिरा with a voice, सुदूरसुश्रवम्  even heard from a distance, स्वरम् voice, समालम्ब्य adapting, सुदारुणम् very dreadful, तत् that, वचनम् words, उदाहृतम्  uttered, येन by which, त्वम् you, मैथिलीम् Maithili, विहाय after deserting, इह here, आगतः came.
data.md: Wounded by my shaft, he, assuming my voice, and in accents capable of being heard from far, uttered those dreadful words fraught with dole, hearing which, you have come hither, renouncing Mithilā's daughter.

data.v: भृशमाव्रजमानस्य तस्याधोवामलोचनम् । प्रास्फुरच्चास्खलद्रामो वेपथुश्चास्य जायते ।।
data.es: As Rama was returning( to the hermitage), his left eye throbbed repeatedly and he stumbled and his body trembled.
data.anv: आव्रजमानस्य Rama was moving about, तस्य his, वामलोचनम् left eye, अधः underneath, भृशम् excessively, प्रास्फुरत् throbbed, रामः Rama, प्रास्खलच्च stumbled, अस्य his, वेपथुश्च shivering, जायत was produced.
data.md: As Rāma went on, his feet failed him, his left eye to beat, and a trembling came over his frame.

data.v: उपालक्ष्य निमित्तानि सोऽशुभानि मुहुर्मुहुः । अपि क्षेमं तु सीताया इति वै व्याजहार ह ।।
data.es: As inauspicious omens appeared again and again, doubting if all is well with Sita, he said to himself, Can Sita be safe?
data.anv: सः he, अशुभानि inauspicious, निमित्तानि omens, उपालक्ष्य  having marked, सीतायाः of Sita, क्षेमम् अपि नु doubting the welfare, मुहुर्मुहुः again and again, व्याजहार च said also.
data.md: Seeing again and again all these signs, he continually kept on asking (Lakşmaņa), Is it well with Sita?

data.v: त्वरमाणो जगामाथ सीतादर्शनलालसः । शून्यमावसथं दृष्ट्वा बभूवोद्विग्नमानसः ।।
data.es: Anxious to see Sita, he hastened to the hermitage and finding it empty, became restless.
data.anv: अथ then, त्वरमाणः hastening , सीता दर्शनलालसः eager to see, जगाम went, शून्यम् empty, आवसथम् hermitage, दृष्ट्वा saw, उद्विग्नमानसः with an anxious mind, बभूव became.
data.md: Eager to behold Sītā, he proceeded fast; but finding the abode empty, he was filled with anxiety.

data.v: उद्भ्रमन्निव वेगेन विक्षिपन्रघुनन्दनः । तत्र तत्रोटजस्थानमभिवीक्ष्य समन्ततः ।।
data.es: Rama, the delight of the Raghu dynasty, hurtled in, turning round, throwing his hands to and fro, casting his looks all around the cottage where she used to move. The cottage, devoid of Sita looked like a lotuspond, the beauty of its lotuses destroyed by winter.
data.anv: रघुनन्दनः delight of the Raghu race, वेगेन quickly, उद्भ्रमन्निव turning round and round, विक्षिपन्  throwing his hands, तत्र तत्र  here and there, उटजस्थानम् place of hermitage, समन्ततः all round, अभिवीक्ष्य scaninng, तदा then, सीतया by Sita, रहिताम् devoid of, हेमन्ते in winter season, ध्वस्ताम् destroyed, पद्मिनीमिव like the lotus pond, श्रिया with beauty, विरहिताम् without, पर्णशालाम् cottage, ददर्श saw.
data.md: And proceeding with swiftness, throwing about his limbs, Raghu's son began to survey all around the hut. He then found it empty of Sītā, like to a tank in evil plight and bereft of lotuses-during the winter.

data.v: ददर्श पर्णशालां च रहितां सीतया तदा । श्रिया विरहितां ध्वस्तां हेमन्ते पद्मिनीमिव ।।
data.es: Rama, the delight of the Raghu dynasty, hurtled in, turning round, throwing his hands to and fro, casting his looks all around the cottage where she used to move. The cottage, devoid of Sita looked like a lotuspond, the beauty of its lotuses destroyed by winter.
data.anv: रघुनन्दनः delight of the Raghu race, वेगेन quickly, उद्भ्रमन्निव turning round and round, विक्षिपन्  throwing his hands, तत्र तत्र  here and there, उटजस्थानम् place of hermitage, समन्ततः all round, अभिवीक्ष्य scaninng, तदा then, सीतया by Sita, रहिताम् devoid of, हेमन्ते in winter season, ध्वस्ताम् destroyed, पद्मिनीमिव like the lotus pond, श्रिया with beauty, विरहिताम् without, पर्णशालाम् cottage, ददर्श saw.
data.md: And proceeding with swiftness, throwing about his limbs, Raghu's son began to survey all around the hut. He then found it empty of Sītā, like to a tank in evil plight and bereft of lotuses-during the winter.

data.v: रुदन्तमिव वृक्षैश्च म्लानपुष्पमृगद्विजम् । श्रिया विहीनं विध्वस्तं संत्यक्तवनदैवतम् ।।
data.es: The trees with flowers withered, the animals and birds turned pale looked as if they were weeping. Bereft of their beauty they wore a ruinous look. The sylvan deities had left. The deerskin and kusa grass were strewn here and there, the grass cushions and straw mats lay scattered. Seeing his cottage so desolate Rama wept again and again.
data.anv: वृक्षैः by the trees, रुदन्तमिव as if crying, म्लानपुष्पमृगद्विजम्  flowers withered and animals and birds turned pale, श्रिया the beauty, विहीनम् devoid of, विध्वस्तम् destroyed, संत्यक्तवनदेवतम् sylvan deities left, विप्रकीर्णाजिनकुशम् with deerskin and kusa grass scattered, विप्रविद्धब्रुसीकटम् with grass cushions and straw mat thrown pellmell, शून्यम् desolate, निजस्थानम् own place, दृष्ट्वा seeing, पुनः पुनः again and again, विललाप wept.
data.md: And seeing the cottage empty, with its trees as if sorrowing, and its flowers faded, and its beasts and birds sunk in gloom, shorn of grace, worn out, forsaken by the sylvan deities, strewn with deer-skins and Kusa, and twists of Kasa, he wept again and again.

data.v: विप्रकीर्णाजिनकुशं विप्रविद्धबृसीकटम् । दृष्ट्वा शून्योटजस्थानं विललाप पुनः पुनः ।।
data.es: The trees with flowers withered, the animals and birds turned pale looked as if they were weeping. Bereft of their beauty they wore a ruinous look. The sylvan deities had left. The deerskin and kusa grass were strewn here and there, the grass cushions and straw mats lay scattered. Seeing his cottage so desolate Rama wept again and again.
data.anv: वृक्षैः by the trees, रुदन्तमिव as if crying, म्लानपुष्पमृगद्विजम्  flowers withered and animals and birds turned pale, श्रिया the beauty, विहीनम् devoid of, विध्वस्तम् destroyed, संत्यक्तवनदेवतम् sylvan deities left, विप्रकीर्णाजिनकुशम् with deerskin and kusa grass scattered, विप्रविद्धब्रुसीकटम् with grass cushions and straw mat thrown pellmell, शून्यम् desolate, निजस्थानम् own place, दृष्ट्वा seeing, पुनः पुनः again and again, विललाप wept.
data.md: And seeing the cottage empty, with its trees as if sorrowing, and its flowers faded, and its beasts and birds sunk in gloom, shorn of grace, worn out, forsaken by the sylvan deities, strewn with deer-skins and Kusa, and twists of Kasa, he wept again and again.

data.v: हृता मृता वा नष्टा वा भक्षिता वा भविष्यति । निलीनाप्यथ वा भीरुरथ वा वनमाश्रिता ।।
data.es: 'Timid Sita might have been abducted or dead or crushed or eaten up by demons. Or, she may be hiding for protection in the forest'
data.anv: भिरुः timid, हृता abducted, मृता वा or dead, नष्टा वा or ruined, भक्षिता वा or eaten up, भविष्यति may be, अथवा or else, निलीना hiding, अथवा or else, वनम् forest, आश्रिता taken shelter,
data.md: Has the timid one been carried off, or is she dead, or has any one eaten her up, or has she vanished (from the earth), or has she gone to the wood, or has she gone to cull flowers and fruits, or has she gone to the pool for procuring water, or has she repaired to the river?

data.v: गता विचेतुं पुष्पाणि फलान्यपि च वा पुनः । अथ वा पद्मिनीं याता जलार्थं वा नदीं गता ।।
data.es: 'Maybe she has gone to pluck flowers or fruits. Or to the lotuspond or river to fetch water.'
data.anv: अपिवा or else, पुष्पाणि flowers, फलानि च and fruits, विचेतुम् to pluck, गता gone, अथवा or may be, पद्मिनीम् to a lotus pond, याता to get, जलार्थम्  to get water, नदीम् river, गता gone.
data.md: Has the timid one been carried off, or is she dead, or has any one eaten her up, or has she vanished (from the earth), or has she gone to the wood, or has she gone to cull flowers and fruits, or has she gone to the pool for procuring water, or has she repaired to the river?

data.v: यत्नान्मृगयमाणस्तु नाससाद वने प्रियाम् । शोकरक्तेक्षणः शोकादुन्मत्त इव लक्ष्यते ।।
data.es: He ransacked the forest, yet did not find his beloved. He appeared like a mad man, his eyes turned red with tears of sorrow.
data.anv: यत्नात् by effort, मृगयमाणः तु while searching, वने in the forest, प्रियाम् darling, नाससाद could not see, शोकरक्तेक्षणः eyes turned red with tears, शोकात् owing to grief, उन्मत्त इव like a mad person, लक्ष्यते he appeared.
data.md: Although he searched his beloved one carefully, yet he failed to find her out in the wood-land. And that graceful one with his eyes reddened with grief, seemed like a maniac

data.v: वृक्षाद्वृक्षं प्रधावन्स गिरींश्चापि नदीन्नदीम् । बभूव विलपन्रामः शोकपङ्कार्णवप्लुतः ।।
data.es: Running from tree to tree, hill to hill, and river to river and weeping, Rama was immersed in a sea of sorrow.
data.anv: रामः Rama, वृक्षात् from tree, वृक्षम् to another tree, गिरेः mountain, अद्रिम् to another mountain, नदात् from one river, नदीम् to another river, प्रधावन् while running, विलपन्  while weeping, शोकार्णवपरिप्लुतः immersed in a sea of sorrow, बभूव remained.
data.md: He rushed from tree to tree, and bewailing being sunk in an ocean of grief traversed all the rivers and mountains.

data.v: अस्ति कच्चित्त्वया दृष्टा सा कदम्बप्रिया प्रिया । कदम्ब यदि जानीषे शंस सीतां शुभाननाम् ।।
data.es: O Kadamba tree, tell me if you have seen my beloved with a fair face and with love for kadamba flowers.
data.anv: कदम्ब O Kadamba, कदम्बप्रिया O lover of kadamba flowers, प्रिया my beloved, सा she, काचित् some lady, त्वया by you, अपि दृष्टा is seen, जानीषे यदि if you know, शुभाननाम्  fair face, सीताम् Sita, शंस tell.

data.v: स्निग्धपल्लवसंकाशां पीतकौशेयवासिनीम् । शंसस्व यदि वा दृष्टा बिल्व बिल्वोपमस्तनी ।।
data.es: O Bilva tree, tell me if you have seen a lady delicate like your tender leaf, dressed in yellow silk, a lady whose breasts are round like Bilva fruits.
data.anv: बिल्व O Bilva, स्निग्धपल्लवसङ्काशा lovely like tender leaf, पीतकौशेयवासिनी dressed in yellow silk, बिल्वोपमस्तनी lady whose breasts are round (like Bilva fruit), यदि वा दृष्टा if you have seen her, शंसस्व let me know.

data.v: अथ वार्जुन शंस त्वं प्रियां तामर्जुनप्रियाम् । जनकस्य सुता भीरुर्यदि जीवति वा न वा ।।
data.es: O Arjuna tree, tell me if you know a timid lady, daughter of Janaka and my beloved, fond of Arjuna tree. Is the living or not ?
data.anv: अथवा or else, अर्जुन O Arjuna tree, त्वम् you, अर्जुनप्रियाम् lover of Arjuna tree, तां प्रियाम् that beloved of mine, शंस tell me if you know, भीरुः a timid lady, जनकस्य सुता daughter of Janaka, यदि जीवति वा is she living, न वा or not.

data.v: ककुभः ककुभोरुं तां व्यक्तं जानाति मैथिलीम् । लतापल्लवपुष्पाढ्यो भाति ह्येष वनस्पतिः ।।
data.es: This Kakubha tree rich with tender leaves and flowers (perhaps)knows Maithili whose thighs are beautiful like the trunk of the Kakubha tree.
data.anv: वनस्पतिः the tree, पल्लवपुष्पाढ्यः rich with tender leaves and flowers, यथा as, भाति appears, ककुभः kakubha, ककुभोरूम् lady with beautiful thighs, ताम् her, मैथिलीम् Maithili's, व्यक्तम् clearly, जानाति the tree knows.

data.v: भ्रमरैरुपगीतश्च यथा द्रुमवरो ह्ययम् । एष व्यक्तं विजानाति तिलकस्तिलकप्रियाम् ।।
data.es: This great Tilaka tree round which bees bumble surely knows the lady who loves to put tilaka marks on the forehead.
data.anv: द्रुमवरः best of trees, अयम् this, तिलकः Tilaka, यथा as, भ्रमरैः with bees, उपगीतः is sung, एषः he that, तिलकप्रियाम् a lover of mark on the forehead, व्यक्तम् it is sure, विजानाति knows?

data.v: अशोकशोकापनुद शोकोपहतचेतसं । त्वन्नामानं कुरु क्षिप्रं प्रियासंदर्शनेन माम् ।।
data.es: O Ashoka tree, dispeller of sorrow, by quickly showing me my darling make me ashoka (free from sorrow) as I am griefstricken at heart.
data.anv: शोकापनुद O dispeller of sorrow, अशोक O Ashoka tree, प्रियासन्दर्शनेन by showing me my darling, शोकोपहतचेतसम् with a griefstricken heart , माम् to me, क्षिप्रम् quickly, त्वन्नामानम् let me be called by your name, कुरु do it.

data.v: यदि ताल त्वया दृष्टा पक्वतालफलस्तनी । कथयस्व वरारोहां कारुष्यं यदि ते मयि ।।
data.es: O Palmyra tree be kind to me and tell me if you have seen my beautiful beloved who has breasts like ripe palmyra fruit?
data.anv: ताल Palmyra tree, पक्वतालफलस्तनी one who has breasts like ripened palmyra fruit, त्वया by you, दृष्टा यदि if seen, ते you, मयि my, कारुण्यं यदि kind to me, वरारोहाम् Sita, कथयस्व tell me.

data.v: यदि दृष्टा त्वया सीता जम्बुजाम्बूनदप्रभा । प्रियां यदि विजानीषे निःशङ्कं कथयस्व मे ।।
data.es: O Jambu tree, do not hesitate to tell me if you know Sita whose body shines lovely like gold.
data.anv: जम्बु O Jambu tree, त्वया by you, सीता Sita, यदि दृष्टा if seen, जम्बूफलोपमा a lady whose body is shining lovely like gold, प्रियाम् the beloved one, (वि)जानीषे यदि know of her, मे to me, निःशङ्कम् without hesitation, कथयस्व tell me.

data.v: अथ वा मृगशावाक्षीं मृग जानासि मैथिलीम् । मृगविप्रेक्षणी कान्ता मृगीभिः सहिता भवेत् ।।
data.es: Or, O deer do you know about Maithili who has the eyes of a fawn? My beloved who has the restless eyes of a doe may be found in their company.
data.anv: अथवा or, मृग O deer, मृगशाबाक्षीम् doe like eyes, मैथिलीम् Maithili, जानासि known, मृगविप्रेक्षणी  whose eyes  look like eyes of young deer, कान्ता beloved, मृगीभिः among the female deer, सहिता with, भवेत् may be.

data.v: गज सा गजनासोरुर्यदि दृष्टा त्वया भवेत् । तां मन्ये विदितां तुभ्यमाख्याहि वरवारण ।।
data.es: O elephant tell me if you have seen her whose thighs are like the trunk of an elephant. O best of elephants, tell me if you know her.
data.anv: गज O elephant, गजनासोरूः whose thighs are like the trunk of an elephant, सा she, त्वया by you, दृष्टा is seen, यदि भवेत् if she be, ताम् her, तुभ्यम् to you, विदिताम् known, मन्ये I think, वरवारण O best of elephants, आख्याहि tell me.

data.v: शार्दूल यदि सा दृष्टा प्रिया चन्द्रनिभानना । मैथिली मम विस्रब्धः कथयस्व न ते भयम् ।।
data.es: O tiger tell me freely and fearlessly if you have seen my beloved princess from Mithila with a face like the moon.
data.anv: शार्दूल tiger, चन्द्रनिभानना lady with a Moon like face, प्रिया dear, सा मैथिली that Mythili, दृष्टा यदि if at all seen by you, विस्रब्धम् with confidence, मम to me, कथयस्व tell me, ते to you, भयम् fear, न not.

data.v: किं धावसि प्रिये नूनं दृष्टासि कमलेक्षणे । वृक्षेणाच्छाद्य चात्मानं किं मां न प्रतिभाषसे ।।
data.es: O lotus eyed darling, why are you running away? I have already seen you. Why are you hiding behind trees and not replying to me?
data.anv: कमलेक्षणे O lotuseyed, प्रिये dear, दूरे to a distance, किम् why, धावसि you are running, दृष्टा seen, असि you, आत्मानम् yourself, वृक्षैः with trees, आच्छाद्य covering, माम् me, किम् why, न प्रतिभाषसे not replying.

data.v: तिष्ठ तिष्ठ वरारोहे न तेऽस्ति करुणा मयि । नात्यर्थं हास्यशीलासि किमर्थं मामुपेक्षसे ।।
data.es: O my beautiful beloved, stay, stay Have you no compassion for me ? You are so fond of fun. Why do you avoid me?
data.anv: वरारोहे O beautiful lady, तिष्ठ तिष्ठ stay, stay, ते to you, मयि in me, करुणा compassion, नास्ति is not there, अत्यर्थम् very much, हास्यशीला lady fond of making fun, नासि you are not, माम् me, किमर्थम् why, उपेक्षसे do you avoid me.

data.v: पीतकौशेयकेनासि सूचिता वरवर्णिनि । धावन्त्यपि मया दृष्टा तिष्ठ यद्यस्ति सौहृदम् ।।
data.es: O lady of lovely complexion, I can see your yellow silk (flying), while you are running away. If you have love for me, stay on.
data.anv: वरवर्णिनि O lady of lovely complexion, पीतकौशेयकेन by your yellow silk, सूचिता  indicated, असि you are, धावन्त्यपि even while you are running away, मया by me, दृष्टा you are seen, सौहृदम् love for me, अस्ति यदि if you have, तिष्ठ stay.

data.v: नैव सा नूनमथ वा हिंसिता चारुहासिनी । कृच्छ्रं प्राप्तं हि मां नूनं यथोपेक्षितुमर्हति ।।
data.es: O lady with a sweet smile I have never hurt you. When I am in difficulty it does not behove you to ignore me.
data.anv: अथवा even so, सा she, नैव never, चारुहासिनी lady with sweet smile, हिंसिता hurt, नूनम् surely, यथा as such, कृच्छ्रप्राप्तम् when in difficulties, माम् me, उपेक्षितुम् to ignore, नार्हति should not, नूनम् surely.

data.v: व्यक्तं सा भक्षिता बाला राक्षसैः पिशिताशनैः । विभज्याङ्गानि सर्वाणि मया विरहिता प्रिया ।।
data.es: It is clear that separated from me, the body of my young beloved is torn off and eaten away by carnivorous demons.
data.anv: मया by me, विरहिता separated, प्रिया my beloved, सा बाला that young lady, व्यक्तम् it is clear, सर्वाणि all, अङ्गानि limbs, विभज्य tearing, पिशिताशनैः by flesheaters, राक्षसैः by demons  भक्षिता is eaten away.

data.v: नूनं तच्छुभदन्तौष्ठं मुखं निष्प्रभतां गतम् । सा हि चम्पकवर्णाभा ग्रीवा ग्रैवेय शोभिता ।।
कोमला विलपन्त्यास्तु कान्ताया भक्षिता शुभा । नूनं विक्षिप्यमाणौ तौ बाहू पल्लवकोमलौ ।।
भक्षितौ वेपमानाग्रौ सहस्ताभरणाङ्गदौ । मया विरहिता बाला रक्षसां भक्षणाय वै ।।
सार्थेनेव परित्यक्ता भक्षिता बहुबान्धवा । हा लक्ष्मण महाबाहो पश्यसि त्वं प्रियां क्वचित् ।।
हा प्रिये क्व गता भद्रे हा सीतेति पुनः पुनः । इत्येवं विलपन्रामः परिधावन्वनाद्वनम् ।।
क्वचिदुद्भ्रमते वेगात्क्वचिद्विभ्रमते बलात् । क्वचिन्मत्त इवाभाति कान्तान्वेषणतत्परः ।।
data.es: Rama ran from forest to forest, now jumping, now taking strong strides, but all the time weeping, a madman busy in search of his beloved.
data.anv: रामः Rama, इत्येवम् in that manner, विलपन्  weeping, वनात् from one forest, वनम् to the other forest, परिधावन्  running, क्वचित् at some place, वेगात् with speed, उद्भ्रमते jumped, क्वचित् at some place, बलात् with his strength, विभ्रमते moves fast, क्वचित्  at some place, कान्तान्वेषणतत्परः busy in search of his beloved, मत्तः इव like a madman, आभाति was seen.

data.v: स वनानि नदीः शैलान्गिरिप्रस्रवणानि च । काननानि च वेगेन भ्रमत्यपरिसंस्थितः ।।
data.es: He rushed through forests, rivers, hills and mountain streams and through dense jungles with an unstable mind.
data.anv: सः he, वनानि the forests, नदी: rivers, शैलान् hills, गिरिप्रस्रवणानि च streams of mountains, काननानि च dense forests, अपरिसंस्थितः not stable, वेगेन rushed, भ्रमति he wandered.

data.v: तथा स गत्वा विपुलं महद्वनं; परीत्य सर्वं त्वथ मैथिलीं प्रति । अनिष्ठिताशः स चकार मार्गणे; पुनः प्रियायाः परमं परिश्रमम् ।।
data.es: Rama went about the vast forest searching for the princess from Mithila all over not giving up hope of finding her. He continued to make great efforts for searching his beloved.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये अरण्यकाण्डे षष्टितमस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the sixtieth sarga of Aranyakanda of the holy Ramayana the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: सः Rama, विपुलम् vast, महत् great, वनम् forest, तथा in that way, गत्वा after going, सर्वम् all, परीत्य searching, मैथिलीं प्रति pertaining to Maithili, अनिष्ठिताशः giving up hope of finding her, सः Rama, पुनः again, प्रियायाः his beloved's, मार्गणे in search, परमम् supreme, परिश्रमम् effort, चकार made.

data.v: दृष्टाश्रमपदं शून्यं रामो दशरथात्मजः । रहितां पर्णशालां च विध्वस्तान्यासनानि च ।।
data.es: Rama, son of Dasaratha, saw the empty cottage devoid of Sita. The mats were displaced. He searched everywhere but unable to see Vaidehi lifted his lovely arms and said:
data.anv: दशरथात्मजः son of Dasaratha, रामः Rama, शून्यम् empty, आश्रमपदम् hermitage, रहिताम्  devoid of, च and, विध्वस्तानि disturbed, आसनानि च seats, दृष्ट्वा saw, तत्र thereafter, वैदेहीम् Vaidehi, अदृष्ट्वा having not seen, सर्वशः all over, सन्निरीक्ष्य च scanning, प्राक्रुश्य etched, रुचिरौ lovely, भुजौ shoulders, प्रगृह्य holding, उवाच said.

data.v: अदृष्ट्वा तत्र वैदेहीं संनिरीक्ष्य च सर्वशः । उवाच रामः प्राक्रुश्य प्रगृह्य रुचिरौ भुजौ ।।
data.es: Rama, son of Dasaratha, saw the empty cottage devoid of Sita. The mats were displaced. He searched everywhere but unable to see Vaidehi lifted his lovely arms and said:
data.anv: दशरथात्मजः son of Dasaratha, रामः Rama, शून्यम् empty, आश्रमपदम् hermitage, रहिताम्  devoid of, च and, विध्वस्तानि disturbed, आसनानि च seats, दृष्ट्वा saw, तत्र thereafter, वैदेहीम् Vaidehi, अदृष्ट्वा having not seen, सर्वशः all over, सन्निरीक्ष्य च scanning, प्राक्रुश्य etched, रुचिरौ lovely, भुजौ shoulders, प्रगृह्य holding, उवाच said.

data.v: क्व नु लक्ष्मण वैदेही कं वा देशमितो गता । केनाहृता वा सौमित्रे भक्षिता केन वा प्रिया ।।
data.es: O son of Sumitra, where is my beloved ? Where did she go? By whom was she abducted? Or, devoured? O Lakshmana
data.anv: लक्ष्मण O Lakshmana, वैदेही Vaidehi, क्व नु where is she, कं वा देशम् in which land, गता gone, सौमित्रे O son of Sumitra, केन by whom, आहृता वा is abducted, प्रिया my beloved, केन वा by whom, भक्षिता eaten.

data.v: वृष्केणावार्य यदि मां सीते हसितुमिच्छसि । अलं ते हसितेनाद्य मां भजस्व सुदुःखितम् ।।
data.es: O Sita if you intend to make fun by hiding behind a tree, I tell you it is enough. Stop it and come to this extremely sorrowful man.
data.anv: सीते O Sita, वृक्षेण by tree, आच्छाद्य hiding behind, माम् me, हसितुम् to make fun, इच्छसि यदि are you intending to, ते you, हसितेन fun, अलम् enough, अद्य now, सुदुःखितम् very muchgrieved, माम् me, भजस्व come to me.

data.v: यैः सह क्रीडसे सीते विश्वस्तैर्मृगपोतकैः । एते हीनास्त्वया सौम्ये ध्यायन्त्यस्राविलेक्षणाः ।।
data.es: O gentle Sita those fawns who trusted you and played with you, are now separated from you. Brooding over you, their eyes are brimming with tears.
data.anv: सौम्ये O gentle lady, सीते Sita, विश्वस्तैः relied on you, यैः by those, मृगपोतकैः सह with the fawn, क्रीडसे play, एते these, त्वया by you, हीनाः separated, अस्राविलेक्षणाः eyes filled with tears, ध्यायन्ति they are thinking of you.

data.v: मृतं शोकेन महता सीताहरणजेन माम् । परलोके महाराजो नूनं द्रक्ष्यति मे पिता ।।
data.es: O Lakshmana, I cannot live without Sita. I am filled with deep grief on account of Sita's abduction. My late father, the king will certainly see me in the other world (I will definitely commit suicide).
data.anv: लक्ष्मण Lakshmana, सीतया by Sita, रहितः without, अहम् I, न हि जीवामि I cannot live, सीताहरणजेन arising out of Sita's abduction, महता by deep, शोकेन by grief, मृतं dead, माम् me, महाराजः the king (Dasaratha), मे पिता my father, नूनम् certainly, परलोके in the other world, द्रक्ष्यति will meet me.

data.v: कथं प्रतिज्ञां संश्रुत्य मया त्वमभियोजितः । अपूरयित्वा तं कालं मत्सकाशमिहागतः ।।
data.es: My father say will surely in the other world: Without completing the appointed period of the vow taken, how could you come here ? Fie upon you You are irresponsible. You are ignoble. You are a liar.
data.anv: माम् me, मया by me, अभियोजितः employed by me, त्वम् you, प्रतिज्ञाम् a vow, संश्रुत्य having promised, तं कालम् that full term, अपूरयित्वा without completing, मत्सकाशम् into my presence, कथम् how, इह here, आगतः came, कामवृत्तम् an irresponsible person, अनार्यम् ignoble, मृषावादिनमेव च liar, त्वाम् you, धिक् fie upon, इति thus, परे लोके in the other world, मे पिता my father, व्यक्तम् surely, वक्ष्यति will tell me.

data.v: कामवृत्तमनार्यं मां मृषावादिनमेव च । धिक्त्वामिति परे लोके व्यक्तं वक्ष्यति मे पिता ।।
data.es: My father say will surely in the other world: Without completing the appointed period of the vow taken, how could you come here ? Fie upon you You are irresponsible. You are ignoble. You are a liar.
data.anv: माम् me, मया by me, अभियोजितः employed by me, त्वम् you, प्रतिज्ञाम् a vow, संश्रुत्य having promised, तं कालम् that full term, अपूरयित्वा without completing, मत्सकाशम् into my presence, कथम् how, इह here, आगतः came, कामवृत्तम् an irresponsible person, अनार्यम् ignoble, मृषावादिनमेव च liar, त्वाम् you, धिक् fie upon, इति thus, परे लोके in the other world, मे पिता my father, व्यक्तम् surely, वक्ष्यति will tell me.

data.v: विवशं शोकसंतप्तं दीनं भग्नमनोरथम् । मामिहोत्सृज्य करुणं कीर्तिर्नरमिवानृजुम् ।।
data.es: O lovely lady where have you gone, leaving me here like fame deserting a crook? I am helpless griefstricken, pitiable, pathetic and disappointed. O lady of slender waist, leave me not. Separated from you, I will give up my life.
data.anv: वरारोहे lovely lady, विवशम् helpless, शोकसन्तप्तम् tormented by sorrow, दीनम् piteous, भग्नमनोरथम् disappointed , माम् me, कीर्तिः fame, अनृजुम् crook, नरमिव like such a man, इह here, करुणम् pitiable, उत्सृज्य leaving, क्व गच्छसि where have you gone, सुमध्यमे lady with a slender waist, मा myself, मा उत्सृज leave me not, त्वया by you, विरहितः separated, अहम् I, आत्मनः my, जीवितम् life, मोक्ष्ये I will give up.

data.v: क्व गच्छसि वरारोहे मामुत्सृज्य सुमध्यमे । त्वया विरहितश्चाहं मोक्ष्ये जीवितमात्मनः ।।
data.es: O lovely lady where have you gone, leaving me here like fame deserting a crook? I am helpless griefstricken, pitiable, pathetic and disappointed. O lady of slender waist, leave me not. Separated from you, I will give up my life.
data.anv: वरारोहे lovely lady, विवशम् helpless, शोकसन्तप्तम् tormented by sorrow, दीनम् piteous, भग्नमनोरथम् disappointed , माम् me, कीर्तिः fame, अनृजुम् crook, नरमिव like such a man, इह here, करुणम् pitiable, उत्सृज्य leaving, क्व गच्छसि where have you gone, सुमध्यमे lady with a slender waist, मा myself, मा उत्सृज leave me not, त्वया by you, विरहितः separated, अहम् I, आत्मनः my, जीवितम् life, मोक्ष्ये I will give up.

data.v: इतीव विलपन्रामः सीतादर्शनलालसः । न ददर्श सुदुःखार्तो राघवो जनकात्मजाम् ।।
data.es: Deeply distressed, Rama who was anxious to see Sita, daughter of Janaka, wailed and wailed but could not see her.
data.anv: सीतादर्शनलालसः eager to see Sita, सुदुःखार्तः deeply distressed, राघवः Rama, इतीव in that manner, विलपन् wailed, जनकात्मजाम् the daughter of Janaka, न ददर्श did not see.

data.v: अनासादयमानं तं सीतां दशरथात्मजम् । पङ्कमासाद्य विपुलं सीदन्तमिव कुञ्जरम् । लक्ष्मणो राममत्यर्थमुवाच हितकाम्यया ।।
data.es: Lakshmana, dedicated to his wellbeing, spoke to Rama, son of Dasaratha, who was sinking like an elephant into the quagmire, when he failed to trace Sita.
data.anv: सीताम् Sita, अनासादयमानम् unable to find, दशरथात्मजम् the son of Dasaratha, विपुलम् deep, पङ्कम् mud, आसाद्य reached, सीदन्तम् sinking,  कुञ्जरम् इव like an elephant, तं रामम् that Rama, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, अत्यर्थम् great, हितकाम्यया for his welfare, उवाच said.

data.v: मा विषादं महाबाहो कुरु यत्नं मया सह । इदं च हि वनं शूर बहुकन्दरशोभितम् ।।
data.es: O longarmed, heroic Rama, do not grieve. This forest is full of caves. Let us try together.
data.anv: महाबाहो  longarmed, विषादम् sorrow, मा do not resort to, मया सह along with me, यत्नम् effort, कुरु do, शूर O hero, इदम् this,वनम् forest,बहुकन्दरशोभितं हि full of caves.

data.v: प्रियकाननसंचारा वनोन्मत्ता च मैथिली । सा वनं वा प्रविष्टा स्यान्नलिनीं वा सुपुष्पिताम् ।।
data.es: Sita is madly in love with the forest. She might have entered deep into the jungle or into a fully blossomed lotuspond.
data.anv: प्रियकाननसञ्चारा one who is fond of wandering in the forest, वनोन्मत्ताच mad after forest , सा मैथिली that Maithili, वनं वा or in the forest, सुपुष्पिताम् flowering, नलिनीं वा or lotuspond, प्रविष्टा has entered, स्यात् perhaps.

data.v: सरितं वापि संप्राप्ता मीनवञ्जुरसेविताम् । वित्रासयितुकामा वा लीना स्यात्कानने क्वचित् । जिज्ञासमाना वैदेही त्वां मां च पुरुषर्षभ ।।
data.es: Maybe she has gone to take a dip in the river full of reeds and fishes Or has hidden somewhere for the sake of fun.
data.anv: स्नातुकामा ta take a dip, मीनवञ्जुलसेविताम् full of reeds and fishes, सरितं वापि or rivers, सम्प्राप्ता has reached, हासकामा to make fun, क्वचित् some where, निलीना वा might have hidden, स्यात् it may be so.

data.v: तस्या ह्यन्वेषणे श्रीमन्क्षिप्रमेव यतावहे । वनं सर्वं विचिनुवो यत्र सा जनकात्मजा । मन्यसे यदि काकुत्स्थ मा स्म शोके मनः कृथाः ।।
data.es: O scion of the Kakutsthas, let us search all over the forest if you please. Do not indulge in sorrow.
data.anv: काकुत्स्थ Rama, मन्यसे यदि if you think , सा she, जनकात्मजा Sita, यत्र wherever, सर्वम् all, वनम् forest, विचिनुव: we both will search, शोके in grief, मनः mind, मा स्म कृथाः do not indulge.

data.v: एवमुक्तस्तु सौहार्दाल्लक्ष्मणेन समाहितः । सह सौमित्रिणा रामो विचेतुमुपचक्रमे । तौ वनानि गिरींश्चैव सरितश्च सरांसि च ।।
data.es: When Lakshmana consoled him so affectionately Rama became composed. He continued the search with Lakshmana, son of Sumitra.
data.anv: लक्ष्मणेन by Lakshmana, सौहार्दात् very affectionately, एवम् in that way, उक्तः having been told, रामः Rama, समाहितः became composed, सौमित्रिणा सह along with Lakshmana the son of Sumitra, विचेतुम् to search, उपचक्रमे he started.

data.v: निखिलेन विचिन्वन्तौ सीतां दशरथात्मजौ । तस्य शैलस्य सानूनि गुहाश्च शिखराणि च ।।
निखिलेन विचिन्वन्तौ नैव तामभिजग्मतुः । विचित्य सर्वतः शैलं रामो लक्ष्मणमब्रवीत् ।।
नेह पश्यामि सौमित्रे वैदेहीं पर्वते शुभे । ततो दुःखाभिसंतप्तो लक्ष्मणो वाक्यमब्रवीत् ।।
विचरन्दण्डकारण्यं भ्रातरं दीप्ततेजसं । प्राप्स्यसि त्वं महाप्राज्ञ मैथिलीं जनकात्मजाम् ।।
यथा विष्णुर्महाबाहुर्बलिं बद्ध्वा महीमिमाम् । एवमुक्तस्तु वीरेण लक्ष्मणेन स राघवः ।।
उवाच दीनया वाचा दुःखाभिहतचेतनः । वनं सर्वं सुविचितं पद्मिन्यः फुल्लपङ्कजाः ।।
गिरिश्चायं महाप्राज्ञ बहुकन्दरनिर्झरः । न हि पश्यामि वैदेहीं प्राणेभ्योऽपि गरीयसीम् ।।
data.es: O wise Lakshmana I have searched the entire forest, the ponds with fully blossomed lotuses, the mountains with many caves and streams. But could not see Vaidehi who is dearer to me than my life.
data.anv: महाप्राज्ञ wise sire, सर्वम् all over, वनम् the forest, सुविचितम् searched thoroughly, फ़ुल्लपङ्कजाः fully blossomed lotuses, पद्मिन्यः lotusponds, बहुकन्दर निर्झरः having many caves and streams, अयम् I, गिरिश्च mountains also, प्राणेभ्योऽपि more than my life, गरीयसीम् more important, वैदेहीम् Vaidehi, न हि पश्यामि do not see.

data.v: एवं स विलपन्रामः सीताहरणकर्शितः । दीनः शोकसमाविष्टो मुहूर्तं विह्वलोऽभवत् ।।
data.es: Thus tormented by the abduction of Sita, Rama felt dejected and cried.Overpowered by grief he lost his consciousness for a moment.
data.anv: सीताहरणकर्शितः tormented by Sita's abduction, सः रामः  Rama, एवम् thus, विलपन् cried, दीनः was dejected, शोकसमाविष्टः overpowered by grief, मुहूर्तम् for a moment, विह्वलः consciousess lost, अभवत् became.

data.v: स विह्वलितसर्वाङ्गो गतबुद्धिर्विचेतनः । विषसादातुरो दीनो निःश्वस्याशीतमायतम् ।।
data.es: By grief tormented, limbs enervated, intellect atrophied, senses switched off, he felt anxious and depressed and sighed long and hot.
data.anv: सन्तप्तः tormented, अवसन्नाङ्गः with limbs enervated, गतबुद्धि: intellect atrophied, विचेतनः lost senses, आतुरः anxious, दीनः dejected, अशीतम् hot, आयतम् long, निश्श्वस्य sighing, निषसाद reclined.

data.v: बहुशः स तु निःश्वस्य रामो राजीवलोचनः । हा प्रियेति विचुक्रोश बहुशो बाष्पगद्गदः ।।
data.es: Rama, his throat choked, shed propuse tears, sighing, O my darling.
data.anv: राजीवलोचनः lotuseyed, सः रामः that Rama, बहुलम् long, निश्श्वस्य sighing, बाष्पगद्गदः throat choked with sobbing, हा प्रियेति saying 'Alas, my darling', बहुशः many times, विचुक्रोश cried lotuseyed.

data.v: तं सान्त्वयामास ततो लक्ष्मणः प्रियबान्धवः । बहुप्रकारं धर्मज्ञः प्रश्रितः प्रश्रिताञ्जलिः ।।
data.es: Then Lakshmana, the knower of dharma and a dear friend offered obeisance most humbly with folded palms and consoled Rama in many ways.
data.anv: ततः then, प्रियबान्धवः  dear friend, धर्मज्ञः knower of dharma, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, प्रश्रिताञ्जलिः with folded palms, प्रश्रितम् humbly, बहुप्रकारम् many ways, तम् him, सान्त्वयामास consoled.

data.v: अनादृत्य तु तद्वाक्यं लक्ष्मणौष्ठपुटच्युतम् । अपश्यंस्तां प्रियां सीतां प्राक्रोशत्स पुनः पुनः ।।
data.es: Without caring for the words from the lips of Lakshmana, Rama sobbed loudly, unable to see his beloved Sita.इत्यार्षे श्रीमद्रामायणे वाल्मीकीय आदिकाव्ये अरण्यकाण्डे एकषष्टितमस्सर्गः।।Thus ends the sixtyfirst sarga of Aranyakanda of the holy Ramayana the first epic composed by sage Valmiki.
data.anv: सः he, तु on his part, लक्ष्मणोष्ठपुटात् from the lips of Lakshmana, च्युतम् uttered, तत् that, वाक्यम् words, अनादृत्य not caring, प्रियाम् beloved, तां सीताम् that Sita, अपश्यन् not able to see, पुनः पुनः again and again, प्राक्रोशत् cried loudly.

data.v: स दीनो दीनया वाचा लक्ष्मणं वाक्यमब्रवीत् । शीघ्रं लक्ष्मण जानीहि गत्वा गोदावरीं नदीम् । अपि गोदावरीं सीता पद्मान्यानयितुं गता ।।
data.es: Rama in dejection said these pitiable words to Lakshmana,O Lakashmana, go swiftly to the river Godavari and find out if Sita has gone there to get lotuses.
data.anv: सः that Rama, दीनः piteous, दीनया pitiable, वाचा words, लक्ष्मणम् to Lakshmana, वाक्यम् these words, अब्रवीत् said, लक्ष्मण Lakshmana, शीघ्रम् swiftly, गोदावरीं नदीम् Godavari river, गत्वा going, सीता Sita, पद्मानि lotuses, आनयितुम् to get, गोदावरीम् Godavari, अपि गता has  gone, जानीहि find out.

data.v: एवमुक्तस्तु रामेण लक्ष्मणः पुनरेव हि । नदीं गोदावरीं रम्यां जगाम लघुविक्रमः ।।
data.es: Lakshmana, destroyer of enemywarriors, went to the beautiful river Godavari with quick steps following the instruction of Rama.
data.anv: रामेण by Rama, एवम् in that way, उक्तः having been told, परवीरहा destroyer of enemy warriors, लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, लघुविक्रमः with quick steps, रम्याम् delightful, गोदावरीं नदीम् river Godavari, जगाम went.

data.v: तां लक्ष्मणस्तीर्थवतीं विचित्वा राममब्रवीत् । नैनां पश्यामि तीर्थेषु क्रोशतो न शृणोति मे ।।
data.es: Searching for Sita at the landings of river Godavari, Lakshmana said to Rama, I am unable to find her at these landings.No one responds to my call.
data.anv: लक्ष्मणः Lakshmana, तीर्थवतीम् having landings, ताम् her, विचित्वा searching, रामम् to Rama, अब्रवीत् said, एनाम् her, तीर्थेषु at the landings, न पश्यामि do not see, मे when I, क्रोशतः called out, न शृणोति no one hears.

data.v: कं नु सा देशमापन्ना वैदेही क्लेशनाशिनी । न हि तं वेद्मि वै राम यत्र सा तनुमध्यमा ।।
data.es: Where could Vaidehi, destroyer of sorrow, go? I wonder. I am unable to trace the spot where the daughter of Janaka could be found.
data.anv: क्लेशनाशिनी destroyer of sorrow, वैदेही Vaidehi, कं वा where else, देशम् place, आपन्ना नु had landed, सा that, जनकात्मजा daughter of Janaka, यत्र where, तं देशम् that place, अहम् I, न वेद हि do not know.

data.v: लक्ष्मणस्य वचः श्रुत्वा दीनः संताप मोहितः । रामः समभिचक्राम स्वयं गोदावरीं नदीम् ।।
data.es: Overwhelmed with grief on hearing Lakshmana's words, Rama himself went to river Godavari, and shouted, where are you, Sita?
data.anv: रामः Rama, लक्ष्मणस्य Lakshmana's, वचः words, श्रुत्वा on hearing, दीनः a dejected man, सन्तापमोहितः overwhelmed with grief, स्वयम् himself, गादावरीं नदीम् to river Godavari, समभिचक्राम went, सः रामः that Rama, ताम् the river, उपस्थितः approached, सीते Sita, क्व where, इत्येवम् in this manner, अब्रवीत् said.

data.v: स तामुपस्थितो रामः क्व सीतेत्येवमब्रवीत् ।।
भूतानि राक्षसेन्द्रेण वधार्हेण हृतामपि । न तां शशंसू रामाय तथा गोदावरी नदी ।।
data.es: Like the elements of Nature, river Godavari did not disclose Rama that Sita had been abducted by the king of demons who deserved death.
data.anv: वधार्हेण by one who deserved to be killed, राक्षसेन्द्रेण by the lord of the demons, हृताम् kidnapped, ताम् her, इति like that, भूतानि beings, तथा similarly, गोदावरी नदी river Godavari, रामाय to Rama, न शशंसुः did not reply.

data.v: ततः प्रचोदिता भूतैः शंसास्मै तां प्रियामिति । न च साभ्यवदत्सीतां पृष्टा रामेण शोचिता ।।
data.es: River Godavari (although) prompted by creatures (of Nature) to tell him about his beloved did not respond to brooding Rama.
data.anv: ततः thereafter, शोचता  brooding, रामेण by Rama, पृष्टा asked, सा that, प्रियाम् about his beloved, अस्मै to him, शंस you may tell, इति this, भूतैः beings, प्रचोदिता prompted, सीताम् Sita, नाभ्यवदत् no one has said.

data.v: रावणस्य च तद्रूपं कर्माणि च दुरात्मनः । ध्यात्वा भयात्तु वैदेहीं सा नदी न शशंस ताम् ।।
data.es: Remembering the evilminded Ravana's appearance and action, the river revealed nothing about Vaidehi out of fear.
data.anv: सा नदी that river, दुरात्मनः of the evilminded, रावणस्य Ravana's, तत् that, रूपम् figure, कर्माणि च actions too, ध्यात्वा thinking over, भयात् out of fear, तां वैदेहीम् about Vaidehi, न शशंस did not speak.

data.v: निराशस्तु तया नद्या सीताया दर्शने कृतः । उवाच रामः सौमित्रिं सीतादर्शनकर्शितः ।।
data.es: Disappointed by the river and emaciated by not being able to see Sita, Rama said to Lakshmana :
data.anv: सीतादर्शनकर्शितः emaciated on account of not finding Sita, रामः Rama, तया नद्या by that river not replying, सीतायाः of Sita, दर्शने see, निराशः disappointed, कृतः was made, सौमित्रिम् to Lakshmana, उवाच said.

data.v: किं नु लक्ष्मण वक्ष्यामि समेत्य जनकं वचः । मातरं चैव वैदेह्या विना तामहमप्रियम् ।।
data.es: O handsome Lakshmana this Godavari does not at all respond. How can I go to Janaka and my mother without Sita and break this unhappy news?
data.anv: सौम्य O handsome, एषा गोदावरी this Godavari, किञ्चित् even a little, न प्रतिभाषते is not answering, लक्ष्मण Lakshmana, जानकीं Janaki, विना without, अहम् I am, जनकम् Janaka, समेत्य after meeting him, मातरं चैव to mother also, अप्रियम् unhappy, किं नु what can, वचनम् words, वक्ष्यामि tell.

data.v: या मे राज्यविहीनस्य वने वन्येन जीवतः । सर्वं व्यपनयच्छोकं वैदेही क्व नु सा गता ।।
data.es: Where could have gone that Vaidehi, who removed all my sorrows and sufferings when I lost my kingdom and survived on food available in the forest?
data.anv: राज्यविहीनस्य  who lost his kingdom, वने in the forest, वन्येन food available in the forest, जीवतः lived, मे me, सर्वम् all, शोकम् grief, या वैदेही that Vaidehi, व्यपनयेत्  remove sorrow, सा she, क्व where, गता नु has she gone?

data.v: ज्ञातिपक्षविहीनस्य राजपुत्रीमपश्यतः । मन्ये दीर्घा भविष्यन्ति रात्रयो मम जाग्रतः ।।
data.es: Away from relatives and away from the princess, I keep awake during nights which seem too long.
data.anv: ज्ञातिपक्षविहीनस्य away from relatives, राजपुत्रीम् princess, अपश्यतः not seeing, जाग्रतः keeping awake, मम for me, रात्रयः nights, दीर्घाः long, भविष्यन्ति appear, मन्ये I think.

data.v: गोदावरीं जनस्थानमिमं प्रस्रवणं गिरिम् । सर्वाण्यनुचरिष्यामि यदि सीता हि दृश्यते ।।
data.es: I will roam about the river Godavari, Janasthana and this mount Prasravana till I find Sita.
data.anv: गोदावरीम् Godavari, जनस्थानम् Janasthanam, इमम् this, प्रस्रवणं Prasravana, गिरिम् mountain, सर्वाणि all, अनुगमिष्यामि will follow up, सीता Sita, यदि हि दृश्यते if Sita can be found.

data.v: एवं संभाषमाणौ तावन्योन्यं भ्रातरावुभौ । वसुंधरायां पतितं पुष्पमार्गमपश्यताम् ।।
data.es: Talking with each other, the two brothers took the path on earth strewn with flowers.
data.anv: एवम् in that way, अन्योन्यम् with each other, सम्भाषमाणौ conversing, (तौ) उभौ both, भ्रातरौ brothers, वसुन्धरायाम् on the path, पतितम् पुष्पमार्गम् path scattered with flowers, अपश्यताम् saw.

data.v: तां पुष्पवृष्टिं पतितां दृष्ट्वा रामो महीतले । उवाच लक्ष्मणं वीरो दुःखितो दुःखितं वचः ।।
data.es: Seeing showers of flowers fallen on the ground, valiant Rama sadly said these words to sorrowful Lakshmana:
data.anv: वीरः Valiant, रामः Rama, महीतले on the ground, पतिताम् fallen, तां पुष्पवृष्टिम् that shower of flowers, दृष्ट्वा seeing, दुःखितः sadly, दुःखितम् sorrowful, लक्ष्मणम् to Lakshmana, वचः these words, उवाच spoke.
data.md: Thereupon, pacifying the weeping daughter of Janaka, Rama moved with grief, spoke to the distressed Laksmana, saying.

data.v: अभिजानामि पुष्पाणि तानीमामीह लक्ष्मण । अपिनद्धानि वैदेह्या मया दत्तानि कानने ।।
data.es: O Lakshmana, here are the same flowers I had given Vaidehi to wear in the forest. I can recognize them.
data.anv: लक्ष्मण O Lakshmana, इह here, तानि those, इमानि the very same ones, पुष्पाणि flowers, अभिजानामि I recognise them, इह here, कानने in the forest, मया by me, दत्तानि given, वैदेह्या by Vaidehi, पिनद्धानि worn, हि indeed.

data.v: एवमुक्त्वा महाबाहुर्लक्ष्मणं पुरुषर्षभम् । क्रुद्धोऽब्रवीद्गिरिं तत्र सिंहः क्षुद्रमृगं यथा ।।
data.es: Rigteous Rama, the best among men, having said these words to the longarmed Lakshmana, asked mount Prasravana, full of streams:
data.anv: पुरुषर्षभः a bull among men, धर्मात्मा righteous, रामः Rama, महाबाहुम् longarmed, लक्ष्मणम् Lakshmana, एवम् in that way, उक्त्वा having said, प्रस्रवणाकुलम् full of streams, गिरिम् mountain, उवाच said.

data.v: तां हेमवर्णां हेमाभां सीतां दर्शय पर्वत । यावत्सानूनि सर्वाणि न ते विध्वंसयाम्यहम् ।।
data.es: Like a lion aiming at a petty animal, angry Rama said, O Mountain before I destroy all your slopes show me that goldenhued Sita with lustre like gold.
data.anv: तत्र there, सिंहः lion, क्षुद्रमृगं petty animal, गिरिम् mountain, क्रुद्धः angry, अब्रवीत् said, पर्वत mountain, अहम् I, ते your, सर्वाणि all, सानूनि slopes, यावत् before, न विध्वंसयामि I do not destroy, हेमवर्णाम् golden complexioned, हेमाभाम् with lustre like gold, सीताम् Sita, दर्शय show.

data.v: मम बाणाग्निनिर्दग्धो भस्मीभूतो भविष्यसि । असेव्यः सततं चैव निस्तृणद्रुमपल्लवः ।।
data.es: Rama, Dasaratha's son said to the mountain, The fire of my arrows will reduce you to ashes.You will have no grass, no tree, no twig. You will be unfit to be served any more.
data.anv: ततः then, दाशरथिः Dasaratha's son, रामः Rama, शिलोच्चयम् to the mountain, उवाच च said, मम my, बाणाग्निनिर्दग्धः burnt by the fire of my arrows, भस्मीभूतः reduced to ashes, सततम् always, असेव्यः unfit to be served, निस्तृणद्रुमपल्लवः with no grass, no trees, no twig, भविष्यसि you will be there.

data.v: इमां वा सरितं चाद्य शोषयिष्यामि लक्ष्मण । यदि नाख्याति मे सीतामद्य चन्द्रनिभाननाम् ।।
data.es: O Lakshmana if this river does not tell me about that noble Sita with countenance like the moon, I will drain it dry right now.
data.anv: लक्ष्मण Lakshmana, आर्याम् noble, चन्द्रनिभाननाम् Moonlike face, सीताम् Sita, मे to me, नाख्याति not tell, अद्य right now, इमाम् this, सरितं वा to the river too, शोषयिष्यामि will make it dry.

data.v: एवं स रुषितो रामो दिधक्षन्निव चक्षुषा । ददर्श भूमौ निष्क्रान्तं राक्षसस्य पदं महत् ।।
data.es: While Rama was angry with his eyes burning, he saw on the ground as he advanced large footprints of a demon and then the footprints of Maithili which signified as if chased by the demon, she was frightened and was running hither and thither, longing to see Rama.
data.anv: एवम् in that way, रुषितः in anger, चक्षुषा with eyes, दिधक्षन्निव as if wishing to burn, रामः Rama, भूमौ ground, निष्क्रान्तम् crossed, राक्षसस्य the demon's, महत् large, पदम् footprint, अथ and then, त्रस्तायाः of the frightened lady, रामकाङ्क्षिण्याः who longed for Rama, इतस्ततः here and there, प्रधावन्त्याः who was running, राक्षसेन by the demon, अनुवृत्तायाः who followed, मैथिल्याः Maithili's, पदानि च footprints, ददर्श saw.

data.v: स समीक्ष्य परिक्रान्तं सीताया राक्षसस्य च । संभ्रान्तहृदयो रामः शशंस भ्रातरं प्रियम् ।।
data.es: Bewildered to see the broken bow and quiver and many splinters of the chariot scattered all over, Rama said to his loving brother Lakshmana:
data.anv: सः रामः that Rama, सीतायाः Sita's, राक्षसस्य च and the demon's, परिक्रान्तम् movement, भग्नम् broken, धनुश्च bow, तूणी च and quiver, बहुधा many ways, विकीर्णम् scattered, रथम् chariot, समीक्ष्य having seen, सम्भ्रान्त हृदयः bewidered mind, प्रियम् loving, भ्रातरम् brother, शशंस told.

data.v: पश्य लक्ष्मण वैदेह्याः शीर्णाः कनकबिन्दवः । भूषणानां हि सौमित्रे माल्यानि विविधानि च ।।
data.es: O Saumitri see the many broken bits of gold ornaments and garlands.
data.anv: सौमित्रे son of Sumitra, लक्ष्मण Lakshmana, पश्य see, वैदेह्याः Vaidehi's, भूषणानाम् of the ornaments, कनकबिन्दवः golden bits, शीर्णाः shattered, विविधानि many kinds, माल्यानि               garlands, च also.

data.v: तप्तबिन्दुनिकाशैश्च चित्रैः क्षतजबिन्दुभिः । आवृतं पश्य सौमित्रे सर्वतो धरणीतलम् ।।
data.es: See, O Lakshmana, the patches of blood looking like drops of shining gold spread all over the ground.
data.anv: सौमित्रे Lakshmana, तप्तबिन्दुनिकाशैः shining like drops of gold, चित्रैः variegated, क्षतजबिन्दुभिः drops of blood, सर्वतः all over, आवृतम् spread, धरणीतलाम् on the ground, पश्य see.

data.v: मन्ये लक्ष्मण वैदेही राक्षसैः कामरूपिभिः । भित्त्वा भित्त्वा विभक्ता वा भक्षिता वा भविष्यति ।।
data.es: O Lakshmana, Vaidehi might have been cut into pieces, and eaten up by the demons who can assume any form at their free will.
data.anv: लक्ष्मण O Lakshmana,  वैदेही Vaidehi, कामरूपिभिः assuming any form at their will, राक्षसैः by the demons, भित्त्वाभित्त्वा breaking into pieces, विभक्ता वा she is torn, भक्षिता वा eaten or, भविष्यति would have, मन्ये I think.

data.v: तस्य निमित्तं वैदेह्या द्वयोर्विवदमानयोः । बभूव युद्धं सौमित्रे घोरं राक्षसयोरिह ।।
data.es: O Lakshmana, two demons might have fought a dreadful duel at this place contesting with each other for the sake of Vaidehi.
data.anv: सौमित्रे O Lakshmana, तस्याः her, वेदेह्याः Vaidehi's, निमित्तम् on account of her, विवदमानयोः contesting with, द्वयोः of both, राक्षसयोः demons, इह here, घोरम् dreadful, युद्धम् war, बभूव was fought.

data.v: मुक्तामणिचितं चेदं तपनीयविभूषितम् । धरण्यां पतितं सौम्य कस्य भग्नं महद्धनुः ।।
data.es: O handsome Lakshmana whose is this huge bow embedded with pearls and gems and adorned with gold fallen on the ground?
data.anv: सौम्य O handsome Lakshmana, कस्य whose, इदम् this, मुक्तामणिमयम् embedded with pearls and gems, तपनीयविभूषितम् adorned with gold, महत् धनुः huge bow, भग्नम् broken, धरण्याम् on the ground, पतितम् fallen?

data.v: तरुणादित्यसंकाशं वैदूर्यगुलिकाचितम् । विशीर्णं पतितं भूमौ कवचं कस्य काञ्चनम् ।।
data.es: Whose is this shield of gold studded with Vaidurya, broken and strewn all over the ground, shining like the morning Sun?
data.anv: तरुणादित्यसङ्काशम् looking like the morning Sun, वैडूर्यगुलिकाचितम् studded with Vaidurya (cat's eye), काञ्चनम् gold, कस्य whose, विशीर्णम् spread all over, कवचम् shield, भूमौ on the ground, पतितम् fallen?

data.v: छत्रं शतशलाकं च दिव्यमाल्योपशोभितम् । भग्नदण्डमिदं कस्य भूमौ सौम्य निपातितम् ।।
data.es: Whose parasol is this with a hundred spokes, festooned with wonderful flowers thrown down on the ground with broken staff ?
data.anv: शतशलाकं च having a hundred spokes, दिव्यमाल्योपशोभितम् festooned with wonderful flower garlands, भग्नदण्डम् with broken staff, इदं छत्रम् this parasol, कस्य whose, सम्यक् thrown down, भूमौ on the ground, निपातितम् fallen?

data.v: काञ्चनोरश्छदाश्चेमे पिशाचवदनाः खराः । भीमरूपा महाकायाः कस्य वा निहता रणे ।।
data.es: Whose are these donkeys, with golden chestcoverings, with the devil's face, fierceful and huge and slain in the encounter ?
data.anv: काञ्चनोरश्छदाः with golden chestcoverings, पिशाचवदनाः those with devil's face, भीमरूपाः fierceful, महाकायाः those with huge body, रणे in war, निहताः slain, इमे these, खराः donkeys, कस्य वा whose?

data.v: दीप्तपावकसंकाशो द्युतिमान्समरध्वजः । अपविद्धश्च भग्नश्च कस्य सांग्रामिको रथः ।।
data.es: Whose war chariot with a battle flag is this, shining like burning fire, turned upside down and broken?
